1b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag smad du/ stsang+yas/ sa shA/ 
1b2(dkon brtsegs): gtas smrarnam ma hA smin swA/ 'di skad du/ 
1b3(dkon brtsegs): yi skad du
1b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khrugs
2a1(dkon brtsegs): / bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po
2a2(dkon brtsegs): dang po// sangs rgyas dang / byang chubs mas dang 'tham
2a3(dkon brtsegs): dus gtsog na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi
2b1(dkon brtsegs): phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / thubs
2b2(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs med pa/ 
2b3(dkon brtsegs): dbang dang ldan par gyur/ pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab
2b4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed
2b5(dkon brtsegs): pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba
3a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba
3a2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa na
3a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jidi ltar slob pa rgyun tu zhug sa pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ngo 'o// byang chub sems dpa'
3a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag dang // rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya
3a5(dkon brtsegs): byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / de dag las gzhan pa gzi brjid che ba'i lha dang / klu dang
3a6(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang / mI'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 
3b1(dkon brtsegs): mi dang mi sngo ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ chos ston to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa
3b2(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu stan las langs te/ chos gros phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga se la
3b3(dkon brtsegs): btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das
3b4(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'daso sngon gyi// byang chub sems dpa'
3b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs po rnams kyi 'jug pa
3b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / spyod pa dang / spro ba dang / sems bskyed pa gang gi sau sngon gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
3b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / 
4a1(dkon brtsegs): go cha dang / yon tan yongs su brjod pa legs par bshad du gsol// btsun pa bcom
4a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi las dang sems bskyed pa dang / go cha
4a3(dkon brtsegs): dang yon tan yongs su brjo dra pa dag kyang bshad du gsol/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
4a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po gang dag lta/ dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i smad
4a5(dkon brtsegs): du brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu de dag gi spyod pa dang / yon tan yongs su dag pa yongs
4a6(dkon brtsegs): su brjod pa dag kyang bshad du gsol/ de ni skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten
4a7(dkon brtsegs): la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo ngal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur la/ da ltar
4b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la yang 'di ltar chos kyi sgron ma'i snang ba dang / 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi snang bas snang ba bgyis par 'gyur zhing
4b2(dkon brtsegs): sme ba stsal par yang 'gyur ro// de lta lags pas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyis sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi 'jug
4b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / spyod pa dang / spro ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / go cha dang / yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag thos na de bzhin du slob cing de bzhin du bsgrub par 'gyur
4b4(dkon brtsegs): ro// de dag de ltar bslabs shing de ltar bsgrubs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / yon tan de lta bu dag
4b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gyur nas kyang slar zhing gong nas gang du yon tan shin tu khyad par can dag kyang thob par 'gyur/ ba lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / 
4b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu legs so lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems
4b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhugs te/ 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jug pa dang / spyod pa
4b8(dkon brtsegs): dang spro ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / gau cha dang / yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag 'dri bar sems pa ni yang khyod legs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir
5a1(dkon brtsegs): / legs pa nga sbyin la tshul bzhin du yi la d+hu shig dang / di sa ste ngas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams las rnams
5a2(dkon brtsegs): ra bya'o// me nga ldan pa shA 'i rgyu bcom ldan ras de bzhin na nas gsol te/ bcom ldan das lta nyan pa dang / bcom ldan sa kyis de la 'dzin
5a3(dkon brtsegs): sgyu / shA byu ga na gyi khams mngon par dga' zhis bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba com pa yang dag par rdzogs
5a4(dkon brtsegs): spyan men po nis bya ba bzhugs shing gas te/  chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po rnamasa'adi ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug las brnams te ches sno
5a5(dkon brtsegs): / de nas tshedong ldan pa shA dwa ti'i bu sa sems te/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dag 'a ba zhes bgyi bden de
5a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po zhes bgyi ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug
5a7(dkon brtsegs): las brtsams te chos ston pa de phyogs gang na bzhugs shes don de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nges par zhu'o snyam mo// de nas
5a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu
5b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi ning stong tham pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
5b2(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing ba zhes te/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin
5b3(dkon brtsegs): drug las brtsams te chos ston to// shA radra ti'i bu yang de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong zhig stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la
5b4(dkon brtsegs): btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom
5b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dang / par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de la 'ang/ skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
5b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa 'di la slob par 'tshal lo// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
5b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa la deng sang bslab par shin tu
5b8(dkon brtsegs): dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la mi 'khrugs par bya ba dang / gnod sems kyi sems mi skyed par bya ba'i phyir ro// 
6a1(dkon brtsegs): shA radwa ti'i bu de la de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spyan chen po de la dge slong des 'di skad ces gsol to// 
6a2(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag deng slan chad 'di ltar g.yo ma mchis pa dang / sgra ma mchis pa dang / mang pa'i tshig dang / gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i tshig gis bla na med pa yang
6a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 'dud par bgyi/ yongs su bsngo bar yang bgyi'o// btsun
6a4(dkon brtsegs): babacom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed do// de ltar bAn med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsdus shing / 
6a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngos la 'di nas bzung ste bla na med pa yang / dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa/ sangs ma rgyas kyo bar du gal te sems can 'ge' tsam
6a6(dkon brtsegs): khro ba 'am/ gnod sems sam/ 'drug pa dang ldan pa'o sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyog ba cu kun gyi 'jog rten gyi khams dpag tu mi mchis grangs ma mchis bsam
6a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab gnal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing brnyes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
6a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag bsdus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
6b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la 'di nas bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te gom pa 'dor
6b2(dkon brtsegs): re re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang bral bar gyur na/ de bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab
6b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bsdus
6b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par
6b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te nyan
6b6(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi
6b7(dkon brtsegs): khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
6b8(dkon brtsegs): bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
7a1(dkon brtsegs): chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te 'dod pa'i 'dod
7a2(dkon brtsegs): chags dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma
7a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ 
7a4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
7a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te 'dod chags dang ldan pa'am/ 
7a6(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang ldan pa'am/ gti mug dang ldan pa'am/ rnam par 'tshe ba dang ldan pa 'am/ gnyid dang ldan pa'am/ rmugs pa dang ldan pa'am/ 'gyod pa dang ldan pa 'am/ 
7a7(dkon brtsegs): rgod pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis
7a8(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig
7b1(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yod
7b2(dkon brtsegs): su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te the tshom dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs/ 
7b3(dkon brtsegs): bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs
7b4(dkon brtsegs): te 'tshe zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bco ma ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun dpa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i
7b5(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngosashing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
7b6(dkon brtsegs): nga'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te srog gcod pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
7b7(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gnal du ma mchis pa thams cad nasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag du ltar bzhugs te// 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos
7b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin pa tsha 'a bskyed do// 
8a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
8a2(dkon brtsegs): ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te ma byin par len pa dang ldan pa 'am/ mi tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan pa 'am/ brdzun du smra ba dang ldan pa 'am/ phra ma dang ldan pa'am/ ngag rtsub
8a3(dkon brtsegs): po dang ldan pa'am/ tshig kyal par smra ba dang ldan pa 'am/ brnab sems dang ldan pa'am/ gnod sems dang ldan pa 'am/ log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par
8a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis dbasam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na
8a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig ces byas
8a6(dkon brtsegs): so/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de nas dge slong zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa'i gi cha chen po bgos pa nyid
8a7(dkon brtsegs): nas sems can thams cad la sems mi 'khrug cing / kun tu mi 'khrug pa ni shin tu ngo mtshar che'o// kye ma dge slong 'di ni mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te legs so snyam
8a8(dkon brtsegs): mo shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar dge slong de'i ming mi 'khrugs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
8b1(dkon brtsegs): spyan chen po des dge slong legs so legs so// dge slong khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshen pas de nyid du 'gyur la/ dge slong khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par
8b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas yang mtshan 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de nyid du 'gyur ro zhes de'i ming de la rjes su yid/ 
8b3(dkon brtsegs): rang ba mdzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang dge slong legs so legs so// dge slong khyod byang chub
8b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na yang ming de nyid du ma gyur3dge slong khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa
8b5(dkon brtsegs): na yang mtshan 'di lta ste mi 'khrugs pa mi 'khrugs pa nas/ bya ba de nyid du 'gyur ro zhes de'i ming de la rjes su yid rung ba byas so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de
8b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa mngon du gyur pa des 'di
8b7(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
8b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te ji skad smras pa de bzhin du ma bgyis na/ 
9a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tum mchis grangs ma mchis pasam gyis mi khyab gnang dur mchis pa thams cad nasangs rgyas bcom ldan
9a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bsdus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad
9a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la dz+nyA na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
9a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te na/ dgom pa 'dor ba re re tsam dag la sangs rgyas yid la dad pa dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems ma skyed
9a5(dkon brtsegs): na bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gnal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas
9a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de
9a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de de ltar bla na med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bA na med pa yang dag par
9a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te tshe rangs tshe rabs su khyim nas khyim ma mchis par yang dge par rab tu ma byung na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu
9b1(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dngapa gtu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gnal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag du ltar bzhugs te/ 
9b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshe zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bsdus par gyur cigabatsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin
9b3(dkon brtsegs): po che 'di bskyed de de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
9b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te tshe rabs tshe rab sa su mngon par rab tu byung nas kyang dgon pa par ma gyur tum bsod snyoms par ma gyur tam/ phyag
9b5(dkon brtsegs): dar khrod par ma gyur tam/ stan gcig par ma gyurata ma zas phyis mi len par ma gyur tam zas rnyed rnyed len par ma gyur tam/ dur khrod par
9b6(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur tam/ bla khab med par ma gyur tam / shing drung par ma gyur tam/ cog pu par ma gyur ta ma/ gzhi ji bzhin par ma gyur ta ma/ chos gos gsum par ma gyur
9b7(dkon brtsegs): ta ma phying pa par ma gyur ta ma/ 'dod pa chung bar ma gyur tam/ chog shes par ma gyur ta ma/ chos 'dod par ma gyur ta ma/ chos la dga' bar ma gyur ta ma/ 
9b8(dkon brtsegs): chos la gus par ma gyur tam/ chos la rten par ma gyur tam/ chos la rton par ma gyur pa nas bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa'i yi ma
10a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par blang ba dag drangs te gnas par ma gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyimyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam
10a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab gnal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs to/ tshe ning bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
10a3(dkon brtsegs): dag bsdus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag da ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'dir bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
10a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pur songs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te tshe rabs tshe rabs su rab
10a5(dkon brtsegs): tu byung nas kyang chos ston par ma gyur tam/ spobs pa chags pa med pa dang ldan par ma gyur tam/ spobs pa tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan par ma gyur na
10a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag
10a7(dkon brtsegs): da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad
10a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
10b1(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du 'di ltar 'greng ba dang / mchis pa dang / 'chag pa'i spyod lam gsum ma gtogs par gal te nyal bar gyur na/ bdag
10b2(dkon brtsegs): gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rjen gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar
10b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang sten pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen
10b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla ngan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par
10b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi/ bar du gal te sems can 'ga' tsam la rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'byung ba dang ldan pa 'am/ rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang
10b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i sems bskyed dam/ bud med dang ldan pa'am/ brdzun du smra ba dang ldan pa'am/ de las gzhan smra ba brjod pa dang ldan pa 'am/ gzhan la gnod cing spa bkong
10b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams
10b8(dkon brtsegs): cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa
11a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ 
11a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te bud med la 'di skad ltar mi rtag pa'i rnam pa
11a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba dang / snying pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa'im/ rnam pa gzhan dang gnan dag gis chos ston pa na yan lag las skyes pa'i rnam pa
11a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dang gnan dag la bzang ba'i mtshan mar gzung nas/ so'i phreng ba ston tam/ rgod par bgyid dam/ lag pa g.yob par bgyid na bdag gis phyogs
11a5(dkon brtsegs): bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du/ ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
11a6(dkon brtsegs): gang dgra da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams
11a7(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs
11a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du chos ston pa na gal te lag pa bsgyur zhing chos ston par gyur na bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
11b1(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang
11b2(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ 
11b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bor du
11b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skra dang kha spu dregs pa snod du gyur pa 'am/ snod du ma gyur pa'ang mi bsngo ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
11b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan chos gos ngur smrig 'tshal bdag mthong na de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes sam// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi 'du shes ma bskyed
11b6(dkon brtsegs): na bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom
11b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan
11b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su
12a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan
12a2(dkon brtsegs): dag mthong na de dag la ston pa'i 'du shes ma bskyed na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis
12a3(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
12a4(dkon brtsegs): bsdus par gyur cig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar
12a5(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag parardzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma
12a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi bar du chos 'chad pa na chos ston pa dag la gal te mchis te chos ma mnyan par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis
12a7(dkon brtsegs): grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i
12a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar
12b1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te de
12b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par 'di las phyi rol du gyur pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / lha gzhan
12b3(dkon brtsegs): dag la phyag bgyis par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchi so bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams
12b4(dkon brtsegs): cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par
12b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdagade ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed do// de ltar bla na med pa yang dag
12b6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te 'di la ni sbyin pa sprul bar
12b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o// 'di la ni skul bar mi bgyi'o zhes sems can la tha dad du bgyi ba'i 'du shes bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag
12b8(dkon brtsegs): tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang
13a1(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed
13a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
13a3(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te 'di la ni yon dbul bar 'gyi'o// 'di la ni yon dngul bar mi bgyi'o zhes de lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed par gyur
13a4(dkon brtsegs): na bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas
13a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te'atsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig
13a6(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen nga'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
13a7(dkon brtsegs): bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bA na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par songs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te 'di la ni dam pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa sprul par
13a8(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o// 'di la ni spel bar mi bgyi'o zhes de lta bu'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs
13b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs
13b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed
13b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
13b4(dkon brtsegs): ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te dgum par 'os pa'i sems can la la zhig khrid de mchis pa mthong na/ de yongs su thar par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag gis
13b5(dkon brtsegs): lus yongs su bting ba ma bgyis na bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pas mo gyis mi khyab gnal
13b6(dkon brtsegs): du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur
13b7(dkon brtsegs): cig/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des gal te 'gum par 'os pa'i sems can la la zhig khrid de mchis
13b8(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong na de yongs su thar par ma bgyis kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi rgya'o zhes smras so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de nas yang
14a1(dkon brtsegs): // dge slong zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa 'dis gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
14a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag dbang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur par 'jog pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
14a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dbang du gyur pa dang / tshang mar gyur par 'dzeg pa de na lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi drangang du gyur pa dang / ched mar gyur par 'gyur ro snyam mo// 
14a4(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po// des dge slong de'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis/ 
14a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas/ dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong de de bzhin no// ji ltar khyod rnam par rtog pa de bzhin du/ dge slong gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
14a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag dbang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur par 'jog pa de yang ring por mi thogs par lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
14a7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi dngang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur par 'gyur ro// dge slong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag go cha chen po de lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par
14a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de
14b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom
14b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang
14b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ltung ba'i nongs pa byung ba dag mthong na/ khyod la
14b4(dkon brtsegs): ltung ba'i nyes pa 'di byung ngo zhes ltung ba glengs par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab
14b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhi sa la/ chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
14b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na thams cad
14b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad nyan thos rnams kyi ltung ba'i sgra tsam dag kyang mi grag cing / mi 'byung ba de ltar bdag gis brtsal zhing / bsgrub par bgyi'o// ci nas bdag bla na med
14b8(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / bla na yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa ji snyed pa dag yongs
15a1(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin par 'gyur ba de ltar brgal bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar
15a2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te tha na gas/ 
15a3(dkon brtsegs): lam du khung byung bar gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas
15a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzha sa la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 
15a5(dkon brtsegs): ci nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdo na par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa
15a6(dkon brtsegs): nga'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag khyim gyi gnas nges par byung zhing rab tu byung bar gyur pa dag/ tha na g.yar lam na yang khu ba mi 'byin pa de ltar bdag gis brtsal zhing bsgrub par
15a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos
15a8(dkon brtsegs): la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i
15b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ da ltar gyi bud med dang / bud med kyi skyon gang lags pa'i bud med dang / bud med kyi skyon de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur na/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu/ 
15b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur zhing bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang gtu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad
15b3(dkon brtsegs): na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhas la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
15b4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'dibaskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa
15b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te ji skad smras pa de bzhin du ma bgyis na/ bdag gi phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi kham
15b6(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
15b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ sa bon gyi chos 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag ji lta ji ltar sems mngon par bsgrub par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sangs
15b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos rnams mngon par 'grub cing / de lta de ltar chos ston par yang 'gyur ro zhes gsol to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de nas dge slong zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrug
16a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dam bcas pa 'di gal te yang dag pa'i smon lam yin zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
16a2(dkon brtsegs): ldog par 'gyur ba yang dag pa yin na/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig 'dis rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa chen po 'di g.yo ba dang / rab tu g.yo
16a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / kun tu rab tu g.yo ba dang / 'gul ba dang / rab tu 'gul ba dang / kun tu rab tu 'gul ba dang / ldeg pa dang / rab tu ldeg pa dang / kun tu rab tu ldeg par byos shig/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de nas byang
16a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi bden pa'i dam bcas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa des/ rkang pa g.ya
16a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mthe bos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten/ gyi khams kyi sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.ye bar bya ste/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu
16a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg par byas so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin
16a7(dkon brtsegs): du byed par gyur pa yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ 
16a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa'i rjes su slob pa'i
16b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de 'dra ba kho na'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin cig myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas
16b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de dang po sems bskyed pa la/ 
16b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par zhugs pa na/ lha'i ris ji snyed gcig 'dus par gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ro dwa ti'i bu
16b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/ dang po sems bskyed pa la yang dag par zhugs pa na/ stong gsum/ gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal po
16b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / bdud sdig can dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzug sa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu ji snyed pa de dag thams cad
16b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus nas/ thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces kye ma sngon ma thos pa'i sang ga'i sgra chen po 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa 'dis bsgrags pa
16b7(dkon brtsegs): las thos so zhes smras so// sha ra dwa tI'i de nas lha'i bu de dag dga' ba dang / yid bde ba bskyas nas/ kha 'thun par 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag
16b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba de
17a1(dkon brtsegs): dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so// sems can gang dag gis seng ge'i sgra chen po dang / khyu mchog gi mi 'jigs pa chen po dang / smon lam chen
17a2(dkon brtsegs): po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so zhes gsol te// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa
17a3(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i go cha chen po ci 'dra ba gang de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su brjod pa'i
17a4(dkon brtsegs): go cha chen po de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la mchis par bdag gis sngan chad ma thos lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
17a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras/ pa bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
17a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi 'khrugs pa des go cha chen po gang bgos na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa'i smon lam chen po dang go cha chen po de bgos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
17a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya
17a8(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag gi nang na yang nyung ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/ yon tan gang
17b1(dkon brtsegs): dag dang ldan pa'i yon tan de dag ni bskal pa bzang po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yang med do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
17b2(dkon brtsegs): spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
17b3(dkon brtsegs): po dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa
17b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis nga da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur bar lung
17b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra / bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs
17b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa no// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur cing / sa chen po de yang rnam
17b7(dkon brtsegs): pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'di ltar g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg par gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i
17b8(dkon brtsegs): bu dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
18a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur cing / sa chen po 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'di ltar g.yos rab tu g.yos// kun tu rab tu g.yos// 'gul rab tu 'gun
18a2(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg par gyur pa bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des
18a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mo la drugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ shing ljon pa dang / 
18a4(dkon brtsegs): rtswa dang shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa lung bstan pa ga la ba de logs su bdud/ rab tu
18a5(dkon brtsegs): bdud mngon par rab tu btsud par gyur te/ sha ra d+hA ti'i bu per na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen
18a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dri na/ shing ljon pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyis
18a7(dkon brtsegs): dgal du logs su bdud/ rab tu bdud/ mngon par rab tu btud par gyur pa bzhin no// she ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan
18a8(dkon brtsegs): chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mo 'jugs pa de/ blan med pa yang dgardzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung brtan pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi langs den myeng
18b1(dkon brtsegs): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / rnam pa' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang ni ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gang dag 'jod pa de dag thams cad kyis ruH/ 
18b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'a drugs pa lung bstan pa ga la ba de logs su bral me sbyar ba btud nas/ phyag 'tshal zhing 'jug par gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas blan med pa yang dag par
18b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 
18b4(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang / rnam par lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po ngang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gang dag 'khod pa de dag/ thams cad kyis ngag la ba de legs su thar mi sbyang ba btud nas
18b5(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par gyur pa bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems
18b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na bud med sbrum mar gyur pa de dag
18b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang de'i tshe bde zhing bkra shis par btsas par gyur to// sems can gang dag long bar gyur pa de dag kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to// sems can 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos
18b8(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// sems can smos pa rnams kyang dran pa rnyed par gyur to// sems can dbang po thams cad ma tshang ba rnams kyi dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas
19a1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
19a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di na/ bud med sbrum par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de'i tshe bde zhing bkra shis par bcas par gyur/ sems can long ba rnams kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur/ sems can 'on pa rnams
19a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur/ sems can smos pa rnams kyang dran pa rnyed par gyur/ sems can dbang po thams cad ma tshang ba rnams kyang dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur pa bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
19a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dang / sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag
19a5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na de'i tshe sems can 'ag/ btsam yang gshis ngan du 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur pa med
19a6(dkon brtsegs): de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyas pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
19a7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'di na de'i tshe/ sems can 'ga' tsam yang gshis ngan du 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur pa med pa bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
19a8(dkon brtsegs): nga'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
19b1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams drer lha'i dri bsung yid du 'ong ba dag kyang byung bar gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad/ 
19b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lha'i dri bsung yid du 'ong ba dag byung bar gyur pa bzhin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
19b3(dkon brtsegs): la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kye ma byang chub sems dpa' chen po mo 'khrugs pa de ni/ de ltar lung bstun pa nyid na/ yon tan de lta bu dag dang
19b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur pa las na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni yon tan gyi chos chen po dang ldan pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis cha
19b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dA/ ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom/ pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des
19b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de lung bstan pa na/ yon tan brjod pa de dag nyi rtsar yang mazad de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
19b7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa de ni yon tan mtha' yas pa gzhan dag gi pha rol tu phyin par gyur pa yang yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
19b8(dkon brtsegs): spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
20a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams na lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad sems dga' ba dang / sems nyams bde bar gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i du dper na/ 
20a2(dkon brtsegs): ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ lha dang / 
20a3(dkon brtsegs): mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad sems dga' ba dang / sems kyi nyams bde bar gyur pa bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
20a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i
20a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnod sbyin gyi dag po lag na rdo rje gang dag 'khod pa de dag/ thams cad de'i phyi bzhin du drang bar gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu
20a6(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ 
20a7(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rje gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur pa bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
20a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
20b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams na lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
20b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la mchod pa byas pa'i phyir/ lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / gdug pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logs su gtor rab tu gtor
20b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rab tu gtor bar gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong
20b4(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag
20b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lha'i me tog dang / spos dang bdug pa dag gis ngag la ba de logs su gter/ rab tu gtor mngon par rab tu gter bar gyur pa bzhin no// 
20b6(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par
20b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ mi bye ba drag nyi shu dang / lha bye ba phrag sum cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
20b8(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas/ de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// 
21a1(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de
21a2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / kun nu dA dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis
21a3(dkon brtsegs): kun tu khebs par gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ me tog
21a4(dkon brtsegs): ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis dbyang chub kyi snying po kun tu khebs par gyur pa bzhin no// ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
21a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ 
21a6(dkon brtsegs): lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dog steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lha'i gos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
21a7(dkon brtsegs): du ma dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa lung bstan pa ga la bde logs su bor nas/ tshig 'di skad ces kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa
21a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig ces smras so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub mngon
21b1(dkon brtsegs): bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ ngal mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lha'i gos bye ba
21b2(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dgang ga la bde logs su bor ba bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po nges
21b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i lha dang / mi dang lham
21b4(dkon brtsegs): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga' bar gyur pa tsam du/ pha ma dag phul dga' ba ma yin te/ sha radwa ti'i bu dper na dngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
21b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
21b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dga' bar gyur pa tsam du pha ma dag bu la dga' ba ma yin pa bzhin no// / bam po gnyis pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin
21b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
21b8(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa dang / 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ lha dang mi gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
22a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po ma 'khrugs pa de lung bstan pa thos par gyur to// de la lung bstan pa thos nas kyang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag sbyin ning bsod nams dag byung byed/ 
22a2(dkon brtsegs): de'adi lta ste/ daza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / rlung rnam pa sna tshogs dge sbyin babyin par gyur te// sha dra ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba bani basbyin rnas chus kyi khri nyal gu lu da'i chu rkyen gyi chen// 
22a3(dkon brtsegs): 'do pa'i kharas kyi sems can rnams sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing / bsod nams dag rjong do/ ba' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang rnam pasna tshogs dag gis sbyin pa gtong bar byed do// 'dra ti'i bu de bzhim
22a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'is sa rgyas spyan chen po ngas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mo'i thugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
22a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i rtsi/ rten gyi khams de'i 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can rnams kyang sbyin pa dag sbyin ning bsod nams ngag byed de/ bza' ba dang / 
22a6(dkon brtsegs): bca' ba dang / myang ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi sbyin pa byed par gyur to// lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams kyis kyang / lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong dag mngon par rab tu dkrol nas/ a la la zhes
22a7(dkon brtsegs): caco dang / gna'i sgra dag kyang phyung bar gyur to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de lung bstan pa na/ de lta bu yon tan dag dang ldan par gyur te// de skad ces
22a8(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
22b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa zhib mos 'di ltar legs par gsungs pa de dag ni ngo mtshar te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul ni
22b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab lags so// bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab/ klu rnams kyi klu'i yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab/ las rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa yang
22b3(dkon brtsegs): sam gyis mi khyab lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des dang bo sems bskyed pa nyid nas yon tan gyi khyad par de lta bu dag yongs su
22b4(dkon brtsegs): zin cing / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa de'i lung bstan pa de yang bsam gyis mi khyab lags so// de skad ces
22b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha rat+na ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dade de/ bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ sha ra dwa
22b6(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i lung bstan pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 
22b7(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs tsam zhig mdor bsdus
22b8(dkon brtsegs): te/ gsungs par zad kyi rgya cher bstan pa ni ma yin no// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba
23a1(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' do byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa de dag ni / de bzhin
23a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas phyogs tsam zhig bstan pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i
23a3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo de'i phyir rna lhogs te nyon cig dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya cher ston par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'odangs la tshe dang
23a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bco dam ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed
23a5(dkon brtsegs): nga'i go cha'i yon tan dang phan yon mdor bsdus te bka' stsal lag sa na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjes su gzung ba'i slad du/ bcom
23a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su
23a7(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa dag shin tu legs par bstan cing rgya cher bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
23a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab mod kyi/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'on kyang phyogs tsam zhig bstan par byas/ de legs
23b1(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom
23b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des/ 'di snyam du na mkha'i khams ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid kyi/ bdag gis dam
23b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa ni gzhan du mi 'gyur bar bya'o zhes sems bskyed de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni ge cha chen po de lta bu'i go cha chen po bgos par gyur to// sha ra dwa ti'i
23b4(dkon brtsegs): bu ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pus/ go cha chen po bgos par gyur pa/ de lta bu'i go cha chen po dag bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ngas bskal pa bzang po'i
23b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang na gcig kyang yang dag pararjes su ma mthong ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i tog spyod pa gang yin pa de ni byang
23b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa'i spyod pa'i char nye bar mi 'gro ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des go cha chen po gang bgos par gyur pa'i go cha
23b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang
23b8(dkon brtsegs): po dag la yang med do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des/ de ltar brtan pa'i brtson 'grus chen po yang dag par blangs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
24a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga'/ 
24a2(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya ba na/ da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te// sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas mngon par shes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
24a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na gang gis lag pa'am/ rkang pa 'am/ mgo 'am/ mig gam/ yan lag dang / nying lag gang yang rung ba dag bslangs pa na ma byin pa gang yang
24a4(dkon brtsegs): med do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pra des/ dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang
24a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ kyi bar du nam yang klad pa na bar ma gyur/ rlung las gyur pa/ 'am/ mkhris pa las gyur pa 'am/ bad kan las gyur pa'am/ 
24a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad kyis thebs par ma gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems
24a7(dkon brtsegs): dnga'i spyad pa spyod pa na ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di yang byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma 'khrugs
24a8(dkon brtsegs): pade sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na des tshe rabs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so// thams cad du yang tshangs par spyod pa spyad cing
24b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du yang 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i ming de nyid du gyur nas/ de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag mngon sum du
24b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pa de dang der skyes par gyur to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ khang bzangs kyi steng nas khangs bzangs kyi steng du 'gro
24b3(dkon brtsegs): yang / rkang mthil gyis sa chen po la 'gro bar mi byed do// de khangs bzang mchog de dag gi steng du 'dug nas/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod cing med par 'gyur ro/ 
24b4(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs dpa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa
24b5(dkon brtsegs): na yang / des tshe rangs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam sa mnyes par byas shing / thugs byung bar ma byas so// thams cad du yang tshangs par spyod pa spyad cing / thams cad
24b6(dkon brtsegs): du yang 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i ming de nyid du gyur nas/ de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge mngon sum du bzhugs pa
24b7(dkon brtsegs): de dang der skyes par gyur kyang rkang mthil gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mi byed do// de chos gang dang gang ston pa de thams cad kyang pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las brtsams te chos ston gyi/ nyan thos kyi
24b8(dkon brtsegs): selas dbyims te// chos ston pa ni nyung ngo // gal te nyan thos kyis las brtsams te/ chos ston na yang / de thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las brgyas chos ston to// gal te rang sangs rgyas
25a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis las rtsams te chos ston na yang / debams cad pa rol tu phyin pa nyid las brtsams te chos ston to// des pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te chos brtan pas sems/ 
25a2(dkon brtsegs): can rnams byang chub la btul cing bcud de/ rab tu bkod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams nas/ de dag la yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug// yang dag
25a3(dkon brtsegs): par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/ sha ra dwa ti'i du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/ sngon byang chub
25a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha che na po de lta bu dang ldan par gyur to// de chos kyi sbyin pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
25a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngos te/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med/ pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/ 
25a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos bstan pa 'di nyan par gyur cig/ thos nas kyang 'dzin pa
25a7(dkon brtsegs): dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed par 'gyur zhing / gzhan dag la sa rgyar yang dag par rab tu ston par gyur cig/ tshe rabs rjes nas kyang / chos de dag mi rjed par gyur cig/ ci ltar bdag
25a8(dkon brtsegs): da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba bzhin du/ der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'dral sangs rgyas kyi zhing
25b1(dkon brtsegs): gang dang gang du smon par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag du skye bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
25b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams dang mi 'dral bar gyur cig/ gang dag dga' ldan gyi gnas su skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
25b3(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni chos nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma pa rnams ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas/ lus tha mas ma'i glo g.yas pa nas mngal du skye bar 'gyur
25b4(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma pa dag skye ba nas chen po yang g.yo bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
25b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po srid pa tha ma pa'i rnam pa ni 'di dag yin/ rtags ni 'di dag/ yin/ mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byung / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma pa ni ma'i
25b6(dkon brtsegs): mngal du zhugs pa na mi gtsang ba dri nga bas gos par mi 'gyur/ der yid du mi 'thad pa'i dri dag kyang tshor ba mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' mngal na 'dug pa na yang na mkha' la gnas so// 
25b7(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rnal 'byol sprod pa'i dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ni khang pa brtsegs pa 'am/ khang pa brtsegs pa rgyud mor zhugs nas/ bar snang gyi na mkha' la mngon par
25b8(dkon brtsegs): 'phags shing spyod lam gyis gnas par byed kyang / khang pa brtsegs pa de la reg pa med do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ma'i mngal na gnas pa/ na mkha' la
26a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'phags nas gnas te/ mngar gyi dri ma dang mi gtsang 'dring bas mi gos par gnas shing / der yid la mi 'thad pa 'dri dag kyang tshor bar mi 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang
26a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di snyam du sems te/ ci ltar bdag da ltar
26a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa skyed pa na/ bdud thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pan/ sangs rgyas
26a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag byung ba de dag kyang bya chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nas/ nam bla na med pa yang dag
26a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa sa cad mtshad du glags mi rnyed par gyur cig/ 
26a6(dkon brtsegs): srid du byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis yon tan phun sum tshogs pa de dag yongs su zin par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi phyir spyod par gyur cig snyam mo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das
26a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par ma mam kya 'khrugs pa dre/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ chos ston pa 'am/ chos nyan pa'i tshachal na dga' yang de'i lus la ngal pa'am/ 
26a8(dkon brtsegs): sengs ma par gyur med do// tsu byor zhen// gang du gying lta na ga shegs pa des semam myeng nas brgyas/ byang chub sems pa'i dud pa spyod na/  kyi su
26b1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing chos nyan/ 
26b2(dkon brtsegs): pan 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar bdag da ltar chos 'dod pa de bzhin du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de no// sems can rnams
26b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang chos mi 'dod par mi 'gyur zhing / chos 'dod par gyur cig snyam mo// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las mi 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa yongs su brjod pa
26b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ste le'u dang po rdzogs s+ho// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
26b5(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/ rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
26b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag ni legs par bka' stsal lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ da yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
26b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i da ltar gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa mchis pa rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan du gsol// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
26b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan bkod pa thos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bgyi ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
27a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la yang blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / mnyes par bgyi ba'i slad du 'dun pa skye bar 'gyur ba
27a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs pa dag gis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi ning de'i yon tan dkod pa thos na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
27a3(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / mnyes par bgyi ba'i snad du/ bdun pa skye bar
27a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so// sha ra dwa ti'i
27a5(dkon brtsegs): bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs nga'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa
27a6(dkon brtsegs): yod pa 'dri bar sems pa ni yang khyod legs so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
27a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yod pa bshad par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
27a8(dkon brtsegs): no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
27b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis deng nas zhag bdun na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon/ 
27b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar shes nas/ sems can de dag thams cad kha zas kyi 'du shes kun tu 'byung bar ma gyur to// bkres pa'i 'du shes ma byung / skom pa'i 'du shes ma byung / mal du nyal ba'i 'du shes ma
27b3(dkon brtsegs): byung / lus dang sems ngal ba'i 'du shes ma byung gi/ gzhan du na sems can de dag thams cad bde ba'i 'du shes dang ldan par gyur te/ dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba'i 'du shes dang / sems rang
27b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems kyi nyams bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhi/ nu gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
27b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyad pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis de dag thams cad kyis kyang / de lta bu'i yon tan dag yongs su zin par gyur pa'i phyir ro// 
27b6(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de ni mi gang dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis/ deng nas zhag bdun na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
27b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shes nas/ de dag 'khrig pa spyod pa'i 'du shes
27b8(dkon brtsegs): kun tu mi 'byung bar gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub
28a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis gyur pa'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
28a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
