169b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa
169b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi sku tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa re re thub par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang yon tan tshad med pa bsags pa las mngon par grub pa yin no zhes lung bstan to// byang chub sems
169b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lung bstan pa thob pas rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to// blo gros mtha'
169b8(dkon brtsegs): yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'thob par 'dod pas rab tu dga' ba dang / brtson 'grus chen po bskyed nas/ lus dang
170a1(dkon brtsegs): srog la phangs pa med pa dang / bag yod pas mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don gyi blo gros
170a2(dkon brtsegs): shes bya ba 'dus par gyur pa de 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams
170a3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi ye shes la thabs mkhas pa 'thob par bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa thob par bgyi ba'i slad du chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag
170a4(dkon brtsegs): par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar che lags so// bcom ldan 'ad/ sa gal te chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob par gyur na/ gdon mi 'tshal bar chos rnams kyi tshul la/ 
170a5(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pa thob nas myur du byang chub kyi snying por mchi bar 'gyur bas/ yon tan gyi rgya mtsho dpag tu ma mchis pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab
170a6(dkon brtsegs): tu gzhol bar bgyid pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams mthong zhing nan tan gyis chos yang dag par mthong bar bsgrub pa dang / dge 'dun dang spyod pa mtshungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa chen
170a7(dkon brtsegs): po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
170a8(dkon brtsegs): don gyi blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin du don gyi blo gros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi rgya
170b1(dkon brtsegs): mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par gyur na/ yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa tshad med pa rnams rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// gal te chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la
170b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas par gyur na/ chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la thabs la mkhas pas gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro// don gyi blo
170b3(dkon brtsegs): gros 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab rin po che sna tshogs las mngon par grub pas/ rgya mtsho chen po las dpag tshad brgyad khro ba ni stong gis gyen du 'phags shing mchog tu gsal bar gnas so// 
170b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang de bzhi ngan du ting nge 'dzin 'dis legs par gzhol bar byed pa'i phyir nga chos kyi gter gyi rgya mtsho chen po thams cad las mngon par
170b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags nas lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon cing bla na med cing gnas pas mchog tu/ gsal bar gan no// gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
170b6(dkon brtsegs): ni skar ma'i tshogs mang pos yongs su bskor ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang de bzhin du lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad du rab
170b7(dkon brtsegs): tu gsal bar gnas so// don gyi blo gros khyod kyis chos 'di thos par gyur na/ 'di la su yang dga' zhing mos pa mi skye ba 'am/ brtson 'grus mi bskyed pa 'am/ bag yod pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba/ 
170b8(dkon brtsegs): gang yang med par blta bar bya ste/ sems can bsod nams chung zhing dman pa la mos pa ni ma gtogs so// sems can gang shes rab dang ldan pa dag gis ni chos rgya chen po 'di mngon par bsgrub
171a1(dkon brtsegs): par byed la/ chos rgya chen po mngon par bsgrub pa gang yin pa de dag ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis yongs su bachu bar 'gyur te/ ngas dri nang
171a2(dkon brtsegs): du gang gis chos kyi nor rgya chen po 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni lha dang mi rnams kyis yongs su bsrung zhing rim gro byed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems
171a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams kyis rjes su dgongs par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa lta bu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces
171a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po gang ches kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan tan gyis bsgrub cing slob par byed pa de dag ni sems can
171a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la phan par byed cing the tshom thams cad rab tu sel ba dang / 'dud pa thams cad rab tu dgrol ba dang / bag chags rnams spong ba dang / bag la nyal ba rnams gcod pa
171a6(dkon brtsegs): dang sred pa'i dga' ba rnams las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sred pa'i rgya mtsho las yang dag par brgal ba dang / mun nag rnams gtan du bsal ba dang / skrag cing 'jigs pa rnams
171a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu spong ba dang / thabs mkhas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rab tu shes par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'od zer chen po bkye bas/ 
171a8(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer des 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa gsal bar mdzad cing / nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zer thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan to// 'od zer bkye nas yang / byang chub sems dpa'
171b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la nan tan
171b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis sgrub par byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul chen po rab tu ston cing 'od zer chen po 'gyed pa dang / seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags nas chos 'di yang dag par ston par byed pas khams
171b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum las yang dag par 'das shing snang ba chen po byed par 'gyur te/ deng nga ji lta ba bzhin pas bye brag tu gyur pa ci yang med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems
171b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs nas slad ma'i dus kyi tshe/ 
171b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang yon tan dpag tu ma mchis par 'thob par/ 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das
171b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos kyis rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir yang 'od zer chen po rab tu bkye'o// gzhan yang phyag sor gcig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams rab tu
171b7(dkon brtsegs): g.yo bar mdzad pas sems can rnams bde ba chen po thob par gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor der 'dus pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
171b8(dkon brtsegs): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams lha'i me tog dam pa dang / lha'i gos dam pa dag gis mngon par gtor nas/ dus gcig tu lha'i rol mo rnams byas so// lha tshad
172a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa rnams kyis kyang lha'i gos rgyang nas mngon par gtor nas namakha' kun tu gang bar gyur te/ skad 'thun par 'di skad du kye ma sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni bsam gyis
172a2(dkon brtsegs): khyab po// gang gis chos zab mo 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni sems can thams cad kyis gus par mchod cing phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur par rig par bya'o zhes smras so// de nas bcom
172a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros mtha' yas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gang bsod nams chung ba'i sems
172a4(dkon brtsegs): can de dag gis ni go cha bkod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi bkod pa/ 'di thos par mi 'gyur gyi/ sems can gang thabs mkha sa pa dang ldan pa dang / tshigs chen po yongs su sdud pa gang
172a5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de dag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos 'di thos par 'gyur/ ro// chos 'di la gang gis nan tan du sgrub par byed pa de/ dag ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis
172a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// blo gros mtha' yas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jigs pa chen po byung ba'i tshe/ nga'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la sogs pa la yongs su gtad do// ngas bskal pa bye ba khrag
172a7(dkon brtsegs): khrig grangs med pa nas bla na med pa'i chos kyi gter rab tu bsags pas yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i bde ba thob pa gang yin pa de dag khyod kyis kyang 'thob par 'gyur gyis// 
172a8(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad khyod kyis rab tu bstan te/ yon tan gyi rgya mtsho dpag tu med pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar bya'o// de nas byang chub
172b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga brgya dang / khyim bdag ma smad pa dang / tshong dpon bzang skyong la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa rnam/ 
172b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams mthu ci mchis pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chubo chen po'i chos yongs su bzung nas/ 
172b3(dkon brtsegs): slad ma'i dus kyi tshe sems can rnams la phan gdags par bdag cag gsol to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dug pa stan las langs te/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs
172b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor nas lus kyi dgos mchog dam pa phud de mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dge ba'i
172b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba 'di sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngos te/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshe
172b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub par 'gyur ba dang / slad ma'i dus kyi tshe sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar smon
172b7(dkon brtsegs): lam 'debs lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu dga' bskyed pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad
172b8(dkon brtsegs): de bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad kun la ni// phan pa chen po bya ba'i phyir// nga yi byang chub chos bzung nas// chos rgyal seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing // mo 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe// gang / 
173a1(dkon brtsegs): zhig chos ni yongs tshol ba// rgya chen chos 'di thos 'gyur na// thams cad bde ba 'thob par 'gyur// ngas ni ji skad bstan pa bzhin// gang zhig theg pa 'di mthong bzhin// 
173a2(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde chos 'di thos 'gyur na// ji ltar mos pa'i bde ba 'thob// blo dang ldan pa gang zhig gis// thabs mkhas dag ni rab bsgoms te// chos mchog 'di na thos gyur na// lus dang sems
173a3(dkon brtsegs): ni rab bder 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor 'dir 'dus gyur pa// nga yis mngon sum bshad mthong dang // chos 'di thos par gyur nas ni// rab tu dga' ba gang bskyed pa// ma 'ongs tha ma dus
173a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshe// khyod kyis bsod nams tshad med pa'i// phung po dag ni rab bskyed cing // 'khor ba mtha' med sgrol bar 'gyur/ ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe// chos rjes rab tu gsungs pa
173a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ chos 'di gang zhig 'dzin byed pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bzung bar 'gyur// ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe// nga yi/ byang chub chos 'dzin pa// de ni sangs rgyas tshad med pa'i// tha ma
173a6(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi chos 'dzin 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'di bstan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa snyed mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to// sems can tshad med pa snyed ni dge ba'i
173a7(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
173a8(dkon brtsegs): chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bskyed do// 'phags pa dkon mchog
173b1(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ go cha'i bkod pa bstan pa'i 'dus pa ste 'dus pa bdun pa rdzogs so// 
173b2(dkon brtsegs): lotsAb mgos chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur ba'o// @// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+harmA d+hA tu pra kri ta~M a sam b+he nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
173b3(dkon brtsegs): pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med par bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
173b4(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' bar na dge slong
173b5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs tha dad pa nas 'dus pa khri nyas stong dang / lha'i bu thams cad kyang bla na med
173b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sum khri nyis stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu rin chen mchog ces bya
173b7(dkon brtsegs): ba yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la chos ston par bskul
173b8(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad de/ bskul nas kyang bshad la/ ci nas kyang bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa bkong bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud sdig can yid chad par 'gyur ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu char/ 
174a1(dkon brtsegs): gcod par 'gyur ba dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can thams cad nga rgyal med cing shes pa brda' sprod par 'gyur ba dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dag 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / 
174a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu thob pa dag kyang khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi gdung rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir/ skye bo mang po dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba/ 
174a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di yang yun ring du gnas pa dang / rgyas par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs sam yongs
174a4(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ chos bstan pa de gang dag gis thos par gyur pa de dag theg pa gang la mos pas myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston
174a5(dkon brtsegs): notsom rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu rin chen mchog gi sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ 'jam dpol gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
174a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal 'khor 'di khyod las chos nyan pa thos par 'dod kyis 'khor 'di dag la gtam gyi rgyud 'ga' zhig la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom
174a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ci las brtsams te spobs par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las rtsoms la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ 
174a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin brjod pa'am mnyan par
174b1(dkon brtsegs): cung zad kyang rngo mi thog lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las brtsams te bstan par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos bas/ 
174b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di thos na gang zag mngon pa'i nga rgyal can dag ni skrag par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag skrag par 'gyur ba de dag kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin
174b3(dkon brtsegs): can lags pas na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni skrag par mi 'gyur lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal
174b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang med la/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yang med
174b5(dkon brtsegs): na/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam bar byang po ci las 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byis pa so so'i skye
174b6(dkon brtsegs): bo 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i phyin ci log gis bslad cing ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa rnams la ni bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes 'byung ngo // bdag dang gzhon gyi 'du shes pa/ 
174b7(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa de dag la ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba dag 'byung ste/ sems can dang sems las byung ba'i chos de dag gis dge pa dang mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du
174b8(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dag mngon par 'du byed cing de dag la rgyu de dang rkyen de dang ngo bo nyid de'i rnam par smin pa nyid mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dag gis ji tsam du srid pa'i 'gro bar
175a1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba yongs su bzung ba de tsam du kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid yin pas kun
175a2(dkon brtsegs): nas nyon mongs pa nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de nyid rnam par byang ba zhes bya ste/ don dam par ni de la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ 
175a3(dkon brtsegs): gang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ci yang med do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can brgya len
175a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzho na nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyed kyis
175a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol te/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings ni khyod las
175a6(dkon brtsegs): khyad par 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin sngon bcings par gyur la/ dgrol ba zhig yin snyam 'am/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal
175a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni sngon bcings par gyur pa yang ma yin la da grol bar yang ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'o na dge slong de dag gi sems ci zhig las rnam par grol/ 
175a8(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos mang po btul te/ de dag gi sems ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
175b1(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ kho bo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
175b2(dkon brtsegs): ci khyod kyi sems len pa med par zag pa rnams las rnam par grol lam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal rnam par grol lo// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci khyod kyi sems 'das pa rnam par grol
175b3(dkon brtsegs): lam/ 'on te ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par grol/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems 'das pa ni zad pa'i mtshan nyid yin la/ sems ma 'ongs pa ni ma thob pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ sems
175b4(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba na mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyi sems rnam par grol ba de gang yin tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
175b5(dkon brtsegs): sems 'das pa yang rnam par grol ba ma yin la// mdza pa dang / da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// 'jam dang gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA rarAdwa ti'i bu rtson khyod kyi sems rnam
175b6(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba de gang yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal kun rdzob rnam par gzhag pas sems rnam par grol bar bstan par zad kyi don dam par ni 'di la gang bcings pa'am grol ba'i sems dmim
175b7(dkon brtsegs): su med do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sh+tsA dzA ti'i bu khyod chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la kun rdzob dang don dam pa yod par 'dod dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings kyi
175b8(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin la ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa dmigs su med do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'o na ji ltar kun rdzob rnam par gzhag pas sems rnam par grol bar ston/ 
176a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam yang sems rnam par grol ba ci yang med dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu gal te sems shig nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ 
176a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyi ga'i bar na dmigs su yod na ni sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems ni nang ngam phyi rol lam/ gnyi ga med par yang dmigs su med pas de la bcings
176a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ rnam par grol ba ci yang med do// de nas 'khor de las dge slong nyis brgyas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos pa dang stan las langs te dong nas tshig 'di skad ces
176a4(dkon brtsegs): smras te/ gal te 'di la su la yang rnam par grol ba med cing su yang rnam par grol na/ 'u bu cag gi rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po la don ci zhig yod
176a5(dkon brtsegs): gal te nges par 'byung ba ci yang med na lam bsgom pa la/ don ci zhig yod ces dge slong de dag smod cing yi chad/ nas 'khor de nas dong ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
176a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas dge slong de dag 'dul ba'i dbang rig nas lam gang nas dge slong de dag dong ba'i lam de'i mdun du sprul pa'i dge slong zhig sprul to// de nas dge slong de dag sprul pa'i dge slong dag
176a7(dkon brtsegs): la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sprul pa'i dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa khyod ga las 'ongs/ de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// 
176a8(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bston pa la ma zhugs/ ma shes/ ma mos/ yid ma ches nas kho bo 'khor de nas song ngo // de nas dge slong nyis brgya po de
176b1(dkon brtsegs): dag gis kyang 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo cag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pa la ma zhugs/ ma shes/ ma mos/ yid ma ches nas/ kho bo cag 'khor de nas
176b2(dkon brtsegs): dong ngo // de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des dge slong nyis brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gi 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pa la mi mthun pa ci zhig thos
176b3(dkon brtsegs): nas khyed cag 'khor de nas dong / de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pa ni 'di la su yang thob pa med/ mngon par rtogs pa med/ rnam par grol ba med par ston
176b4(dkon brtsegs): pas kho bo cag 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te 'di la su yang thob pa med/ mngon par rtogs pa med/ rnam par grol ba med na/ 'o bu cag gi rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge
176b5(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dngos po la don ci yod/ 'o bu cag gi tshangs par smra/ da pa la gnas pa la don ci yod/ gal te 'di la nges par 'byung ba ci yang med na/ lam bsgom pa la don ci yod/ 
176b6(dkon brtsegs): snyam du bsams nas/ kho bo cag 'khor de nas dong ngo // de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed cag ma mos nas dong bar zad dam/ 'on
176b7(dkon brtsegs): te spangs shing mi snyan par brjod nas dong / de dag gis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni ma mos nas dong bar zad kyi/ kho bo cag gis spangs pa yang med la/ mi snyan par brjod pa yang med do// de nas sprul
176b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dge slong des dge slong de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ 'di skad ces kyang smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag rtsod pa med pa ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi mchog yin pas mi snyan par brjod par mi bya/ 
177a1(dkon brtsegs): brtsad par mi bya'i/ re shig je 'gro bar bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag ci sems 'di sngon po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ ser po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ dmar po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ dkar po
177a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba zhig gam/ bcod ka zhes bya ba zhig gam/ shel gyi kha dog lta bu zhes bya ba zhig gam/ yang dag pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/ yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/ rtag pa zhes bya ba zhig
177a3(dkon brtsegs): gam/ mi rtag pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/ gzugs can zhes bya ba zhig gam/ gzugs can ma yin pa zhes bya ba zhig gam zhes rtogs shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sems ni gzugs can

177a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dag ci gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ snang ba med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ gnas med pa/ rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i sems de nang na gnas so zhes bya ba
177a6(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ phyi rol na gnas so zhes bya ba 'am/ gnyi ga'i bar na gnas so zhes bya bar dmigs su yod snyam 'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gal te sems de gzugs can
177a7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ bstan du med pa/ snang ba med/ thogs pa med/ gnas med/ rnam par rig byed ma yin/ nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang med/ gnyi ka med par yang dmigs su med na/ ci de la yang
177a8(dkon brtsegs): dag par yongs su grub pa yod snyam 'am/ de dag gis smras pa/ de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gang yang dag pa ma yin zhing yongs su grub pa ma yin zhing yongs su grub pa ma
177b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de la ci rnam par grol ba yod snyam 'am/ de dag gis smras pa/ de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de las bsams nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad du chos kyi dbyings kyi
177b2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin la ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang med la/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yang med do zhes bstan to// tshe dang ldan pa dag yang byis pa so so'i skye ba phyin ci log gis bslad pa rnams la
177b3(dkon brtsegs): ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa 'byung ngo // ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas te/ rtag tu yul rnams la spyod cing gnas pa de dag la ni dmigs pa las byung
177b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems 'byung ste/ dmigs pa zad na zad par 'gyur la byung nas zhig cing zhu ste gnas pa med do// sems kyi dmi gas pa gang gis rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge
177b5(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dngos por 'gyur ba dang / lam sgom par byed pa'i sems de ni rang bzhin gyis med pa dang / yang dag pa ma/ yin pa dang / byung ba ma yin pa'o// med pa dang / yang
177b6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ma yin pa dang / byung ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ skye ba yang med/ 'jig pa yang med/ gnas pa yang med do// gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa med pa
177b7(dkon brtsegs): de la ni bcings pa yang med/ rnam par grol ba yang med do// de la ni thob pa yang med/ mngon par rtogs pa yang med de/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de las bsams nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
177b8(dkon brtsegs): pas 'di skad du chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang med/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yang med de/ 'di la ni su la yang theb pa med/ mngon par rtogs pa yang
178a1(dkon brtsegs): med/ rnam par grol ba yang med do zhes smras so// de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam
178a2(dkon brtsegs): bar grol lo// de dag sems rnam par grol nas 'jam dpa' gnon nur gyur pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / rang rang gi bla gos 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la mngon par bkapa nas tshig nga / 
178a3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces kyang smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis ni kho bo cag yongs su bskyabs so// 'di ltar kho bo cag kyang dam pa'i chos spong bar ma zhugs pas nga phyin chad chos 'dul ba zab mo la 'jug pa las phyi
178a4(dkon brtsegs): rol du gyur pa ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gis ci zhig thob cing ci zhig mngon par rtogs na/ rang rang
178a5(dkon brtsegs): gi bla gos 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la mngon par bka'/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo cag rga/ san tse yang thob pa med cing mngon par rtogs pa med pas de
178a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir kho bo cag gis rang rang gi bla gos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur la mngon par bkab po// btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi tshe kho bo cag la thob pa'i 'du shes yod par gyur pa de'i tshe na kho bo cag stan las
178a7(dkon brtsegs): langs te 'khor de nas dong ngo // gang gi tshe kho bo cag thob pa'i 'du shes de dang bral bar gyur pa'i tshe slar lhags so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed ci las bsams te de skad smra/ 
178a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor thob pa zhes bya ba de ni g.yo ba yin no// de ni rlom sems yin te/ gang la g.yo ba yod pa dang / rlom sems yod pa de la ni thob pa med cing mngon par
178b1(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa med do// btsun pa rab 'byor gang la thob pa med cing mngon par rtogs pa med pa de ni rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
178b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dag khyed cag sus btul/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa dang gang skye ba med pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa
178b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa med pa des btul to// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed cag btul ba yin nam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'jam dpa
178b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa la dris shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dgu' 'bros 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag sus btul/ 'jam dpal
178b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo gang la phung po rnams med/ pa dang / khams rnams med pa dang / skye mched rnam/ sa med pa dang / gang so so'i skye bo ma yin pa dang / slob pa
178b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa dang / mi slob pa ma yin pa dang / nyan thos ma yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin pa dang / gang lus dang ldan po ma yin pa dang / ngag dang
178b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ma yin pa dang / sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa dang / bral ba ma yin pa des btul to// smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ston pa de su zhig/ 'jam dpal
178b8(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa zhig sprul na de mtshungs par ldan pa yin snyam 'am/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal don chos gang dang yang
179a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' de chos thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam
179a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal de de bzhin no// 'jam dngal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo dag slong 'di dag ni sprul pas btul ba yin te/ sprul pa'i 'dul ba ci dra bar nyan thos thams cad kyi 'dul ba yang de 'a
179a3(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa kun dga' bo gang dag de ltar btul ba de dag ni yang dge par brtul ba yin no// gang dag chos 'dul ba 'di la mos par mi byed pa de dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o// de nas/ 
179a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na dge/ sgong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya/ 'jam dpal
179a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di la dge slong tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par rnam sems su byed pa ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// 
179a6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par rlom sems su byed pa ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du
179a7(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya'o// bdag gis thob bo// bdag gis mngon sum du byas so snyam du sems shing / rlom sems su byed pa dang / yongs su rtog par byed pa de ni nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal can
179a8(dkon brtsegs): du shes par bya'o// 'jig tshogs la lta bas skrag cing bgrod pa gtsog pa'i lam gyi ro myong bar byed pa ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid gang gis 'jin
179b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs la lta ba spong ba'i stong pa nyid des bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam yang stong pa'i phyir te/ stong pa de lta bu la stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par mi 'jug pa ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// 
179b2(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang dge slong gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam gyi stong pa nyid de la stong pa nyid kyis mnyam par byed pa ni lhag
179b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/ 'jig tshegs la lta ba yang gzhan ma yin te/ 'jig tshogs la
179b4(dkon brtsegs): lta ba nyid stong pa nyid yin pa dang / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma mo nal lam yang gzhan ma yin te/ lam nyid stong du yin pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang dge
179b5(dkon brtsegs): slong gang ma rig ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pas 'jigs shing ma rig pa las rnam par grol ba'i ro myong bar byed/ pa ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir na
179b6(dkon brtsegs): na gang la gnyis su 'du shes 'jug pa de ni rnam par grol ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang dge slong gang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis skrag cing
179b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag gi ro myong bar byed pa dang / phyin ci log bzhis skrag cing 'du shes bzhi'i ro myang bar byed pa dang / sgrib pa lngas skrag cing dbang po lnga'i ro myang bar byed pa dang / ske
179b8(dkon brtsegs): mched drug gis skrag cing mngon par shes pa drug gi ro myang bar byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas bdun gyis skrag cing byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ro myang bar byed pa dang / log pa nyid brgyad kyi/ 
180a1(dkon brtsegs): skrag cing 'phags pa'i lam brgyad pa'i ro myang bar byed pa dang / 'dus byas kyi dngos po dgus skrag cing / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ri myang bar byed pa dang / 
180a2(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis skrag cing mi slob pa'i chos bcu'i ro myang bar byed pa dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyis skrag cing 'dus ma byas kyi khams dag gi ro myang bar byed pa ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can
180a3(dkon brtsegs): du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo de dag thams cad ni g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang spros pa yin te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo ji tsam du g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / spros pa
180a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems mtho ba dang dma' ba dang 'dzin pa dang / spong ba dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / rten pa dang / lhag par zhen pa dang / sgro 'dogs pa yod pa de tsam du lhag par byed pa dang ldan
180a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yin pa'i phyir te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo na lta bus dge slong ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo 'dus byas
180a6(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa dang / stong pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid du mi 'jug pa ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir/ 
180a7(dkon brtsegs): ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa
180a8(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo gang gi tshe dge slong nang nye bar zhi bas yul thams can nye bar zhi bar mthong zhing mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'am/ mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'am/ rig pa zhes bya ba'am/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba 'am/ dmigs
180b1(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba'am/ mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas shes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas shes pa bar rlom sems su mi byed/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ gnyis su 'byed pa ma/ 
180b2(dkon brtsegs): byed/ gcig tu sdud par mi byed/ len par mi byed/ 'dor bar mi byed/ 'phro bar mi byed/ mngon par zhen par mi byed cing / chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su
180b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong la/ mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa med par mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pas mnyam par bya ba 'am/ mi mnyam par bya ba'i chos gang yang med de/ mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de yang yang
180b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing rlom sems su mi byed rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ mngon par zhen par yang mi byed na/ thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs pa 'am/ mngon
180b5(dkon brtsegs): sum du bya bas rlom sems su byed pa lta ci smos te/ de na gnas/ med do// btsun pa kun dga' bo de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med cing gnyen po med pa dang / phyogs med pa dang / 
180b6(dkon brtsegs): rang gi phyogs dang / gzhan gyi phyogs dang bral ba dang / tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa dang / tshor ba dang / tshor ba med pa thams cad dang dmigs pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yid la byed pa
180b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang bral ba dang 'ching ba med pa dang / nye bar len pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin te/ de ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dang bral bas chos gang la yang spang/ 
180b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ mngon par rtogs pa 'am/ mngon sum du bya ba yod pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar zhugs pa'i dge slong ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// des ni na mkha'i kham
181a1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas na/ chos gang la yang dge ba zhes bya ba'am/ mi dge ba zhes bya ba'am/ kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba
181a2(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa zhes bya ba 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/ zag pa med pa zhes bya ba'am/ 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba'am/ 'dus byas shes
181a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'am/ 'dus ma byas shes bya bar sgro 'dogs par mi byed do// de ni sgro 'dogs pa med pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ yang dag par rjes su
181a4(dkon brtsegs): mi mthong ngo // des ni chos thams cad sgro btags pa med par mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam zhing na mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa yin no// btsun pa kun dga' bo gang de ltar
181a5(dkon brtsegs): mos pa'i dge slong ni yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ste/ de ltar na lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// de la dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du ji ltar na nam pa
181a6(dkon brtsegs): lag mthil la mi chags pa ltar/ dge sbyong gi chos kyang de bzhin no zhes gsungs so// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol
181a7(dkon brtsegs): lo// de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yang dag pa'i shes pa brda'
181a8(dkon brtsegs): spyod par byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems 'jig rten gsum po thams cad
181b1(dkon brtsegs): las khyad par 'phags pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang sa la rgya thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i sems de nang na gnas par yang mi mthong / phyi rol na yang ma yin/ gnyis ka med pa yang ma yin// 
181b2(dkon brtsegs): phyi rol gyi yul la rgyu zhing gnas par yang mi mthong la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir yang rgyu zhing / thams/ 
181b3(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang sems can gzhan rnams dang gang zag gzhan dag la brjod par byed la/ sems de yang yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par gyur te/ dris na sems kyi ngo bo ni
181b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs shing / sems/ can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi do debo nyid rtogs la/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dge ba'i/ 
181b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid babaspyod par byed pa de ni lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag
181b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes pa brda' spyod pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na gang gtong bar byed pa dang / gang gis gtong bar byed pa dang / gang la gtong bar byed pa dang / 
181b7(dkon brtsegs): gang du gtong bar byed pa dang / gang du yongs su bsngo bar byed pa de dag shin tu gtong bas gtong bar byed cing rten par mi byed/ gnas par mi byed/ mngon par zhen par mi byed/ re bar mi byed/ 
181b8(dkon brtsegs): dmigs par mi byed la/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas dris na shin tu gtong ba nyid dang / shin tu mi dmigs pa nyid dang / shin tu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag nyid gtong ba'i ngo bo nyid du
182a1(dkon brtsegs): rtogs shing / gtong ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis yang dag pa'i mdza'i ngo bo nyid rtogs la/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi ngo ma nyid rtogs te/ chos thams cad kyi/ 
182a2(dkon brtsegs): bo nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs shing / sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid brda' sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang
182a3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i shes pa brda' sprod pa sbyin pas yongs su dag pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas lus nye bar zhi bas tshul khrims nye bar zhi bar rtogs te/ ngag nye bar zhi ba dang / 
182a4(dkon brtsegs): sems nye bar ni ngas tshul khrims nye bar ni bar rtogs shing / lus dang ngag dang sems nye bar ni bas byang chub nye b.razhi bar rtogs la/ byang chub nye bar ni bas sems can nye ba na
182a5(dkon brtsegs): bar rtogs te/ sems can nye bzhipas chos thams cad nye b.razhi bar rtogs shing / chos thams cad nye bar zhi bas yang dag pa'i mtha' nye bar zhi ba zhes bya bar rtogs la/ de yang
182a6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i mtha'i nye bar zhi bas zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi bar gyur pas dris na/ chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba nyid du brda' sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i
182a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pas brda' sprod pa chub khrims kyis yongs su dag pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas shin tu zad pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu skad cig pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu ya ma
182a8(dkon brtsegs): brla'i chos nyid du rig nas/ sems can thams cad kyi nyes par byas pa yang bzed cing / gang gis phyi nang gi sems kun nas mi slong bar bzod pa dang / gang gis khong khro bar 'gyur bar yid la
182b1(dkon brtsegs): bye pa'i rol dumi gtong zhing / sems can thams cad kyi nyes par spyad bu bzod ba dang sems can de dag gi nga tsa nying gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i rib nyid yin pa dang / bzod papa ba nyid ga dzin
182b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni byang chub kyi ba nyid yin pa dang / byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo ba nyid yin par rtogs shing chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' nga ba nyid du rtogs te/ dris
182b3(dkon brtsegs): na shin tu zad pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu skad cig pa'i chos nyid dang / shin gyis ma brla'i chos nyid du rtogs pas rgyu ba med pa nyid kyis bzod pa brda' sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems
182b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brdab sprod pa bzang bas yongs sudag pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chubasems dpas yid la byed pa thams cad kyis dben pa'i chos
182b5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs shing sgra 'dogs pa med la btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pas brtsam pa gang rtsom pa rdo dben pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang / de nang dben
182b6(dkon brtsegs): pas phyi rol tu rgyu ba med par sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rgyu zhing / brtson 'grus dben pas sems can dben par rtogs pa dang / sems can dben pas byang chub dben
182b7(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs pa dang / byang chub dben pas chos thams cad dben par rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad dben pas yang dag pa'i mtha' dben par rtogs pas dris na brtson 'grus de dag nyid kyi rang
182b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin dben pa ji lta ba bzhin du dben par brda' sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda' sprod pa brtson 'grus kyis yongs su dag pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan
183a1(dkon brtsegs): yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad mnyam ning bye brag med par gyur par bsam gtan byed de/ bsam gtan de la sems gnas par 'jog tsong gnas de la yang
183a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa gnas par mi byed pa dang / des rnam par shes pa mi gnas shing / sems mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid kyis
183a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid
183a4(dkon brtsegs): du rjes su rtogs pas de ltar chos thams cad mnyam pa zhes bya bar rig la dris na/ rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du brda' sprod par byed
183a5(dkon brtsegs): de lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes kha brda' spyod pa bsam gtan gyis yongs su dag pa yin no// lnga'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa
183a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi mig gis rnam par sbyangs pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad mthong ste/ ji ltar chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar mthong zhing gang gi tshe chos gang yang yang dag par rjes
183a7(dkon brtsegs): su mi mthong ba de'i tshe ci yang ma yin par 'gyur ro// de ci yang ma yin pa'i thob pas mi rgyu rab tu mi rgyu rnam par mi rgyu'o// des rgyu ba dang rab tu rgyu ba dang / rnam par rgyu ba thams cad yang dag par rgyun
183a8(dkon brtsegs): bcad pas mi 'khor ro// rnam par mi 'khor ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des gang gis 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i rab tu rgyu ba de 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa dang / chags pa dang / smon pa'i rgyun bcad pa'i phyir te/ 
183b1(dkon brtsegs): de rod bdon du gnyer ba thangs cad med pa sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsdu ba dang / dam pa' ches yongs sug tu ba dang / dgo
183b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir bsams bzhin du skye ba rnams su rgyu bar byed de/ de na rgyu ba med pa nyid kyis rgyu bar byed cing / chos rnams kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag par mtshanan
183b3(dkon brtsegs): nga rnam par 'jug pa 'i byed de/ den shes ba yin pa sa'i shes bkyiyang bzhin gyis bya chu tu shes pa dang / byang chu kyi dang bzhin gyis sems can gyi nga bzhin dang / mas
183b4(dkon brtsegs): can gyi rang bzhin gyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs shis chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin du shes te/ dros na chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa
183b5(dkon brtsegs): de nga ba spyod du byed de/  badzin kyang chub sems dngu'i yang dag nga'i shes pa brda' sprod pa shes hU~M/ tshig gis yongs su dag pa yin no// lha'i phu ga nanas
183b6(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / dran pa nye bar gnag pas gnas pa na/ des sngon gyi mtha' lus ni ma skyes par rab tu shes so// phyi ma'i mtha'i lus ni 'pho ba med
183b7(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu shes so// da ltar byung ba'i lus la ni rba dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / bong ba dang / mig sor gyi ngo bo nyid lta bur so sor rtog par byed de/ de de ltar lus la lus kyi rjes su lha 'i
183b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas lus kyi rang bzhin sgrib med par rig nas/ lus kyi rnam par rig pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa kun nas slong bar mi byed de/ yid la byed pa kun nas slong bar mi byed pa gang yin pa da na/ 
184a1(dkon brtsegs): / lhag par rnyed pa la mi gnas pa yin te/ de lhag par byed pa dang bral zhing / rnam par shes pa mi gnas pas lus la lus kyi rjes su lha ning dran panye bar gnag sgom
184a2(dkon brtsegs): yang chos gang la yang sgom par mi byed/ rnam par 'dzag par mi byed do// ngos chos thams cad dngos po med par gnas/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lnga zhing gnas pa na sems gangags de ltar
184a3(dkon brtsegs): lus la lus kyi rjes su lnga zhing gnas pa'i sems de yang sgyu ma'i chos nyid dang / brag cha'i chos nyid lta bur rab tu shes so// de ltar rab tu shes pas bde bu char ba la yang rjes su chags pa ma
184a4(dkon brtsegs): la/ sdug bsngal tshor ba la yang long khrob med cing sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa 'chor ba la yang rmongs pa med pas/ marig pa dag la nyal b.ram/ 
184a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ gang gi che tshor ba rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa rje ni de'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran nye bar gnag pa yin no// de de ltar tshor ba'i rjes su la ning
184a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa na/ chos thams cad la tshor ba'i rgyu bdag gis sems mi rgyu bas de chos thams cad la sems mi gnas pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems spong bar mi byed/ 'dor bar mi byed/ yongs su
184a7(dkon brtsegs): gtong bar mi byed de/ de ni de'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no// de chos shes pa mngon sum du gyur pas chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na
184a8(dkon brtsegs): dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pas chos nyid la 'jug par byed cing / lus dang tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos rnams la 'du shes dang / yid la byed pa dang / lta ba dang / kun nas bkris
184b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis gnas par mi byed de/ de ni de'i chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no// des chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma byung zhing dngos po med pa dang / namakha'i ngo bo nyid lta
184b2(dkon brtsegs): bur rtogs pas dris na dran pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa brda' sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda' sprod pa dran pa
184b3(dkon brtsegs): nye bar gzhag pas yongs su dag pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa ni gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de la kun shes par byed/ rnam par rig par
184b4(dkon brtsegs): byed/ gnas par byed/ mi spong bar byed/ rnam par mi g.yeng bar byed/ mi brjed par byed pa dang / dang por dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi theg mar 'gro ba dang / ser sna'i sems
184b5(dkon brtsegs): la mi 'jug pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems spong ba dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa med
184b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing rtsod pa med pa dang / lus dang ngag dang sems kyis rma mi 'byin pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi brtson 'grus mi rtsom pa dang / theg
184b7(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams yid la mi byed cing mi dran pa dang / bsam gtan dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mi gnas par bsgom pa dang / lta ba'i rnam
184b8(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad la mi rgyu ba dang / chos thams cad la 'phro bar mi byed pa dang / chos thams cad la rnam pa med par 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i rnam pa la 'jug pa dang / yul
185a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mi rgyu ba dang / 'dags pa'i smra bo rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams dang ma 'dres pa dang / lus dang gdang / yid kyilas ma tha
185a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bag yod pa lhur len cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol ba dang / bsnyad mi dgos par dgos pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / 
185a3(dkon brtsegs): gti mug spangs pas rnam par dag pa dang / tshul khrims la skyon med pa'i phyir yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / log par zhugs pa rnams dang ma 'brel ba dang / nang shin tu dag pas tshul 'a
185a4(dkon brtsegs): nga med pa dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pas kha bsags mo dra pa dang / rang gi rnyed pa chog shes pas tshol ba med pa dang / 'tsho ba ngan pa rnam par spangs pas thob kyis 'jal ba
185a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pas rnam paragayo ba med pa dang / khams gsum la 'dun pa dang / dral bas 'dod pa chung ba dang / sdig pa 'dod pa dang bral bas
185a6(dkon brtsegs): chog shes pa dang / chos thams cad dben par mos pas dben pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa spangs pas don nyung ba dang / spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcad pas spros pa med pa dang / 'dun
185a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa dang / gti mug dang bral bas 'gro ba med pa dang / nga rgyal nges par bcom pas chos la dga' ba dang / sems shin tu dul bas cang shes pa dang / tshul khrims
185a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi phung po kun tu bsrung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung pos sems gnas pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi phung pos sems rnam par grol ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs mi 'dor ba dang / byang chub
185b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems la dam bcas pa ma nyams pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad don du mi gnyer ba dang / sems can pha rol dag gi ngor byed pa med pa dang / gnan kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir bdag rjes su
185b2(dkon brtsegs): bsrung ba dang / rang gi sems la nges par sems pas gzhan gyi 'khrul pa rnams mi tshol ba dang / tshul khrims legs par bsdams pas 'jigs pa thams cad dang dral ba dang / slob dpon gyi/ 
185b3(dkon brtsegs): dpe mkhyud med pas chos kyi bgo bsha' byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams rjes su bsrung ba dang dang por dge ba'i chos thams cad la thog mar 'gro ba dang / chos thams
185b4(dkon brtsegs): cad ro gcig pas spyod pa tha dad pa med pa dang / rlom sems dathams cad yang dag por bcom pas rlom sems med pa dang / skye ba med par yang so sor rtog la/ sems can
185b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du skye ba yang / ngas su 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad la bzod ma na/ sa stong pa nyid du yang so sor rtog la/ lta ba thams cad
185b6(dkon brtsegs): gdul ba'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par yang byed pa dang / mtshan ma med pa yongs su 'dris par yang byed la/ mtshan ma la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la yang lta ba dang
185b7(dkon brtsegs): smon pa'i shes pa yang med la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir/ smon lam thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par yang so sor
185b8(dkon brtsegs): rtag la/ dag pa'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya bas kyang ngoms ni myong ba dang / dngos po ni dngos po med par snang bas/ dngos po dang dngos po med pa la rtog pa dang / lhag par byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir yid la
186a1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa med pa dang / sems can bdag med pa la sbyor bas bdag la bdag med pa dang / nyon mongs pa yongs su btang ba dang / sems can yongs su ma btang bas btang ba dang / 
186a2(dkon brtsegs): ma btang ba dang / thabs dang shes rab bsgoms pas ni zhing zhi la nye bar zhi ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams dang ma 'dres pas 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba dang / bdud kyi lam las yang dag par
186a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pas lam ma yin pa'i lam dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang ma 'dres pas spyod pa ma yin pa spyod pa dang / chos thams cad la rtog pas gdeg pa med cing gzhag pa med pa
186a4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid dang / gzhan la lhag par rlom sems su mi byed pa sa gdug mi sgrogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam sa yongs su rdzogs pas shes pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
186a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags par bzed pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ste/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// lha'i bu mi skye ba dang / mi 'byung
186a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba'i 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// skye zhing 'dod chags
186a7(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par rig par bya ba la dga' zhing / mchog tu dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// mtshan/ 
186a8(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ skye bar mtshams sbyor ba'i shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// yongs su gcod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin
186b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chags pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba dang zhe 'grus pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa bas ngoms mi myong ba ni byang chub
186b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// khams gsum du mtshams sbyar bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du skye ba yongs su
186b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' shes pa yin no// rang gi nyon mongs pa spong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir brtson pa ni byang chub
186b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// bdag gi phyir byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i phyir byed pa ni byang chub sems
186b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i shes pa yin no// yal bar 'dor ba ni byang chub sems dang / shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can yongs su smin par bya bar sbyar ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// 'dod
186b6(dkon brtsegs): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa zad par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang nyon mongs pa yongs su shes pa ni byang
186b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// 'gog pa'i chos mngon sum du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'a'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ 'gog pa yongs su 'dis par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa
186b8(dkon brtsegs): yin no// zag pa zad par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa bas zag pa 'bri bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// rnam par thar pa gsum mngon
187a1(dkon brtsegs): sum du byed pa ni nga chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa gsum la yongs su 'dris par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// drang po lnga
187a2(dkon brtsegs): khur 'dor ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi khur 'dor bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// dbang po drug 'gog par byed pa ni byang chub
187a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// skye ba zad par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa
187a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba'i mtshams sbyor bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed
187a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub kyi snying por rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bus sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i
187a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa yin no// yang dag pa'i shes pa brda' sprod pa'i le'u bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de las srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
187a7(dkon brtsegs): do bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shos
187a8(dkon brtsegs): ba brda sprod pa de legs par smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang dag shes pa brda' sprod pa bstan pa 'di thos na mos par 'gyur zhing mi skrag mi dngangal dngang bar mi 'gyur
187b1(dkon brtsegs): bde dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang dag pa'i shes pa brda' spyod par 'gyur ro// 
187b2(dkon brtsegs): bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/ de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ci khyod shes pa brda' sprod par byed dam/ 'jam dpal
187b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te kho bos chos 'ga' zhig thob bam/ spangs par gyur na ni kho bos shes pa brda' sprod par yang 'gyur ba zhig na/ lha'i bu kho bos ni chos 'ga' yang thob pa med cing
187b4(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa med pas na kho bos ci zhig shes pa brda' sprod par bya/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs ngargyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag la
187b5(dkon brtsegs): thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa med dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'thob pa'am mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir chos ston
187b6(dkon brtsegs): par mi mdzad do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar chos ston par mdzad/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
187b7(dkon brtsegs): ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa nyid kyis chos ston par mdzad kyi/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gdeg pa med pa dang / gzhag pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba
187b8(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / sems can dang bral ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir chos ston par ni mi
188a1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad de/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de ltar chos ston par mdzad do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yo/ 
188a2(dkon brtsegs): sumya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir chos ston par mi mdzad na/ 'o na gang gi don du sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rang bzhin gyis
188a3(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid rtogs par bya ba'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni 'dod char/ 
188a4(dkon brtsegs): dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid rtogs par bya ba'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni phyin ci log gi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i don du 'byu/ 
188a5(dkon brtsegs): polha'i bu sangs rgyas ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rtog/ sa par bya ba'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas na phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / chos kyi dbyings
188a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin te/ gang la chos gang yang skye ba
188a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa de la ni 'khor ba yang med la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ltar na sems can gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
188a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyir go cha bgos pa de dag gi go cha ni bgos pa med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni phan pa med pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems
188b1(dkon brtsegs): phan pa gang gis rab tu phye ba yin snyam 'am/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal phan pa ni mngon par 'du byed pas rab tu phye ba yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ma
188b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'du mdzad pa yod par 'dod dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mngon por 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' ba yin pas/ de ni 'dus mo byas pa brnyes pa dang / 'dus ma
188b3(dkon brtsegs): byas shing / mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' ba yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod kyis dam bcas pa de nyid kyis ni mngon par 'das ma byas pa la ni phan pa dang gnod pa dmigs
188b4(dkon brtsegs): su med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos bstan dpa 'di ni las dang po pa rnams kyi mdun du bshad par ni bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thos na skrag par 'gyur ba dang / 
188b5(dkon brtsegs): skrag nas kyang phyir ldog par 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skrag pa dang / phyir ldog pa gang yin pa de ni phyir
188b6(dkon brtsegs): mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par gnas pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpa' gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
188b7(dkon brtsegs): gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sas skrag cing / ser sna dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / gnod sems dang / le lo dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab dag las phyir
188b8(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa de ni phyi mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par gnas pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar gnas na yang dag par gnas pa yin/ smras par lha'i bu mnyam par gnas shing mi mnyam par
189a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas par ma yin na/ de'i phyir yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang
189a2(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa de lta bu ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa yin no// 
189a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dang po nyid nas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa
189a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i chos la mos dpa de'i phyir las dang po pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yun ring po nas spyad pa yin/ 
189a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni yun ring po nas spyad pa yin te/ de dag gi 'khor ba'i sngon gyi ma tha' mi mngon pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang
189a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' spyad pa bsrung ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dod chags kyi spyod pa la spyod kyang / 'dod chags
189a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa bsrung ba yin no// zhe sdang la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir zhe sdang gi spyad pa la spyod kyang / ne sdong gi spyod pa dang lhan cig
189a8(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas pa dang / gti mug la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gti mug gi spyad pa la spyod kyang / gti mug gi spyod pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa dang / cha mnyam pa spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i
189b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir cha mnyam nga'i spyad pa la spyod kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa bsrung ba yin no// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can yongs su
189b2(dkon brtsegs): smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'jug kyang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyang rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub
189b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyad pa bsrung ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos gang
189b4(dkon brtsegs): yang 'jig par mi byed/ chags par yang mi byed la/ chos kyi dbyings ni rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa med cing / chags pa med par rtogs pa de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa
189b5(dkon brtsegs): yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' ldog pa dang 'jug par byed pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod pa'i kham
189b6(dkon brtsegs): su yang ldog la/ bsam gtan rnams la yang 'jug par byed pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas ma rtogs pa rtogs shing / mi rtsod pa lhur len pa de'i tshe/ byang chub
189b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des sems can gyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / bdag gi khams ma rtogs pa de mngon sum du gyur pas chos thams cad la yang phyin
189b8(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa med pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya ste/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing / nem nur med la the tshom med cing som nyi dang bral ba'i phyir/ gzod
190a1(dkon brtsegs): ma nas dag cing dri ma med la nyon mongs pa med cing / shes rab kyi snang ba bsal bar gyur pas chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum
190a2(dkon brtsegs): du gyur pas de'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub
190a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas skyo ba thams cad skye ba med par shes shing / sems can thams cad kyi tshe 'pho dang skye ba yang rab tu shes la/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skye ba thams cad du skye
190a4(dkon brtsegs): ston cing / len pa med par skye ba yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang / skye ba dang tshe rabs thams cad du len pa dang bral ba sa 'chi ba dang skye ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang / chos
190a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi 'da' zhing / ya dag par mi 'da' ba dang / rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa'i don rtogs po dang / sems can thams cad dang lus maH
190a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems can thams cad dang sems mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad dang ngag mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad dang yul mnyam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab
190a7(dkon brtsegs): tu gnas pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi yul rtogs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i bya ba shes pa dang dus la blta ba dang / byang
190a8(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug pa de ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa zhes bya ste/ lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yin no// de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog
190b1(dkon brtsegs): gis 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' kha na mtho ba med cing thams cad du dpyas med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smra
190b2(dkon brtsegs): ba/ lha'i bu glang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed pa dang / nga rgyal gyis byas pa dag mi byed pa do'i che byang chub sems dpa' kha na mtho ba med cing tham
190b3(dkon brtsegs): cad du dbyas med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'o byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pos bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba de lta bu ni kha na ma thong
190b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin no// gang yang ser sna dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe sbyangs dpa'i yon tan dang / bslab pa dang / tshul khrims dang / 
190b5(dkon brtsegs): yi dam thams cad dang ldan pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med yin no// gang yang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang lhan cog mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi
190b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang brnab sems dang / gnod sems kyi bag la nyal dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu/ 
190b7(dkon brtsegs): ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus la yang dag par snang ba de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang le lo dang lhan cig mi gan
190b8(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang bsam gtan gyi
191a1(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'i ro myang bar mi byed pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe shes rab kyi rtsa ba thos pa yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho med pa yin no// 
191a2(dkon brtsegs): gang yang 'chal pa'i shes rab dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe rma phyung yang rma mi 'byin pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang rma
191a3(dkon brtsegs): byung yang rma mi 'byin pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe ji lta ba bzhin du smra ba de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang de bzhin du byed pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang
191a4(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe na nye ba ni pa de lta bu ni khan ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang phyi rol gyi yul rnams kyis mi gos pa de lta ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi cha thams cad mkhyen pa
191a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi sems la bsam pa tha dad pa med pa de lta bu ni khan mtho ba med pa yin no// gang yang theg pa dman pal/  pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi che bdu
191a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi las rnams rtogs pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang bdud kyi las rnams bzlog pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe 'jig rten snang bzed pa de lta bus pa na
191a7(dkon brtsegs): mtho ba med pa yin no// gang yang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi gos pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe bya ba dang 'gal bar mi byed pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gas
191a8(dkon brtsegs): yang bya ba ma yin par mi ltung ba de lta bu ni dbyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang / snyems pa thams cad dang bral ba de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang
191b1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes dang rnam par shes pa phun sum tshogs shing 'phags pa'i bde ba dang ldan pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe dam bcas pa brtan pa de lta bu ni kha na mtho ba med pa yin no// gang
191b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs dang 'thun par byed pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang
191b3(dkon brtsegs): yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa med pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe shes rab dang ye shes kyi chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par rab
191b4(dkon brtsegs): tu shes pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang thabs shes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag sdud pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang rtsom pa thams cad la
191b5(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen pos 'jug pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ no// gang yang chos thams cad la rnam par thar par gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang yang chos
191b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mi dmigs pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// grang yang dmigs pa'i lta ba spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang yang tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ni
191b7(dkon brtsegs): chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang 'bras bu thob pa mngon sum du byed pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe chos kyi dbyings
191b8(dkon brtsegs): stong pa zhes bya bar so sor rtog pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe khams gsum dang lhan
192a1(dkon brtsegs): cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni kha na mthe ba med pa yin no// gang yang sems can thams cad la blta ba'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin
192a2(dkon brtsegs): no// lha'i bu gzhan yang ji tsam du tshig 'jug pa dang / tshig gis rlom sems su byed pa dang / tshig gis rtogs par byed pa dang / tshi ga la mngon par zhen par byed pa de tsam du skyon yin no// 
192a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu ji tsam du ches thams cad la bsnyad du med pa nyid dang / 'jug pa med pa nyid dang / rlom sems meng pa nyid dang / rtog pa med pa nyid dang / 'phro ba med po nyid dang / brjod du med pa nyid
192a4(dkon brtsegs): dang sems can yongs su mi btang ba'i phyir gtan du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba nyid yin pa de tsam du kha nam/ tho ba med cing dpyas med pa yin no// lha'i bu gang la kha na ma
192a5(dkon brtsegs): tho ba med cing / dpyas med pa de ni yi ge med pa yin no// gang la yi ge med pa de ni brjed du med pa yin te/ brjod du med pa'i don la ni kho na ma tho ba med tsang dpyas med do// lha'i
192a6(dkon brtsegs): bu de lta bas na brjod du med pa'i don la rton pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rang gi sems gtso bor byed pas kha na ma tho ba med cing 'phags pa rnams kyis dpyas byar med pa yin no// bstan pa 'di
192a7(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kha na ma tho ba
192a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang dpyas med pa de legs par smras so// 'jam dpal gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de ltar kha na ma tho ba med cing dpyas med par gyur pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
192b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// bstan pa 'di thos nas 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag
192b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag tu ming tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag tu 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
192b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan to// de nas 'khor de las lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'di yun ring po ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
192b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/ byang chub thob pa'i ming ni ji skad ces bya bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nus sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan
192b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'di yun// ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang/ 
192b6(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/ byang chub thob pa'i ming nA dza skad ces bgyi bar 'gyur lags de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
192b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'di ni bskal pa 'bum 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa rin chen 'byung
192b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas shes bya ba la shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba bkod pa zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ 
193a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen bkod pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi
193a2(dkon brtsegs): khams dga' ba bkod pa de yang 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyis kun tu gang ba dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song thams cad dang bral bar
193a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de ni rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med cing / lag mthil ltar mnyam la/ rin po che sna gsum 'di lta ste/ bai DUr+ya dang / shel dang / 
193a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam+bu chu bo'i gser gyis spras shing blta na sdug la/ gser gyi dra bas kun nas bkab par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na 'phrul dga' lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / 
193a5(dkon brtsegs): nye bar spyod pa ci 'dra ba de bzhin du mi de dag gri longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der ni bza' ba dang btung ba dag kyang yid la bsam
193a6(dkon brtsegs): pa tsam gyis 'byor par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams der ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gi ming yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang chos kyi dga' ba sna tshe/ 
193a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos kyi rnam par grol ba sna tshogs dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa sna tshogs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa sna tshogs dag gis/ 
193a8(dkon brtsegs): dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur te/ chos kyi rab tu dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dag gis dga' bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par tshor rab gzhan dag myong bar mi 'gyur bas/ de'i
193b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de dga' ba bkod pa zhes bya ba 'gyu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni le bye ba phrag drug cur 'gyur ro// de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun byang chub sems dpa'
193b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cur 'gyur ro// de'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bkod pa de gang
193b3(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ stong gi bar snang la ta la bye ba phrag brgyad cu tsam du na mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams skyil
