265b8(dkon brtsegs): shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// snyoms 'jug spyod pa dag no rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub
266a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// rig rten thams cadas ni pan gyi shog// de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor b.radang mkhyen pas// 'khor banyon mongs rgyalas skyes par mkhyen// bdag kyang de rU ri / 
266a2(dkon brtsegs): shes sru gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad lani ngan gyid gag/ de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad dpar khyen pas// ga rten ldan dgas dpa rna ma mchis// bdag kya / 
266a3(dkon brtsegs): grub gyur nas// 'jog rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa ting 'dzin rab gnas pas// khyad par thabs kyi ye shes bskyed par mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes gru 'gyur
266a4(dkon brtsegs): nas 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan gying shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// sngon phyog/ nas kyi skyed pa dngag med mkhyen// bdag kyang de dra'i
266a5(dkon brtsegs): mung gyur nas// 'jog rten thams cad lan pan byung shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ dab skye ba de pag med tum byin// bdag kyang de dra'i
266a6(dkon brtsegs): grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// nyon mongs zad pa thams cad rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur
266a7(dkon brtsegs): nas 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// bla med byang chub yang dag mngon sangs rgyas// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ 
266a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// nyon mongs bag chags dag ni rab tu spangs// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig
266b1(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'khor ba nges 'byung chos ni rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad
266b2(dkon brtsegs): la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos don rab mkhyen pas// sems can dag med rnams ni go bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan
266b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos nyid sgyu ma dang // rmi lam smig rgyu lta bur rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jog rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de
266b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten thams cad kyi// yi ge dag/ dang brjod pa rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ 
266b5(dkon brtsegs): ded bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mchog ldan pas// dam chos zab mo dag ni ston par mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid
266b6(dkon brtsegs): shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas sku gsung thugs 'dul bas// thams cad ye shes rjes su 'brang bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid
266b7(dkon brtsegs): shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas dus gsum rang mkhyen pas// 'dzin dang chags pa mi mnga' thogs mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid
266b8(dkon brtsegs): shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang // shes rab bsgrubs pas de las ldog mi 'gyur// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i
267a1(dkon brtsegs): gtsor gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam grol rab bsgrubs pas// rnam grol mkhyen dang gzigs pa ldog mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grung gyur nas// 
267a2(dkon brtsegs): khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas zhi gnas lhag mthong bsgrubs// lha mo'i 'jig rten dag na mtshungs ma mchis// bdag kyang de ng+ka'i ye shes gru gyur/ 
267a3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'jig rten chos rnams la ni zhen mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur
267a4(dkon brtsegs): nas khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig/ de debazhin gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen ldan pas// 'gro ba sna tshogs dag ni gsal rab gzigs// bdag kyang de
267a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'gro ba de la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas skye zad mtha' mkhyen pa// de slad de la rmongs pa yong mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dran
267a6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes grub gyur nas// skye zad nyid la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas rab zhi mtha' mkhyen pas// de slad de la rmongs pa yong mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur
267a7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ rab zhid la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor ba'i mtha' mkhyen pas// de slad de la rmongs pa yod ma mchis// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'khor
267a8(dkon brtsegs): bde la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen// de slad slob dben ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// snga phyi'i mtha'
267b1(dkon brtsegs): 'the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas skyon bzlog mtha' rab mkhyen// de slang slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// skyon bzlog pa/ 
267b2(dkon brtsegs): lathe tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen// mig gi rtag chang dag la 'dzin mi mnga'// bdag kyang dri 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// snga phyi'i mtha' la
267b3(dkon brtsegs): chom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas skye zad mtha' mkhyen pas// mig gi rtag chad dag la 'dzin mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// skye zad nyid la the tshom ma mchis
267b4(dkon brtsegs): shog/ gang zhig sngon dang phyi mtha' ma rtogs pas// de ni 'dod dab dag la zhen pa bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pas de ni darab mkhyen pas// de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'/ 
267b5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig yod med mtha' nam rtogs pas// des ni 'dod pa dang / bzhen pa bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pas de ni mkhyen pas// de smad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// ga
267b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig zad dang ma zad ma rtogs pas// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen mi bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas// de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// gang zhig 'jug dang mi
267b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug ma rtogs pa// des na 'dod pa dag la zhen pa bskyed// de bzhin goshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas// de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// zhe sdang gti mug khong khro 'chab pa dang // g.yo
267b8(dkon brtsegs): sgra phrag dog nga rgyal khengs pa dang // sprin dang tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i
268a1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ 'dzum pa mdzad de 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bu rab tu bkye'o// 'od zer des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med dpag tu med pa
268a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu phan pa dag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nyid du thim par gyur to// 
268a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa 'byams pa 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la bzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la ma/ 
268a4(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag byas te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigasu bcad dpa 'di dag mngon par bstod de bcom ldan 'das la zhub nus pa// 'brug sgra seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing // ka la bing ka'i
268a5(dkon brtsegs): sgra phyung nas// chos rnga chen po sgra 'byin pas// ci yi slad du 'dzu ma pa mdzad// nyi ma stong pas khyad par 'phags// rnam dag sgrar ba dag dang ldan// yon tan ngo mtshar rab mnga' ba/ 
268a6(dkon brtsegs): ci slad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad// sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab rab brgyan pas// thams cad dag ni yongs rdzogs pa// ci slad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad// de bzhin
268a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dbyangs mnyan pas// ngag rtsub rnams ni rtag tu spangs// sems can nad ni legs gso ba// ci slad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad// thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso// mig ni rtag tu
268a8(dkon brtsegs): stong dben mkhyen// rnam dag tshangs pa'i dbyings mnga' bas// sems can rnams la ston pa mdzad// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// sgra dang ming la sogs pa nas// kun 'byung 'gog pa lam dag
268b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / ye shes bzod pa'i bar de bzhin// thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso// mi gzang skye bo'i mtha' dag dang // rab ni dang ni 'khor ba dag/ thams cad stong dben nyid du mkhyen// rna ba sA lce lus
268b2(dkon brtsegs): dang yid// gzugs sgra dri reg bya nas// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no// gzhan yang rten cing 'brel 'byung chos// chad dang rtag pa yongs bral nas// bdag
268b3(dkon brtsegs): dang gzhan gyis byas min pas// rkyen mang las byung nyid du gsungs// res 'ga' rnam grangs sna tshogs kyis// sdug bsngal bzhi ni ston par mdzad// res 'ga' don ni sna tshogs kyis// sangs
268b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'od zer bsngags par mdzad// res 'ga' tshig ni snags kyis// rab dben chas ni ston mdzad cing // gang zug srog dang bdag med dang // sems can med pa nyid du ston// 
268b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med kyang // bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis// tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis/ de 'dra'i chos ni ston par mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
268b6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan chos// yang dag nyid ni ston mdzad kyang // brjod dang brjod bya mi mnga' bas// brjod mdzad ches kyang yong mi mnga'// bcom ldan yang dag chos bsrung zhing // skye dgu rnams ni go
268b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pas// lha rnams dang ni gnod sbyin dag/ gang thos de dag rtogs par 'gyur// lha ma yin ni thams cad kyang // mos pa dag ni rnam par dag/ ming ni mang po tshad med kyang // the tshom dra ba
268b8(dkon brtsegs): chad par 'gyur// 'dod chags rang bzhin rab tu rtogs// zhe sdang gti mug rnam par bshig/ srid dang nga rgyal ma rig dang // g.yo sgyu phrag dog stongs pa nas// sdug bsngal phung po la sog
269a1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ thams cad kyang ni yongs su spangs// 'di la sogs pa tshig gi don// mtha' ni kun kyang rnam par dag/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gcig la// sna tshogs ming ni ra
269a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas// grangs ni brgya stong mang po rnams// bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu ston// sangs rgyas chad med mang po las// de 'dra chas ni legs bslabs pas// chos kyi dngos po gcig las kyang / 
269a3(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa thugs pa med pa ston// de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams kyi// rnam grangs sna tshogs rab mkhyen pas// ming tshig dang po bar ma dang // tha ma rnam 'byed rab tu mkhyen// tha dad tshig ni sna
269a4(dkon brtsegs): tshigs dag/ thams cad rab tu bslabs pas na// don mchodag ni gya nom pa// ston pa dag la rab tu mkhyen// de dbyangs ni rnam dag pa// rgyu rkyen tshogs pa las byung bas/ 
269a5(dkon brtsegs): lce 'da' zhig la brten pa nas// lus sems par la brten pa 'ang min// sa ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos// phyogs bcu'i 'khor ni yongs 'dus nas// thal sbyar bcom ldan nal nga lta
269a6(dkon brtsegs): na the tshom dag ni bsal du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa mi gzang dang // skye mtha' dang ni rab bzhin gyis// rtag tu stong zhing dben pa dang // 'gro 'ong med par rab tu mkhyen// bzhugs dang gnas/ 
269a7(dkon brtsegs): ni mi mnga' ba// yang dag mtha' la rab tu bzhugs// bcom ldan spyan ni thogs mi mnga'// de skad deng bdag nub lags// de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid kyi// sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' dag dang / 
269a8(dkon brtsegs): zad dang mazad 'khor ba ni// rang bzhin stong dben rab mkhyen pas// chos kyi don rnams rab phye nas// 'jig rten rnams ni dga' bar mdzad// thub pa dbyangs snyan rab mnga' bas// ci slad 'dzum pa
269b1(dkon brtsegs): ston par mdzad// bcom ldan sngon dang phyi'i mtha' nga // mig nyid stong dben rab mkhyen cing // rnam rtog tshig dang bral lags na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan mig ni dpag med dang // 
269b2(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa sna tshogs rang bzhin gyis// rtag tu stong dben mkhyen lags na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan zad dang skye mtha' dang // mig nyid stong nyid rab mkhyen cing // nyon mongs rnams ni
269b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs spangs pas// sangs rgyas byang chub mkhyen pa brnyes// grags pa mchog ni phun tshogs pa// ci smad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan yun ring bsgoms bslabs pas// bsam gyis mi
269b4(dkon brtsegs): khyab ston par mdzad// mig nyid stong pa nyid du mkhyen// dri dral rtag/ tu rnam par dag/ sems kyi spyod pa tshad med rnams// dgod sa pa gcig gis thams cad mkhyen// 'od zer 'jig rten
269b5(dkon brtsegs): snang mdzad pa// 'di ni gang gi snga rtags lags// drang srong chen po mngon sangs rgyas// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyad par 'phags// nyon mongs dag ni rab bsal bas// thugs ni rtag/ 
269b6(dkon brtsegs): tu zhi zhing dben// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen mchog gis// mig zad mtha' ni rab tu rtogs// rgyu dang rkyen ni gang gi slad// deng 'dir 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// yul
269b7(dkon brtsegs): drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no// bcom ldan mig la bdag med mkhyen// rna ba mi rtag nyid du rtogs// sna nyid stong par rab tu mkhyen// 
269b8(dkon brtsegs): ci smad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan lce la bdag med mkhyen// lus kyang mi rtag nyid du rtogs// sems yid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan gzugs
270a1(dkon brtsegs): la bdag med mkhyen// sgra yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs// dri nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan rol bdag med mkhyen// reg bya mi rtag nyid
270a2(dkon brtsegs): du rtogs// chos nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan 'das la bdag med mkhyen// chu yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs// me nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slang
270a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan rlung la bdag med mkhyen// ngo bo mi rtag nyid du rtogs// dngos nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan 'jig rten bdag
270a4(dkon brtsegs): med mkhyen// sdug bsngal mi rtag nyid du rtogs// phung po stong dpur rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan khams la bdag med mkhyen// 'jig rten mi rtag
270a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid du rtogs// skye nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan sgra la bdag med mkhyen/ ming yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs// lam nyid stong par rab mkhyen
270a6(dkon brtsegs): na/ ci smad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan ye shes bdag med mkhyen// rab dben mi rtag nyid du rtogs// sems can stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom
270a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan rang bzhin rang bzhin med// bdag dang bdag med pa yang mkhyen// mos pa ston pa rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// 'khor ba bdag med nyid du gzigs// rtag dang mi rtag pa
270a8(dkon brtsegs): yang mkhyen// mya ngan 'das pa stong mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rnam grol// grags pa khams gsum kun tu yang // brgya byin mi yi dbang po dang / 
270b1(dkon brtsegs): klu rnams la sogs kun gyis mchod// de bzhin gshegs pas migazad dang // skye mtha' rab dben mkhyen lags na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// sangs rgyas sras ni tshad med pa// 'khor/ 
270b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dir thams cad rab tu 'das// sangs rgyas gsung las skyes pa dang // chos las sprul te gang byung ba// thams cad bcom ldan spyan sngar mchis// gus pas thal mo rab sbyar lags// 'khor
270b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus de dag slad du ni// 'od zer rgyu rkyen 'di zhugs lags// de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid ni// stong zhing bdag med mkhyen pas na// khyim na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa// thams cad las ni yang
270b4(dkon brtsegs): dag 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa chos rnams ni// bye brag me radra cing mnyam mkhyen pa// bcom ldan dgongs pa rab ma khyen gyi// rdzu 'phrul dag gis gzigs ma yin// bcom
270b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan mig gi bdag med mkhyen// ngo bo nyid stong 'gro'o med// rnam dag mkhyen pa tshad med mchis// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// / bam po gsum pa// 
270b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa skye mtha' rab zad pa// thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten kun skyob mdzad// chos rje mchog gyur mi yi gtsor gyur pa// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// byang chub
270b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po tshad ma mchis// gzhan yang lha tshogs gzi byin che ba rnams// mkha' la gdugs ni dam pa dag kyang thogs// sa chen 'di ni rab tu g.yos par gyur// gang zhig sngon ni de
270b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa las// yun ring dge ba'i chos ni gang bsgrubs pa// mnyam par dga' mdzad thugs rje chen po'i gtso// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// gang zhig sngon ni
271a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rang mchod na// chos 'di thos nas dga' ba rab bskyed pas// 'dren pa rang mchog mi yi gtsor gyur pa// ci snang 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ 
271a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan gsung ni mang po dga' mdzad pas// bya rgyal dang pa bzhin du dbyangs rab snyan// sgra snyan tshad med rang gi ngang gis 'byung // ci slad 'od zer 'di bkye bshad du gsol// tshogs
271a3(dkon brtsegs): bcad bye ba tshad ma mchis pa yis// rjes 'thun gsung gi bsngags pa brjod 'gyur zhing // kun ci ri yi sgra skad mchog ldan pa// ci slad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol// 'brug sgra zab mos chos
271a4(dkon brtsegs): ni bstan pa'i sgras// 'jig rten brgya steng dpag med grags gyur pa// thugs rjes tshig rtsub yang na 'jam so/ dab// ci skad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog bkru// skye dang mi skye
271a5(dkon brtsegs): zad dang mi zad mkhyen// mig nyid bral zhing 'gro 'ong med par rtogs// 'jig rten snang mdzad bdud rtsi'i glogagyur pa// ci slad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog bkye// mig gi byung
271a6(dkon brtsegs): brtag tu stong dpon dang // 'gro 'ong ma mchis gnas pa ma mchis dang // smig rgya chu bur lta bur rab mkhyen pa// rgyu rkyen gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad lags// de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid
271a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs sgra dri ro reg byas chos rnams nas// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin du ni rig par bgyi// rdo rje rtag pa'i sku dang mi 'jig sku// mtshan mchog brgya stong
271a8(dkon brtsegs): dag ni phun sum tshogs// skul 'phrul 'khor mi mnga' g.yo mdzad pa// rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol// byin pa zlum zhing zhabs kyi rting pa yangs// phyal gyi mtshan ma mi ganga'
271b1(dkon brtsegs): seng ge 'dra// lte ba shin tu zab cing rkyed rgyas pa// rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol// gser sku rnam dag rdul dang dri ma spangs// ba spu re re kha dog mthon mthing ldan// g.yas su
271b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khyir zhing spos kyi ngad ldang ba// rgyu rkyen gang smad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol// sku mchog dam pa yongs rdzogs rtag gnas pa// dper na n+ya go ta yi shing rgyal bzhin// yon tan thams cad
271b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni rab tu brgyan// gsung dbangs dag gis 'khor ni dga' bar mdzad// dpung po zlum ning phrag pa sdug la mdzes// gtsug tor yongs rdzogs g.yas su 'khyil bar gda'// ning ni rgya sna
271b4(dkon brtsegs): dngag mang rgyu bar mdzad// sems can log dang yang dag lam ston mdzad// tshoms dkar dro mo meng rabs dung nga 'dra ljags mtshan srid rong nal ni kun tu khebs// 'gram
271b5(dkon brtsegs): pa seng ge 'dri ning shangs kyang mtho// thams cad thabs dang rnam degazugs las skyes// ut+pal yi gsung ni na nas 'byung // tsan+dan dri dag sku ni kun tu khyab// sngon ni byams pa
271b6(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher bsgoms pas na// rnam dag mos pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs mthil rtag tu mnyam// sa la reg kyang rdul ni gos mi 'gyur// gom pa seng ge glang po che
271b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra bas// 'jig rten thams cad las ni yang dag 'das// 'khor lo rtsibs stong mtshan gyis legs par brgyan// khyad 'phags 'od zer dag ni rtag tu gsal// dge bdag gis skye dgu phan
271b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs pas// gang gis mthong ba dang ba rab tu skye// sor gcig 'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas// sangs rgyas zhing ni dpag med snang bar mdzad// sngon ni dge sbyong mang po rab bsgrubs pas// mtshan
272a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi bkod pa sna tshogs 'di brnyes legs// gzugs sku yongs rdzogs dpe zla yong ma mchis// zhal mtshan rab mdzes shin tu khyad par 'phags// rdzu 'phrul dag gis
272a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pan 'dogs pa// ji slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// byin pa ri dgas en ya dang 'dra// sku dbyibs mi sku seng ge ji lta bzhin// 'jig rten byung nas 'jig rten snang
272a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa// ci smad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// cang shes bzhin du mtshan sgras rdul mi mnga'// phyag mthil mnyam rgyas phyag ni pus mo 'das// mi yi seng ge ngo mtshar khyad par
272a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags// ci smad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ sku la 'od zer dpag med rab 'gyed cing // kha dog gya nom rab ni rtag gsal zhing // rnam dag thugs ni rtag tu rgyun mi
272a5(dkon brtsegs): 'chang mdo sde tshad med pa dag ston par mdzad// rtag dang chad pa dag la gnas pa yis// de 'dra'i ches ni bsgrub par 'gyur ma lags// gang gis mthar lha rnams ni rab spangs na
272a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan rnam dag sku ni myur thob 'gyur// lha rnga 'brug sgra'i gsung ni kun grags shing // ka la dka'i dbyangs snyan rab tu gsal// lha yi klu sgra brgya stong mang ldan pa// ci smad 'od zer bkye ba bshad
272a7(dkon brtsegs): du gsol// badren pas gsung gcig tu na chos bstan ngas// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims can dag rgyun yang bcad // de bzhin gshegs pas dbyangs rab gang gsungs pa// de kun zab cing ngom
272a8(dkon brtsegs): chos lags so// khyu mchog smin mtshams 'od zer rab bkye bas// sangs rgyas zhing ni brgya stong gsal bar mdzad// spyan mchog dag ni mthon mthing kha dog 'dra// gtsug ter mtshan ni
272b1(dkon brtsegs): mkha' yi lhas mi mthong // tshems dkar gtams pa bzhi bcu dag dang ldan// dper na rin chen chu shel dag dang mtshungs// dge ba'i phrin las tshad med dag las skyes// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad
272b2(dkon brtsegs): bshad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rdzogs pa'i sku// kha dog dam pa dpag med phun tshogs shing // 'od zer rnam dag ngo mtshar rab bkye ba// ci smad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad
272b3(dkon brtsegs): du gsol// thugs rje chen po mchog rgyal rkang gnyis gtso// sems can yang dag bsam pa thugs su chud// thogs pa ma mchis spongs pa mchog brnyes pa// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad
272b4(dkon brtsegs): bshad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pas pha rol rab byon dpas rig pa gsum dang mngon shes drug phun tshogs/ rnam dag 'od zer dpag med ston mdzad pa// ci smad 'dzub pa
272b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa dpag med snyed// bcom ldan brgya stong snyed la mchod pa mdzad// de 'dra'i rgyu 'bras tshan mi 'tshal ba// ci slad 'dzum
272b6(dkon brtsegs): pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa dpag med snyed// ting 'dzin mchog dag la ni rab zhugs pas// mig gi skye mtha' zad pa'i mtha' mkhyen na// ci slang 'dzum pa bstan
272b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad bshad du gsol// 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs da ltar dus// 'dren pas de dag kun ni rab tu mkhyen// rnam dag mkhyen pa thogs med bsam mi khyab// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du
272b8(dkon brtsegs): gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i mdun du phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo la bzhag nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ 
273a1(dkon brtsegs): gnon nu shin tu legs par nyon// ngas ni dring 'dir byang chub chos// 'od zer rab tu ston pa'i mdo// khyod la shin tu yongs gtad kyis// ma 'ongs tham dus ngan che// chos ni rnam
273a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'jig pan// khyod kyis sems can rnams la ni// rab tu phye nas bshad par gyis// ngas ni sangs rgyas spyan dag gis// ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe// shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'o// mdo sde
273a3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa 'di dag la// gang mos gang ni mi mos pa// thams cad kun kyang gzigs shing mkhyen// sems can dgon gang zhig gis// byang chub lam ni rang tshol ba// rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes dran zhing
273a4(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde 'di ni bzung bar gyis// gang zhig dad par rab 'jig cing 'du 'jil ni mos gyur dang // nyin mtshan gnyid la gang dga' ba// mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// nga yi bstan
273a5(dkon brtsegs): padag las ni// rab tu byung bar gyur nas kyang // mya ngan 'das pa'i chos dag la// mos pa dag ni mi skye ba// skyes khru blun po de dag ni// dad pas byin pa chud zos 'gyur// 'dus
273a6(dkon brtsegs): byas rnams ni chas dag la// nyes dmigs mang bar thos kyang ni// 'jig rten dag la mngon nan nas// 'jigs pa dag no ma skye ba// skyes du dran po de dag ni// mkhas pa rnams kyis smad pa
273a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ chos gos dag ni bgos gyur kyang // de la shes rapa ci yang med// thub pas legs par gsungs pa yi// yang dag bka'on gang yin pa// shes pa med pas thos gyur na// yid ces
273a8(dkon brtsegs): len par mi 'gyur te// skyes du dun po de dag ni// lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o// khyad par 'phags pa'i chos 'di dag/ gal te thos par gyur nas kyang // rab tu dga' ning mos pa yi// sems
273b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang skye bar ma 'gyur ba// de tshwa'i gang zag de dag s+ho// ngas na rab tu spod par byed// mi lus thob par gyur chod kyi// don don med chung chos yin// gal te shin tu rab nga'i chos// 'di dag thos pas
273b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur na ni// rab tu dga' ning mos pa yi// sems ni rab tu skye 'gyur ba// de 'dra'o gang zag de dag ni// sngon tshang sangs rgyas drang bas na// gdon mi zab kha nAr ni// d+hU med byang chub thab par
273b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur skyes bu blun po gang dag cig/ lta ba ngan pa rab spangs nas// shes rab srog ni gcod byed pa// byang chub yongs su spong bar 'gyur// de lta bas na mi dge ba'i// gshes gnyen dag ni
273b4(dkon brtsegs): rab spangs nas// blo ldan mkhas pa dag la ni// brten cing dgus pa bskyed par bya// 'jig rten dag ni thams cad na/ nyes dmigs tshad med gang yod pa// sems can ngan sang
273b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum por ni// rtag tu bying bar grang byed pa// thams cad gti mug rmongs pa yi// rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas na/ nyon mongs rjes su 'jug byed cing // rang dbang dag ni thob mi
273b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur yang dag chos ni spong byed cing // chos ma yin pa spyod par byed// de lta bas na rmongs pa yi// skyes bu dman pa spang bar bya// ji ltar kha lo bsgyur ba yi// rang gi srog shing bcad pa
273b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin mi dge'i las ni byas pas na// sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur// kha nas tshig ngan phyung nas ni// rtag tu bdag la gnod byed pa// ji ltar ste re rno thogs nas// rang gi lus ni gcod
273b8(dkon brtsegs): byed 'dra// chos rnams rgyu dang rkyen dag gis// byas pa'i las kyi rjes su ni// rnam smin myong ba skabs med par// de ltar khong du ma chud pas// 'jig rten drang srong la brten nas// dge ba'i
274a1(dkon brtsegs): grogs po yin snyams sems// de nas rang nyid 'di snyam du// stong pa nyid ni gang bsgom pa// 'dus ma byas ni rtogs snyam nas// chad par lta ba bskyed par byed// lus ni snod
274a2(dkon brtsegs): chag pa dang 'dra// sems kyang rjes su 'gag 'gyur zhes// phal cher kyal pa'i tshig dag la// mos pa nyid du rab 'gyur zhing // 'di la mngon par zhen pas na// phan pa'i don ni ci yang med// gal/ 
274a3(dkon brtsegs): tesbrul ni gdug pa yis// gnod pa dag ni rab byas kyang // nam yang skye dgu mang po rnams// ngan 'gro dag tu ltung mi 'gyur// blun po gang zhig chos ston pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig byed pas// 
274a4(dkon brtsegs): skye dgu mang po tshad med snyed// sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed// khyed la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa// 'di lta bu ni lta bar gyis// deng 'dir nga yi spyan sngar ni// zla 'od
274a5(dkon brtsegs): gnon nu gang 'dus pa// 'dis ni sngon chad 'das pa yi// sangs rgyas dag ni bcom ldan 'das// tshad med gang+gA klung bye/ snyed mchod pa rim gro rab byas shing // shin tu brtan
274a6(dkon brtsegs): par yongs bsgoms nas// bla med ye shes btsal bas na// srid pa dag ni thams cad la// sems kyis gnas pa tso yang meng// mig gi skye mtha' gtan du ni// rnam par dag pa shes pas na// 
274a7(dkon brtsegs): spros pa dag ni yongs spangs nas// mngon par shes pa ci yang med// sems can dag ni tshad med pa// phan pa dag ni bya ba'i phyir// bla med 'od zer ston pa yi// mdo sde dag ni ston par byed// 
274a8(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu blun po gang yin pa// chos 'di slob par mi nus pas// rnal 'byor bsgoms pa dag la ni// skyon nyid du yang lta bar byed// de lta bas na blun po dag/ thag ring po ni yong spangs nas// de dag
274b1(dkon brtsegs): la ni sten mi byed// de yi chos kyang mi slob bo// skyes bu blun po gang yin pa// rtsod pa'i smra ba mos pas na// rtsod smra med pa'i spyod pa la// nan tan sgrub par mi nus pas// skyes bu de dag rnams la ni/ 
274b2(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin sems ni ci yang med// de lta bas ni de dag la// bsnyen bkur mi bya bsngags mi brjod// skyes bu blun po gang yin pa// le lo snyoms las la gnas pas// rtag tu lus dang ngag yid
274b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi mi dge'i las ni spyad pas na// de la tshul khrims dag pa dang // shes rab mang thos ci yang med// rtag tu 'dod pa'i yul sems shing // 'du 'dzi dag la mos par byed// khyed kyis 'di ltar
274b4(dkon brtsegs): drun po de// rigs dang rus dang lus kyang ni// dman pa yin par rab tu ltos// khong khro bka' blo ma bde zhing // byad bzhin dag ni mi sdug la// gal te dge ba'i gnas skyes kyang // lus
274b5(dkon brtsegs): nirtag tu ma rabs 'gyur// bdag tu 'du shes la zhen pas/ yang dag don la rmongs par 'gyur// blo gos dag ni mi ny+dza nangs// tshig gi bye brag 'byed mi nus// rang bzhin stong
274b6(dkon brtsegs): nga'i chos thos kyang // de la mos pa skye mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// yun ring po nas 'jig rten pa'i// tshig gi spros pa gang yin pa// thams cad rab tu spangs pa yin// so / 
274b7(dkon brtsegs): se'i skye bos 'di dag la// shin khyo non cing chags pas na// ji srid 'tshe yi bar du yang // rtogs shing khong du chud mi 'gyur// tshul khrims bsngags pa brjod byed kyang // tshangs par spyod pa bsku
274b8(dkon brtsegs): byed kha nas chos ni ston byed kyang // lus kyis chos min spyod par byed// rang gis 'dul brjo da nga/ rtag tu 'dul min spyod par byed// sangs rgyas slob ma ngag la ni// kha dog bsgyur po'i gos phyin/ 
275a1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims can dag gis// gos 'di rab tu bgos gyur kyang // nga rgyal dag ni bag med pa'i// sems ni rab tu 'phel bar byed// dad pas byin pa ci zos
275a2(dkon brtsegs): pa thu lu mang bar ba med pa 'dra// de ltar khyim gyi gnas spangs nas// 'dod pa lnga yi bde ba'ang med// gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos dag la// mchog gi bde ba ma theb nas// spyod pa 'dren ma mos
275a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pas// mtha' gnyis dag ni spong mi 'gyur// yid kyi mos pa ji snyed pa// thams cad kyang ni dag mi 'gyur// de 'dra'i gang zag blun po ni// 'khor mang nang du gnas kyang gyur// dper na ji ltar wa
275a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes dag/ seng ge'i khyur ni nugs pa bzhin// de ltar rab tu ni ba yi// chos ni yang dag bstan byas kyang // de bzhin nyid dang stong pa'i don// rtogs shing khong du ma chud pas// 'khor
275a5(dkon brtsegs): ming dag la bstan bsngags kyang // khengs pa'i sems ni bskye da par byed// ston pa chen po ma dran pas// ngo tsha dman pa'i sems kyang med// mi gtsang dngos po len byed kyang // yid
275a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nor bu thob pa bzhin// shin tu dga' bas 'dzin byed pas// sems kyis cung zad gtong mi byed// 'di lta bu yi ma rabs dag/ khyim nas rab tu byung nas ni// spyod pa dag kyang bsrungs pa dang / 
275a7(dkon brtsegs): chos gos lhung bzed 'dzin byed kyang // cha byad tsam dang ldan pas na// yang dag shes rab ci yang med// kha spu dag ni bregs gyur kyang // sdig pa'i sems ni mi spong zhing // dge slong ma yin pa yi chos
275a8(dkon brtsegs): log lta rtag tu lhung gyur na// rab dben mya ngan 'das pa'i lam// de dag rab tu nyams par 'gyur// dge sbyong mngon 'du bya ba yi// 'bras bu dag kyang 'thob mi 'gyur// ma rig nyon mongs rnams
275b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang ni rdul tsam nyams par mi 'gyur ro// grong khyer dag tu rnam rgyu zhing // rang nyid dben pa'i bsngags brjod kyang // skyes bu blun po blo med pas// yang dag bgrod pa shes mi 'gyur// sems kyi/ 
275b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa ci yod pa// de dag thams cad mi dge yin// rnyed pa 'dod pa'i rgyu yi phyir// dgon pa dag na gnas byed kyi// mya ngan 'das pa yang dag rgyu// bslab pa'i phyir ni ma yin no// rmugs dang
275b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyid la rab tu gdu// lus ni ji ltar bde snyam nas// rtag tu de lta'i bsos po dag/ bsgrub pa la ni mos par byed// dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag tu// lo ni mang por gnas byed kyang // phyin log
275b4(dkon brtsegs): lta bar gyur pa'i phyir// mya ngan 'das lam stor bas na/ nams kyang dge sbyong lam dag gis// 'bras bu dag ni thob mi 'gyur// yang dag lta ba rab nyams shing // tshul
275b5(dkon brtsegs): khrims dag dang 'gal byas pas// gos bzang dag gis lu/ sa brgyan par// de la shin tu sred par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i bde ba rnams la ni// rtag tu sred pa skye bar byed// gal
275b6(dkon brtsegs): te grong khyer zhugs na yang // nga rgyal mtshan ma ston byed cing // lus kyi las ni mi srung bas// spyod lam dag la gnas mi byed// res 'ga' grong khyer zhugs nas ni// rgyu tshe rang nyid 'di skad du/ 
275b7(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag ni// ri phug dag ni gang yin pa// khyed rnams 'di ltar shes par gyis// de ni bdag gi gnas yin te// mthon dman ran par lta ba dang // 'gre gom tshul la gnas
275b8(dkon brtsegs): so zhes// tha dad mtshan ma'i tshig brjod de// dgra bcom pa yi rtags bstan pas// khyim pa dag ni ji snyed pa// phan tshun du ni 'di skad du// dgon pa'i dge slong gang yin pa// yang dga'ang
276a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin zhes zer// res 'ga' dgon pa de dag na// gnas par gyur pa de yi tshe// gal te gzhan dag 'ongs gyur na// 'di lta bu ni ston par byed// bdag ni dgon gnas 'di dag/ 
276a2(dkon brtsegs): tu ba nyin mtshan 'chag par byed ce'am// yang na rtswa 'jam gting nas ni// 'dir ni 'dug par byed ces zer// res 'ga' grong khyer zhugs gyur nas// khyim pas der ni phyin pa'i tshe// g.yo sgyu nan
276a3(dkon brtsegs): tan 'di skad du// bde 'am zhes ni 'dri bar byed// 'jig rten pa yi 'du 'dzi'i gtam// rgyal po'i chom rkun la sogs pas// sna tshogs dge ni brjod par byed// res 'ga' chags pa'i sems/ 
276a4(dkon brtsegs): dag gis// bud med rnams kyi mdun dag tu// thabs ni rnam pa/ sna tshogs kyis// rang gi yon tan brjod par byed// bdag ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi// bsod nams zhing ni chen
276a5(dkon brtsegs): por byed// bdag ni rgyal thabs rab spangs nas// rab tu byung nas lam bsgoms yin// btsun mo dang ni sras rnams kyang // mtho ris skye bar gyur zhes zer// de dag de skad thos nas ni// 
276a6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu gus pa rab bskyed de// gos zas dang ni btung ba dag/ sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par byed// btsun pas thugs rje rab dgongs shing // bdag cag thad du yang gshegs zer// ro zhim dag
276a7(dkon brtsegs): la zhen chags shing // nyes dmigs rnams ni mi shes pas// bdud kyis glags kyang rnyed 'gyur te// rus sbal rgya mos zin pa 'dra// dgon par gnas pa dag la yang // rnyed pa dag gis bsnyems
276a8(dkon brtsegs): par byed// dge slong brtson 'grus can dag la// brnyas shing skur pa 'debs par byed// rnyed dang grags pas sems rmongs pas// yang nas yang du zhen pa bskyed// lus ni yongs su gso ba'i
276b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir rtag tu g.yo sgyu spyod pas na// lus dang ngag gi mi dge'i las// yang nas yang du 'phel bar byed// gal te sbyin bdag dad pa yis// dang pa'i sems kyis mchod na yang // le lo snyoms
276b2(dkon brtsegs): las dbang gis ni// de yi bsod nams 'bri bar byed// skyes bu blun po de dag ni// rtag tu mi dge'i 'dod bskyed pas// stong pa nyid kyi chos 'di la// rjes 'thun bzod sems mthon mi 'gyur// gang
276b3(dkon brtsegs): dag nga yi bstan pa la// nyes dmigs de dag rab spangs nas// nan tan bag yod sgrub byed na// chos 'di thos par dka' mi 'gyur// rnyed pa dang ni mi rnyed dang // bstod smad sdug bsngal bde la sogs
276b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten chos kyis mi g.yos pas// chos 'di thos par da ka' mi 'gyur// lus la 'du shes mi gtsang dang // phung dpo rma yi 'du shes dang // zas ni ma bskus 'du shes dang // chos
276b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos par dka' mi 'gyur// gos bzang dag ni thob gyur kya nga // dregs pa dag ni mi skye zhing // ngo tsha dgab pa'i phyir gyon pa// chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur// gzugs
276b6(dkon brtsegs): dang stobs ni mi bsnyems shing // zas la chags pa med pa dang // srog gnas phyir ni gang zag// chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur// sred pa rnams ni stong shes nas// 'dod pa dag la blang der
276b7(dkon brtsegs): med rtag tu stong dben gang spyod pa// chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur// dpag tshad gcig 'das ri khrod du// gcig pu 'dug nas mnyam gzhag cing // 'dus byas bdag med gang rtogs
276b8(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur// mi gzang skye ba'i mtha' dag dang // mig 'jug mtshan nyid rtogs byed cing // mi gtsang lam ni gang bsgrub pa// chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ 
277a1(dkon brtsegs): rna bsna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad kun kyang de bzhin no// de bzhin ma 'ongs dus kyi che// dge slong dag ni chad med
277a2(dkon brtsegs): snyed/ brtson pa dang ni le lo can// thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// dge dang mi dge'i grogs po dag/ sgrub pa dang ni mi bsgrub pa// yid ches pa dang yid mi ches// thams cad de bzhin shes
277a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyis// dge dang mi dge'i grogs po dag/ mi gzad lam ni gang yin pa// sgrub pa dang ni mi bsgrub pa// thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// gang zhig byang chub rab mos shing // zla gcig
277a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gsum 'das nas ni// dus gzhan phyir ni gang ldog pa/ thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// gang zhig chos dri thos gyur nas// mos pa'i sems ni gang skyes pa// gal te/ 
277a5(dkon brtsegs): nyams par gyur na yang // slar ni dang ba thob par 'gyur// gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas// bag med spong b.rami byed na// mdo 'di sangs rgyas dka' ba yin// de snyam du ni
277a6(dkon brtsegs): sems par 'gyur// gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas// bdud kyis yongs su gang bzung ba// dang po dad pa skyes gyur kyang // phyis ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur// gang zhig chos la ma mos pa// mi
277a7(dkon brtsegs): bden grags dang rnyed pa tshol// grong khyer grong brdal rab rgyu zhing // gzugs rnams dang ni ting 'dzin dang // kun 'dzin 'od zer bsngags brjod dang // de yis yang dag rtogs mi 'gyur// 'dod pa/ 
277a8(dkon brtsegs): / lnga pos bcings pa dang // 'jig rten las ni 'dod tshol ba// brjod pa dag ni rtogs byed pas// stong nyid bsgom la skur pa 'debs// dran dang shes rab sems med pas// tshe tshad bar du don med/ 
277b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das// blun pos stong pa'i chos spong ba// de ni tshul khrims gegs byas pas// mnar med dag tu ltung bar gyur// nams kyang mtho ris yong mi skye// gang gis skad cig gcig la ni// mchod rten
277b2(dkon brtsegs): stong ni byas pa bas// gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas// tshig bzhi tshogs bcad gcig 'dzin 'phags// me tog phreng ba brgya stong dag/ sangs rgyas mchod rten mchod pa bas// gang zhig mdo sde/ 
277b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos nas// tshig bzhi tshigs bcad sems pa 'phags// gang gis rin chen mchod rten dag/ gang+gA'i bye snyad byas pa bas// gang zhig tha na skad cig tsam// mdo sde 'di sems khyad par
277b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags// sangs rgyas zhing ni 'bum phrag brgya// me tog gtor nas mchod pa bas// gang gis tha na skad cig tsam/ mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags// chos gos 'bum phrag
277b5(dkon brtsegs): brgya mang po// sangs rgyas rnams la phul ba bas// gang gi sa tha na skad cig tsam// mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'a phags// sangs rgyas spyan ni rnam dga' phags// mi mkhyen
277b6(dkon brtsegs): mi gzigs gang yang med// gang gis mdo sde 'di mos na// sangs rgyas spyan ni thob par 'gyur// 'dres pa'i bskal pa grangs med che// sangs rgyas mar me mdzad pa byung // nga ni drang srong khye'ur gyur
277b7(dkon brtsegs): me tog thogs nas mchod pa byas// shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba// byang chub snying po la 'dug nas// mdo sde 'di ni ston 'gyur zhes// nga la byang chub lung yang bstan// khyod ni de tshe gzhon nur gyur// nga/ 
277b8(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa thos gyur nas// dga' zhing dang ba'i sems bskyed de// thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad du// gal te bram ze khye'u ni// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya che// bdag ni de yi grogs gyur/ 
278a1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu yang // chos kyi mdo sder ba 'dzin cing // bsrung bar shog ces smon lam btab// sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de yis// 'od zer ston pa
278a2(dkon brtsegs): mdo 'di ni// ji skad gsung bzhi nide yi tshe// bram ze'i khye'u gzhon nu gnyis// legs par nyan cing yongs su bzung // nga sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe// me tog ut+pal dag gis ni// sangs rgyas de la
278a3(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byas// de tshe khyod kyang dar 'dug ste// 'di skad du ni smon lam btab// nga yi bstan pa tha ma la// mdo sde 'di ni rab bzung nas// rgya cher ston par shog ces smras// gang gis chos 'di thos
278a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// zhe sdang sems ni mi bskyed par// gzung 'dzin klu/ dag cing gang 'don pa// de nas skyes bu dam pa yin// khyod kyis ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe// thos dka'i chos 'di rab gzung
278a5(dkon brtsegs): nis sems can dag la don gyi tshul// rgya cher dbyen bstan par bya// ngas kyang 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe// yang ngag chos ni nub pa na// 'od zer bstan pa'i mdo 'di ni// sems
278a6(dkon brtsegs): can dag la rgya cher bstan// blun pos nan tan mi sgrub pas// 'di la skur pa 'debs par byed// ngas ni de skad thos gyur nas// zhe sdang dag ni bskyed mi byed// nga ni rtag tu bzod bsgoms nas// 'jig
278a7(dkon brtsegs): rten rnams la phan 'dogs byed // bzod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pas na// mtshan dang dpe byad dag gis brgyan// gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas sku// gya nem yongs su rdzogs gyur cig// gse
278a8(dkon brtsegs): gyi kha dog rnam dga' ngags// bzod pa'i stobs las byung bar ltos// nga yi zhabs ni sa reg nas// zhing ni tshad med g.yo byed kyang // sems can rnams ni mi ltung ba// bzod pa'i stobs las
278b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad skyes// nga yi spu dung gcig nas ni// 'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas// thams cad gsal bar ga byed pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // srin po shin tu 'jigs pa'i
278b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs// srog chags gzi brjid 'phrog byed pa// ngal rtag tu gus pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // nga yi 'khor ni ji snyed pa// sems ni rab tu dul gyur nas// de bzhin
278b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs la gus pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // rol mo'i sgra ni brgya stong dag/ 'khor 'dus chen po'i nang dag tu// sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags brjod pa// thams
278b4(dkon brtsegs): cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // klu yi rgyal po brgya stong dag/ rab tu gdug cing 'jigs rung ba// sangs rgyas mthong na dga' ba yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs
278b5(dkon brtsegs): las byung // srin po gnod sbyin la sogs pas// me tog/ phreng ba brgya stong thogs// 'ongs nas nga la mchod byed pa thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // zhing ni brgya
278b6(dkon brtsegs): stong tshad med par// bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// nga yi yon tan bsngags pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lto 'phye dang ni lus srul po// brgya stong
278b7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni 'dus gyur nas// me tog gtor nas nga mched pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // gnod sbyin rgyal po la sogs pa// bye ba brgya phrag drug cu rnams// 'ongs nas ngal
278b8(dkon brtsegs): gang mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // gzhan yang klu yi rgyal po ni// man ngag la sogs pas// mu tig dmar pos mchod pa// thams cad bzed mchog stongs
279a1(dkon brtsegs): las byung // du mu ru dang shi khyi ba'i// brgya stong snyad ni 'dus gyur nas// rol mo dag gis nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lto 'phye dang ni lus
279a2(dkon brtsegs): srul po// brgya stong skad ni 'dus gyur nas// me tog spos kyis nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // sa chen 'dzin pa klu yi rgyal// lus phyed dag ni rab bstan nas// 
279a3(dkon brtsegs): thal sbyar nga la gus pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lus phyed sku gcan 'dzin la sogs// bye ba phrag ni brgya stong rnams// dang ba'i sems kyis nga mchod pa/ 
279a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // gzhon nu khyod kyis 'di ltar ltos// sangs rgyas 'od zer gang reg pa// sdug bsngal bral nas bde thob pa// thams cad bzod mchog
279a5(dkon brtsegs): stobs las byung // sa mu ta dang rlung gi lha// brgya stong nam mkha' gang ba ni// spos kyis char 'bab pa mchod pa / thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lha yi
279a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ni brgya stong dag/ lha yi me tog gtor mchod de// sred spangs sangs rgyas bsten byed pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // khyod kyis sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dang // sbyin
279a7(dkon brtsegs): dang tshul khrims rab bsgrags nas// thams cad kun tu thos mdzad pa// bzed mchog stobs las byung bar ltos// phung po khams kyi sgra dag dang // bden pa bzhi yi sgra dag gis// thams
279a8(dkon brtsegs): cad kun zho mdzad pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' la mig zad mtha' dag dang // rab zhi'i sgra ni thos gyur te// skye ba'i mtha' yang
279b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin no// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig ni rgyu dang rkyen// de las skyes dang 'gro 'ong med// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las
279b2(dkon brtsegs): mig zhi rtogs byed na// sangs rgyas rnams kyang de las skyes// de skad du ni zos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' la mig zad mtha' zhibs// sangs rgyas rnams ni de
279b3(dkon brtsegs): las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mi zad rab ni bas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu
279b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig skyes mtha' ni/ bas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du/ ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// ma pa
279b5(dkon brtsegs): las mig 'jug rabazhin// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul ste/ khas kyis ni// mkha' las mig ni skye zhi bas// sangs rgyas
279b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du yang thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig dben rab zhi pas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par
279b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// rna ba sna lnga lus dang yid// gzugs sgra de ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no// 'dod chags gti mug khong khro dang // 'cha ba dang
279b8(dkon brtsegs): phrag dog g.yo sgra dang // khengs dang nga rgyal la sogs pa// rgya cher bshad pa'ang de bzhin no// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa de lta bu'i chos khyad par du 'phags pa thos pas rab tu dga'
280a1(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur nas thar mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang gi gdugs la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'khor mang po dang / 
280a2(dkon brtsegs): bcas par gdugs chod la spyan 'dren na thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bdag gis sbyar ba'i gdugs gsol bar ci gnang / de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od
280a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa de'i bsam po rnam par dag pa dang / sems can tshad med pa rnams la yang phan gdags par 'gyur bar thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ cang mi
280a4(dkon brtsegs): gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan la/ sa langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ rab tu dag
280a5(dkon brtsegs): bas rang gi khyim du song ste/ rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lto 'phye la sogs pas rgyal po'i khab grong khyer chen po'i bzhi mdor
280a6(dkon brtsegs): dar gyi lding khang bres te/ lding khang de yang shin tu mtho zhing rgya che la thams cad kun tu khyab pa/ gser gyi tsong tsong 'dra bas bres pa/ nor bu rin po che'i phreng ba spangs pa/ seng ge'i gdan dang / 
280a7(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi phreng ba lu gu rgyud can 'bum phrag brgya stong sna tshogs kyis brgyan/ gzhan yang rin po che'i me tog kha dog khyad par du 'phags pa'i phung po dag chal du bkram mo// me tog tsam pa ka dang / 
280a8(dkon brtsegs): a ti mug ta la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba tshad med grangs med pa yang rin po che'i lding khang gi nang thams cad dang 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun tu khyab par spangs shing / rgyan du
280b1(dkon brtsegs): bris so// gzhan yang de nang du'i stan rnams bshams nas rin po che'i spos kyi byo lo ka dang / dum ca dang / tsan dan dang / gur gum rnam par dag cing yid dga' bar byed pa sna tshogs bsregs so// 
280b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du slar spos mchog dam pa sna tshogs kyang mchod pa'i yo byad du sbar to// gzhan yang spos kyi chus lam srang rnams kun tu khyab par chag chag btab po// sa gzhi kun tu me tog sna tshogs
280b3(dkon brtsegs): cal du bkram mo// de ji 'i lta bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi bu modapa sgra gcan 'dzin gyi bu mo grangs med tshad med pa yang rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/ byang chub kyi rgyu mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir dar 'ongs nas/ 
280b4(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer chen po de'i nang du 'phags pa de rab tu brgyan to// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas grong khyer de kun tu khyab par brgya na zhing yongs su dag pa dang / gdugs tshod la bab par rig
280b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom/ ldan 'das sems can rnams la sman par mdzad pa'i slad/ du gong khyer chen por gshegs su gsol// de nas bcom
280b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs gcig tu grong khyer du gshegs nas/ sgo'i thim pa la zhabs bzhag ma thag tu grong khyer chen po de'i sa chen po yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
280b7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med pa yang rab tu g.yos par gyur te/ de'i tshe long ba dag gis mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur/ sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde ba thob par gyur/ 'o na
280b8(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams ni rna bas sgra thos par gyur/ byad bzhin mi sdug pa rnams ni byad bzhin bzang po thob par gyur/ nor med pa rnams ni nor dang ldan par gyur/ bu med pa rnams ni bu yod par gyur/ gos med pa
281a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni gos thob par gyur/ rin po che med pa rnams ni rin po che thob par gyur/ nye ba shes med pa rnams ni nye bshes dang ldan par gyur/ lus kyi rgyan thams cad kyis ngos
281a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams ni lus kyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// gzhan yang ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / na tse dang / rma bya dang / ka ri ka la sogs pa bya'i tshogs mang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba
281a3(dkon brtsegs): dang rab tu dga' ba'i sems ni bskyed pas/ sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba mchog dam pa phyung ste/ gang gis sgra de thos pa yang yid shin tu bde bar gyur to// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul
281a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi stobs kyis tsam pa ka'i ljon shing tshad med pa snyed mngon par sprul pas/ sems can brgya stong mang po rnams me tog yongs su dag pa de dag dang / gzhan yang spos mchog dam
281a5(dkon brtsegs): pa thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te mchod pa byas so// gzhan yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo dbang phyugathob pa brgya stong du ma mu tig dmar po dang / tsan dan gyi phye
281a6(dkon brtsegs): ma thogs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu dga' bas mngon par gtor to// lha ma yin mang po dang / gzhan yang lha mang po rnams rin po che'i gdugs gser dang dngul gyis rab tu brgyan pa
281a7(dkon brtsegs): thogs nas bar snang la 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du khebs par g.yogs so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis can dan gyi ljon shing dang / gser gyi ljon shing
281a8(dkon brtsegs): dang rin po che'i snod dang / gos la sogs pa'i ljon shing tshad med dpag tu med pa'i rin po che rnams kyis brgyan pa/ me tog dang / lo ma phun sum tshogs shing rgyas pa sems can thams cad kyi
281b1(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thun mong du mngon par grub pa/ rlung gi ngang langs pa tsam gyis spos mchog dam pa'i dris sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad med pa rnams kun du khyab par gang bar mngon par
281b2(dkon brtsegs): sprul to// sems can brgya stong tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang dus gcig tu me tog thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te// de bzhin du sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa tshad med/ 
281b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis mngon par sprul pa sha steg go// gang dag ci dang ci smon par byed pa de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang gis de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du re
281b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das grong khyer dugashegs pa'i tshe/ 'khor 'dus pa thams cad namapa' la sa khyad par du 'phags pa'i sgras bsam gyis mi khyab par
281b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ston pa'i sgra thos par gyur kyang de gang nas byung ba rngan sa par yang ma gyur la/ tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong / du mas kyang chos rnams yang dag par bstan par gyur to// 
281b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags zad mtha' steng dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// 
281b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad gags par 'gyur// 'dod chags skye mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// / 
281b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// 'dod chags mtha' ni stong dben dang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub 'thob par 'gyur
282a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// 'dod chags 'jug pa stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub 'thob/ 
282a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// 'dod chags med cing stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub 'thob
282a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// 'dod chags med cing stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub 'thob
282a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' lus sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// 'dod chags ra ba 'gog stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub
282a5(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur// zhe sdang gti mug khong khro 'chab ser sna// g.yo sgyu khengs dang nga rgyal mya ngan dang // sdug bsnga la kun 'byung 'gog pa lam sems can// khye'u dang bu mo bud
282a6(dkon brtsegs): med gang dang ni// skyes pa gso ba dag dang dbang po drug/ yul drug 'byung chen bzhi yi dngos po dang // 'jig rten sdug bsngal phung po khams rnams dang // 'jig rten skye sgra ming sogs kyang de
282a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin// chos rje dam pa'i chos ni bstan pas na// sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha yi 'jig rten kun kyang thos gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thig la gnas par mos// / 
282a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// bcom ldan sprin stobs dag la rab mos pas// sbyin pa'i stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par 'gyur// 
282b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// bcom ldan tshul khrims rnam dag rab mos pas// tshul khrims stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par 'gyur/ 
282b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ni gong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// bcom ldan bzod pa dag la rab mos pas// bzod pa'i stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par 'gyur// 
282b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// bcom ldan brtson 'grus dag la rab mos pas// brtson 'grus stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par 'gyur// 
282b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni/ 'di skad grags par 'gyur// bcom ldan bsam gta/ na dag la rab mos pas// bsam gtan stobs kyis byang chub
282b5(dkon brtsegs): brnyes par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' la sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// bcom ldan shes rab dag la rab mos pas// shes rab stobs kyis byang chub
282b6(dkon brtsegs): brnyes par 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul mngon shes yon tan gnas shes stobs// thabs dang gzugs kyi stobs dang grags pa'i stobs// las dang rten 'byung yan lag dang dang thos// stong dang 'thun pa
282b7(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang rab zhi stobs// rab du ba yang dag mtha' dang bden mkhas stobs// 'jigs dang dga' dang phan 'dogs la mos dang // byams dang snying rje dga' snyoms bzod 'tshe med// stong dang mtshan
282b8(dkon brtsegs): ma med sogs kyang de bzhin// stobs bcu 'phags pa'i mnga' bdag lha yi gtso// yon tan grags pa dpe zla ma mchis pa// grong khyer mchog gshegs zhabs ni bzhag pa'i che// sems can
283a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la rgya cher phan pa mdzad// sngon chad srid gsum las dge rab bsgrub pa// lha yi dge ba sna tshogs 'phel bar mdzad// 'jig rten thams cad kun ni rab tu bkur/ 
283a2(dkon brtsegs): nga yi bstan pa 'di thos thams cad dga'// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs nas zhabs bzhag che// grong khyer sa chen dag ni rab tu g.yos// bcom ldan rnam dag 'od zer mthong bas na// ngo mtshar
283a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dzin mi dga' gang yang med// bcom ldan grong gshegs phan pa cher mdzad pas// lha mi'i 'khor rnams sems ni dga' bar gyur// sa dang mkha' 'gro dag gis srid gsum na// bcom
283a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan shin tu bde zhes bsngags par gyur// bcom ldan zhabs dkyi 'khor lo sa gzhag ste// rnam dag 'od zer kun gsal ngo mtshar gyur// rta ni cang shes grong khyer sgra snyan phyung / 
283a5(dkon brtsegs): bya tshogs dag kyang mkha' la rab tu dga'// gzhan yang rab dang / bud med mang po yi// lag dang rkang gi gdub 'khor phreng / ba dang // de bzhin rin chen rgyan ni sna tshogs las// ma bkrol
283a6(dkon brtsegs): bar yang rang nyid sgra snyan byung // so sor phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam brjod cing // skad 'thun bkra shis mchog gi bsngags pa brjod// 'o na long dbang po ma tshang dbang po thob// thams cad bcom ldan
283a7(dkon brtsegs): khyad 'phags 'bras bu dbang // bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs tshe kun dga' bas// lha mis me tog kun gtor mchod pa byas// mkha' las sgra snyan kun tu byung bas na// lha tshogs tshad med
283a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' bar gyur// gzhan yang sems can dran pa nyams pa dang // smos 'khrugs rab zhi phan tshun gtam snyan brjod// bud med gang sbram mya ngan 'jigs gyur pa// 'od zer sprin gyis de// 
283b1(dkon brtsegs): bathob par gyur// skyes pa bud med ngo tsha khrel bcas pa// dri ma spangs pa'i chos dag rab bshad pas// thams cad dga' nas dag pa'i sems bskyed de// thub mchog zhabs la spyi btung phyag byas
283b2(dkon brtsegs): nas kha cig bcom ldan bla med lam mchog tshol// kha cig byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos tshol// bcom ldan grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pas na// bcom ldan zhal du blta zhing rang
283b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid dga'// bcom ldan mkhyen pas sa yi spyod rtogs pas// 'jig rten rjes 'thun phan pa rab tu mdzad// chos kyi nor mchog byang chub sems dpa' byin// rin chen mchog ni sems can rnams
283b4(dkon brtsegs): la btang // bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// mkha' la sgra ni 'di skad byung // gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin// bcom ldan grong khyer
283b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i tshe// mkha' la sgra ni 'di skad byung // gang zhig/ mog skye mtha' sred pa// sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin/ gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// sangs rgyas yid ches mi
283b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs so mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na// shin tu dang ba'i rgyun mi 'chad// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// chos la yid ches mi 'jigs thob// mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na// shin tu dang ba'i rgyun
283b7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'chad// gang zhig mig 'dasa' sred pa// dge 'dun yid ches mi 'jigs thob// mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na// shin tu dang ba'i rgyun mi 'chad// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// tshul khrims
283b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin med thob par 'gyur// mi gzad mthar ni blta bas na// shin tu dang ba rgyun mi 'chad// gang zhig mi gzad mtha' sred pa// ngan 'gro'i 'dod chags spong bar 'gyur// mig zad mtha' ni blta bas na
284a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags rgyun ni spong bar byed// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// ngan 'gro'i zhe sdang spong bar 'gyur// mig zad mthar ni blta bas na// zhe sdang rgyun ni spong bar byed// gang zhig
284a2(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mtha' sred pa// ngan 'gro'i gti mug spong bar 'gyur// migazang mthar ni lta bas na// gti mug rgyun ni spong bar byed// gang zhig migazang mtha' sred pa// byang chub ye shes dag la gnas/ 
284a3(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mthar ni blta bas na// byang chub ye shes rgyun mi 'chang // mig skye mtha' dang mig gi mtha'// 'jug pa dang ni rab dben dang // yod pa nyid du mi 'gyur dang // mi skye rab tu zhi ba dang // 'di la sogs
284a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgo rnams kyang // thams cad mig zang 'dra bar bstan// gang zhig mig zang mthar srid pa// de ni rtag tu the tshom med// de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par gyu
284a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mig gi mtha' sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tshom mang / de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'apar 'gyur// gang zhig mig gi 'jug sred pa// den rtag tu the tshom
284a6(dkon brtsegs): med 'di ltar 'tshem med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur// gang nig mig gi 'jug sred pa// don rtag tu tshom med// de lta ma tsham med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thong par
284a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// gang nig mig gi skye sred pa// don rtag tu chem med// de lta chen med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phru 'dzub par 'gyur// gang dag mig mi myi sred pa// don drug tu chem med// de ltar/ 
284a8(dkon brtsegs): tsham med pa byer// sa sa rgyam rdzu 'phrul ma bar 'gyur// gang nig tshig med la sred pa// dod tug ma med// de kyi chem med pa'i phyi// sangs rgyam rdzu 'phru 'thob par 'gyur/ 
284b1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mig gi zhag sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tshom med// de ltar the tshom med nga'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur// rna ba sna lce lus drang yid// gzugs sgra di ro rog bya nas// sgra dang ming
284b2(dkon brtsegs): gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// mig skye dpag med gang bskyed pa// ye shes dpag med bskyed par byed// ye shes dpag tu med pa'i phyir// chos 'di bstan pa'ang de bzhin no// 
284b3(dkon brtsegs): mig zad dpe med gang shes pa// mig la sgrib pa med par 'gyur// de ltar sgrib pa med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thogs med thob// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra do ro reg bya nas/ 
284b4(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar b.rabya/ bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// sems ca ngan dag ni brgya stong snyed// mkha' las chos bshad sgra thos nas/ 
284b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas yon tan the tshom med// kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang // sangs rgyas ye shes 'jigs mi byed/ gang zhig 'dod chags sems byung yang // sangs rgyas ye shes
284b6(dkon brtsegs): stor mi 'gyur// kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang // bla med ye shes tshal byed cing // ma 'dres chos ni bsgrub pa dang // nyan thos theg pa mos mi byed// byis pa bsam gtan bsgom byed kyang // 
284b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan bde la mos pas na// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rabarnyes nas// dge slong 'bras bu thob snyam sems// byis pa bsam gtan bsgom byed kyang // mig zad mtha' ni shes med na// bskal pa brgya stong
284b8(dkon brtsegs): bsgom byed kyang // de la rnam grol ci yang med// skye ba len pa thams cad ni// de la zhen chags bskyed par byed// gal te skye zhing stong rig na// mthong ba rnams ni rnam dag 'gyur// gang zhig bsam
285a1(dkon brtsegs): gtan bani bsgrubs kyang // mig zad mtha' shes med gyur na// bskal pa brgya stong lon kyang ni// bsam gtan yongs su dag mi 'gyur// gang zhig nyer 'dogs thong gyur kyang // 
285a2(dkon brtsegs): zad mtha'i shes pa 'thob mi 'gyur// zad pa thob pa ma shes phyir// zad pa thob pa rtag tu spyod// gang zhig 'du shes nan byed pa// 'du shes zad mtha'i shes pa med// 'du shes zad pa ma shes phyir/ 
285a3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu 'du shes zad la spyod// gang zhig 'jig rten zhen chags pa// 'jig rten zad mtha' shes pa dang // 'jig rten zad mtha' ma shes phyir// rtag tu 'jig rten zag la spyod// gang ni ga zag bcas
285a4(dkon brtsegs): sems la gnas// sems zad mtha' ye shes pa med// sems zad pa ni ma shes phyir// rtag tu sems ni zag la spyod// gang zhig zag bcas chos la gnas// chos zad mtha' ye shes
285a5(dkon brtsegs): pa med// chos zad pa ni ma shes phyir// rtag tu zag bcas chos la spyod// sbyangs pa'i chos la gnas gyur kyang / mig zang mtha' ye shes med na// mig zad pa ni mi shes phyir
285a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag sbyangs la gnas ma yin// kha dog bsgyur gos bgos gyur kyang // mi go zad mtho' ye shes med na// mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir// yang dag chos gos bgos ma yin// ya rabs
285a7(dkon brtsegs): rigs su skyes gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' yo shes med na// migazad pa ni ma shes phyir// de ni dag pa'i rigs ma yin// 'khor mang dag ni bdog gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' mi shes med na// 
285a8(dkon brtsegs): myur dung ngan 'gror ltung 'gyur te// 'khor dag gis ni skyob mi nus// sgra yi rigs pa mkhas gyur kyang // mig zang mtha' ye shes med na// migazad pa ni ma shes phyir// sgra yi rig pa rtogs ma yin/ 
285b1(dkon brtsegs): bzo rnams la ni mkhas gyur kyang // mi gzad mtha' ye shes med na// mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir// de ni bzol ma khas ma yin// dI ba mang la mkhas gyur zhing // yi ge gcig gis rnam 'byed kyang // 
285b2(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mtha' ye shes med na// de ni don mthun bshad ma yin// mkhas pa'i rjes su slob byed kyang // gsang dang gsang min mo shes shing // mig zad mtha' yi shed med na// chos ni rtogs
285b3(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ro// brjod pa sna tshogs rgyang pan dang // chos rnams rab tu shes gyur kyang // migazad mtha' ye shes med na// khri shing stug por lhung ba 'dra// sgra yi rig pa ma pas gyur zhing / 
285b4(dkon brtsegs): dge dang mi dge'i rtags ston kyang // tshig 'bru yi ge'i sgras dad dang // klog dang 'don pa'i mthar thug dang // mig zang mtha' nim shes na// de dag rnams ni shes med na// de dag
285b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni shes mad yin// bud med dag gi mtshan ma dang // tshig mkhan rmongs par byed pa dang // lus nyes ngal sos chu sa rnams dang // mkhyud dpyad dag la mkhas gyur kyang / 
285b6(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na// de dag rnams ni shed med yin// gzhung lugs brgya mang ston byed cing // yi ge 'bru gcig mi brjed kyang // mig zad mtha' ni mi shes na// bshad pa de ni don
285b7(dkon brtsegs): med yin// de bzhin mig skye mtha' dag dang // mig mtha' dang ni 'jug pa nas// rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang // de bzhin du ni rig par gyis// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra de ro reg bya
285b8(dkon brtsegs): nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// sgra yi reg pa klog 'don cing // de yi don ni rtogs gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' nom shes na// de ni nams kyang dman pa yin// 
286a1(dkon brtsegs): smyung ba ni dag ni 'don byed cing // gsang sngags dag ni rtogs gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na// de ni nams kyang dman pa yin// de bzhin mig gi skye mtha' dag/ 
286a2(dkon brtsegs): mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas// rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang // de bzhin nyid du rig par gyis// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad/ 
286a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin sbyar bar bya'o// // bam po bzhi pa// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// sems can dag ni tshad med snyed// mkha' las chos bstan sgra thos pas
286a4(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mtha' yi shes pa thob// bcom ldan grong khyer gshe gus pa'i tshe// sems can dag ni tshad med snyed// mkha' las chos bstan sgra thos pas// mig gi rang bzhin rtogs
286a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur// stong dang bdag med rang rtogs pas// thams cad rnam dag mig thob gyur// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra de ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // 
286a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// 'dod sdang gti mug khong khro dang // nga rgyal khengs dang g.yo sgyu nas// bag med pa yi bar du yang // de bzhin du ni rig par gyis// bcom ldan gong khyer gshegs
286a7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i tshe// sems can dag ni tshad med snyed// steng gi na mkha' dag las ni// sangs rgyas mtshan ni sna tshogs thos// kha cig 'dod chags 'jigs pa yi// dpe zla med pa'i ming yang thos// kha cig/ 
286a8(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang 'jigs byed cing // 'jig rten phan 'dogs ming yang thos// kha cig gti mug rab rtogs shing // nga rgyal 'dul ba'i ming dag thos// kha cig 'jig rten dag la ni// rab zhi ston pa'i 'dren
286b1(dkon brtsegs): ming thos// kha cig shes rab dag bstan nas// 'jig rten phan 'dogs ming dag thos// kha cig thabs dag rab bstan nas// sems can phan 'dogs ming dag thos// kha cig bdud ni rab btul
286b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang kho na 'dzin med pa'i ming dag thos// kha cig gsung rab chos dag gis// rnam grol bstan pa'i ming dag thos// kha cig sems can sdug bsngal ba// rgya cher sgrol ba'i ming dag thos// kha
286b3(dkon brtsegs): cig mi yi gtso bo yis// 'jig rten sgrol ba'i ming dag thos// ming ni de dag thos gyur nas// thams cad rnam dag ming thob gyur// namakha' dang ni rgya mtsho'i chu// ri rab lhun po'i bar du
286b4(dkon brtsegs): yang thams cad gzhal du rung srid kyi// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thugs mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig zad nges pa thob gyur na/ chos sku mngon par grub pa dka' mi 'gyur// gang zhig chos
286b5(dkon brtsegs): sku mchog ni grub gyur na// kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med 'gro kha par 'gyur// gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob/ des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur// gang zhig
286b6(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde dpag med ge gyur pas// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dka' mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig skye nges pa 'thob gyur na// chos sku mngon par 'grub pa dka' mi 'gyur// gang zhig chos sku mchog ni
286b7(dkon brtsegs): grub gyur na// kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med 'thob par 'gyur// gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpago med thob// des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur// gang zhig mdo sde dpag med go gyur pas// sangs
286b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par dka' mi 'gyur// de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos dag nas// sgra rnams dang ni mig gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin du ni sbyar bar bya// de tshe/ 
287a1(dkon brtsegs): sa chen dag ni rab tu g.yos// rgya mtshor rnams kyang ni de bzhin no// lha ma yin dang lha ni mang po rnams// thams cad rab du dga' ba skyes par gyur// bdud dang bdud dpung gso sgyu
287a2(dkon brtsegs): rab bcom nas// thams cad sangs rgyas bkod pa sgrub par mos// lha rnams so sor gzhal med khang zhugs nas// phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam ni 'di skad smos// 'dran pa dang ni 'jig rten byung bas na// 
287a3(dkon brtsegs): lha mi thams cad la ni phan pa mdzad// sa d+ma'i lha 'khor gzhal med khang gnas nas// dang ba'i sems kyis dga' nas 'di skad du// 'dren pa 'jig rten deng byung shin tu legs// 'jig rten kun bde'i rgyu
287a4(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu mdzad// mkha spyod pa yi lha rnams de thos nas/ thams cad dga' nas rab tu dang bskyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'dzig/ 
287a5(dkon brtsegs): rten phan mdzad zer// rgyal tshon ris bzhi'i lha ni de thos nas/ thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang bskyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig
287a6(dkon brtsegs): rten phan mdzad zer// sum cu rtsa gsum lha ni de thos nas// thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang bskyes// khyod 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad
287a7(dkon brtsegs): ra 'thab bral lha dag de skad thos nas ni// thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// bdag cag
287a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems 'di rab bskyed nas// bcom ldan bla med mkhyen pa nye bar bgyi// lha mo gtso mchog la ni brten nas su// sems can thams cad sgrol bar bgyid ces zer// dga' ldan lha rnams de
287b1(dkon brtsegs): skad thos nas kyang // thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang bskyes// khAd bangags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten pan mdzad zer// bcom ldan 'das pa'i bskal pa bye bar
287b2(dkon brtsegs): ni spyod mchog khyad 'phags dpag med sngon bsgrubs nas// sems can sdug bsngal ba la bde lam bstan// 'khor bsgral nas mya ngan 'das las bkod// 'drul dga' lha rnams de skad thos nas
287b3(dkon brtsegs): mi thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang bsgres// khyad 'phags smra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jog rten pan mdzad zer// gnan 'phrul dbang byed lha ni de thos nas/ 
287b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang bskus// khyod 'phags s+thA stan sangs rgyas bsngags brjed nas// 'dren pa byung sa 'jig rten phan mdzang rjer// de bzhin gshegs pa skye shi'
287b5(dkon brtsegs): pas na// bdud dang mu stegs mang po pham par mdzad// bla rme/ byang chub dag ni yongs rdzogs nas// skye dgu grags nas pharol 'jog ces zer// tshangs ris lha rnams de skad chos
287b6(dkon brtsegs): nanas kyang // thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang bskyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// de bzhin gcig nas gcig tu sgra
287b7(dkon brtsegs): zos pas// tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams dga' nas 'di skad du// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan pa mdzad// bdud dpung 'jigs skrag mya ngan byed ces zer// srid pa'i rtse mo lha yo bar du yang
287b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas byung nas 'jig rten phan mdzad thos// de bzhin sman kun tu grags pas na// lha ma yin dag 'gribs shing lha rnams 'dol// bdud gyi khang pa dag ni yangs stongs shing // lha rnams
288a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ni rab tu rgyas par 'gyur// mi 'jigs stobs kyis log tshogs rab btul nas// byang chub chen po'i mchog ni myur du brnyes// de bzhin skad cig yud tsam lha rnams
288a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bcom ldan byung nas phan mdzad thos gyur pas// 'jig rten 'dren par mdzad pa shin tu legs// rnam dag ming ni sems can sbyin zhes zer/  'dod bye gshen pa'i / da sa yongs dug du la nam/ 
288a3(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang bsgom pa bshad thos pas// 'dod chags zhi ste ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// ne sdang dag gis gsungs pa rnams// byams pa bstan pa'i chos thos pas
288a4(dkon brtsegs): zhi sdang zhi ste ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs dpa'i tshe// gti mug dag gis gdungs pa rnams// shes rab chos ni bstan thos pas// gti mug zhi ste ma lus spangs// 
288a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// nga rgyal dag ni/ gdungs pa rnams// nga rgyal spangs pa'i chos thos pa// nga rgyal ni ste ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshes
288a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe// phrag dog dag gis gdungs pa rnams// phrag drog spangs pa'i chos thos pas// phrag dog ni ste ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// khong khro dag gis gdungs pa
288a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams// khong khro spangs pa'i chos thos pas// khong khri zhi ste ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// ser sna dag gis gdungs pa rnams// ser sna spangs pa'i chos thos pas/ 
288a8(dkon brtsegs): ser sna zhi ste ma lus spangs// gang zhig dul ba'i spyod grub pa// dpag med chos ni 'di thos pas// mang du thos pa'i mtshor zhugs pas// kun 'dzin sgo ni sgrub par byed// gzhan yang mkha' las
288b1(dkon brtsegs): sgra thos pas// me tog dag gis sangs rgyas mchod// yon tan khyad par 'phags bsgrub cing // snying rje chen po'i rdzu 'phrul ston// gzhan yang mkha' las sgra thos pas// bcom ldan sku dang skye gnas
288b2(dkon brtsegs): dang gdung rgyud dang ni gsung sgra rnams// khyad par 'phags nga'i bsngags pa brjod// sems can 'gro ba ji lta bar// rdzu 'phrul dag kyang ci rigs bshad// mig dang rna ba sna lce lus// gzugs
288b3(dkon brtsegs): dang sgra de la sogs dang // bskum pa dang ni brkyang ba dang // ston par mdzad pa khyad par 'phags// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'das pa na// 'jig rten sgron ma rab mdzad cing // gzugs ni mang po ston
288b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang // thams cad sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yin// snodadang snod min de rjes su// mi mthun chos ni ston mdzad pa sa sems can tshe rabs tshad med nas// sangs rgyas mcho
288b5(dkon brtsegs): par ma byas shing // dmu rgod gdul bar dka' ba la// sems can dmyal ba bshed mar mdzad// gang zhig las la rmongs gyur zhing // blta la brten nas spos dga' ba// bcom ldan
288b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag blta ba dang // spros pa zhi ba'i sgra thos mdzad// gzhan yang mkha' las ngo bo nyid// nges pa nyid du stong pa dang // 'gro 'ong med cing mtshan med dang // ci yang med pa'i sgra yang thos// gzhan yang
288b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can brgya stong dag/ mkha' las sha dang shes rab spyan// de bzhin chos kyi spyan bar du// yang dag ston pa'i sgra yang thos// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// tshul khrims ting 'dzin
288b8(dkon brtsegs): shes rab sgra// rnam grol rnam grol mthong ba'i sgra// ston pa dag kyang thos par gyur// sems can dag na ji snyed la// de bzhin rdzu 'phrul rab bstan nas// ji ltar rjes 'thun sgra skad kyis// yang
289a1(dkon brtsegs): dag chos ni bstan par mdzad// sems can la la gang zhig gis// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod bsgrub mos// rdzu 'phrul mos pa ji lta bzhin// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod sgra
289a2(dkon brtsegs): ston/ bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// sems can dbang po ji lta bzhin// rgya cher yang dag 'byed mdzad pas// lin 'dzin ston la dgod par mdzad// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// 
289a3(dkon brtsegs): drang po khams dang skye mched kyi// bcings dang grol dang nye ring dang // sa yi gnas skabs bye brag gi/ mtshan nyid ston pa thos par 'gyur// gzhan yang sa dang ye shes kyi// 'od zer chad med
289a4(dkon brtsegs): ston pa dang // nyon mongs bag chags spang ba dang // spangs dmin ston pa thos par gyur// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul sto/ das kyis ni// lha dang mi yi ngo bo nyid// las dang 'bras bu mi mtshung
289a5(dkon brtsegs): pas skye len tha dad thos par 'gyur// res 'ga' bung ming mdun dag tu// bud med brgyan pa'i lus sprub nas// mkha' las skyo ston sgra bsgrags pas// gang thos
289a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags sel bar mdzad// shA ri'i bu ni ji lta bzhin// shin tu dang ba skyes gyur pa// thugs rjes mos pa ji bzhin du// bla med chos ni ston par mdzad// mot+pal bu dang 'od srung dang / 
289a7(dkon brtsegs): ka pi na da dang kun dga' dang // 'od srung chen po dag dang ni// kun shes ko'u dri n+yal sogs// de dag mos pa ji bzhin du// nyan thos chos ston thos par 'gyur// lha rnams dang ni lha ma yin// 
289a8(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dag ni mang po dang // bo ro ke ni 'khor dang bcas// grul bum dag ni tshad med rnams// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// gzungs sngags sgra ni thos par gyur// 
289b1(dkon brtsegs): i di si/ bi di si/ ir su i ra/ o na si/ ma na si/ u khyi khyi/ a khi tsa la maM nang ye/ dar ni shA ni mi ta ka ni/ i mi ma na tra/ ni ha ra/ a pu re/ bud d+he nir/ a khi tsa ra/ bi ya ki ri
289b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ a kha tsir ba ra mi te/ ka la ba hi ni/ sarba bing sha nir d+he be na/ ba ra sha sad de/ sha sa ta/ par sha sad ta ta ra sad ta/ b+hU mi/ ma ma b+har/ am b+ha ga li li b+ha na shiny+tsa tsid ta/ bi ba mi ta/ tsing
289b3(dkon brtsegs): ta.a nan ta/ o be ra/ ha ba mi ta/ b+hu ni na man ka ni/ a ka ni/ bi b+ha mid ta/ shar baM sh+tsa/ a mra la ni ma la/ bu li te nar shi tsaM/ ha ha ri/ ma ma li/ b+ha ri Ni/ ti sh+tsA/ tsak+Shu/ nir ha ra/ 
289b4(dkon brtsegs): u d+hi ri ta ba tsi/ an ta ri/ ku tir/ ka tu/ su ke/ tu su pa ra ni/ kar ni/ ku su ma ni yo/ ka kA ri/ ka khA ri/ u pa la mu ri/ ti shwa da ra ni/ na ga ni ha re/ pa ra lad te/ 
289b5(dkon brtsegs): a te pa ra ya te/ an ta ra/ ta b+han te/ an ta ra ta ba ti shi tsa/ ha si ri/ ma kha li/ i nau sam b+ha re/ tI sh+ma/ sid d+ha ra Ni/ ku b+hU lo tsa te// gzhan yang rgyal po rnam
289b6(dkon brtsegs): thos bu// yul 'khor bsrung ni la sogs pas// khyad 'phags sgra ni grangs med kyis// bden pa'i sngags tshig rab tu smras// tshad med sgra ni de dag kyang // bde gshegs rdzu 'phrul dbang gis
289b7(dkon brtsegs): byung ba rdzu 'phrul dag ni tshad med pas// bstan pa dag kyang tshad med do// res 'ga' sangs rgyas med zhing du// rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i stobs dag gis// 'khor bskor sangs rgyas sku ston pa// de
289b8(dkon brtsegs): ltar mthong ba de bzhin no// bsam gyis mi khyab zhing dag tu// sprul pa tshad med ston mdzad pa// bltams nas gom pa bdun gshegs dang // rgyal srid spangs nas rab byung dang // byang chub snying
290a1(dkon brtsegs): por sangs rgyas nas// brnyes pa'i chos dag rab dgongs te// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad dang // mya ngan 'das pa ston par mdzad// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs dag gis// sna
290a2(dkon brtsegs): cho gas chos ni ston mdzad pas// sems can dag ni tshad med rnams// khyad 'phags ye shes grub par mdzad// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// tshangs pa'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// 
290a3(dkon brtsegs): byams chos bsgom pa bshad bstan nas// byams pa'i sems ni 'phel bar mdzad// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// lha rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas// bsdu ba'i dngos bzhi bshad bstan
