290a4(dkon brtsegs): pas/ bsdu ba'i dngos bzhi 'phel bar mdzad// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas/  zhe sdang nyes dmigs bshad bstan pas// zhe sdang sems ni
290a5(dkon brtsegs): spangs par gyur// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor nas// rnam 'tshe'i nyes dmi gas bshad bstan pas// rnam 'tshe'i sems ni spangs par
290a6(dkon brtsegs): gyurapade tshe thugs rje chen po yis// lha ma yin gyis yongs bskor nas// 'thab pa'i nyes dmigs bshad bstan te// bzod pa bsgoms pa'i bsngags pa brjod// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// 
290a7(dkon brtsegs): na mkha' lding gis yongs bskor nas// 'gal byas nyes dmigs bshad bstan te// 'dum pa'i sems kyi bsngags pa brjod// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// dri za'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor
290a8(dkon brtsegs): nas/ dga' ba'i tshig ni dpag med kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags brjod bstan// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// lto 'phye'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// mu stegs chos la smod
290b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad cing // bcom ldan gsung rab bsngags brjod bstan// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// 'dre srin 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mchog/ rgya cher bsngag/ 
290b2(dkon brtsegs): pabastan par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos sprul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig zad mtha' bstan thos pas na// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul
290b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig skye mtha' ni bstan thos pas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya
290b4(dkon brtsegs): stong snyed// mig gi mtha' ni bstan thos pas// mthar phyin do/ na ni rtogs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul snyan nas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mog 'jug
290b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa thos gyur pas// mthar phyin de ni rtogs par gyur/ thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig dben bstan pa thos pas na// 
290b6(dkon brtsegs): mthar phyin don no rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la skye mod bstan thos pas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs
290b7(dkon brtsegs): rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig med bstan pa thos pas na// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can
290b8(dkon brtsegs): dag ni brgya stong snyad// mig ni nyer ba zhing bstan thos pas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la bdag med
291a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan thos pas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la gang zag med thos pas// mthar
291a2(dkon brtsegs): phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la sems can med thos pas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen/ 
291a3(dkon brtsegs): pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la srogs med thos pas na// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni
291a4(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong snyed// mig la gsob med zos pas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan dpas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// 'jig rten nan
291a5(dkon brtsegs): parab smad de// zhen pa mi bskyed nyid du mdzad// thugs rje che/ na pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can rnams la rgya che ra ni// 'jig rten rnyed pa rab smad de// 'dus ma byas kyi bsngags
291a6(dkon brtsegs): brjod mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// zag bcas shes pa rab smad de// zag med shes rab bsngags pa mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul
291a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// 'jig rten bsam gtan ra ba smad de// 'jig rten 'das pa'i ting 'dzin bsngags// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams
291a8(dkon brtsegs): la rgya cher ni// zag bcas tshul khrims rab smad de// zag med bslab gnas bsngags par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// sems rgya chung
291b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi skyon brjod de// sems rgya chen po'i yon tan bsngags// thugs rje chen po'i 'phrul bstan nas// lus kyi tshul khrims sems shes rab// zag med brten pa med pa yi// bsngags pa dag ni
291b2(dkon brtsegs): brjod par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'druphrul bstan nas// sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i lam bsngags shing // spros la dga' zhing zhen pa dag/ sangs rgyas smad pa rab tu bstan// thugs rje chen pos
291b3(dkon brtsegs): 'drul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// mig 'chang skyon ni rab 'byed cing // rab ni mtshan nyid bstan par mdzad// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra drir reg bya nas// sgra dang
291b4(dkon brtsegs): ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// thug das rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// dur la bab cing gzhon pa la// nyes dmigs dpag
291b5(dkon brtsegs): med yad par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// cho rigs dgo na bste/ mas pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ thugs
291b6(dkon brtsegs): rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams pa rgya cher ni// longs spyod bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems
291b7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la rgya cher ni// rang dbang bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigaso dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// gzugs kyi
291b8(dkon brtsegs): bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// bud med bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag
292a1(dkon brtsegs): med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// gos kyis bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// 
292a2(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// chang gis bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// 
292a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// rgyal po bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// tshul
292a4(dkon brtsegs): khrims bsnyems par gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// shes rab bsnyems par
292a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// de/ bzhin rtogs dang rdzu 'phrul dang // bsam gtan mkhas pa'i nga rgyal dang // nor dang bshad dang rigs dang 'khor// 
292a6(dkon brtsegs): rol mo glu dang lha cang dang // grags pa phun tshogs bsngags pa dang // bkur sti dang ni rnyed pa dang // mdzes dang g.yo sgyu nga rgyal dang // ngo tsha med dang khrel med dang // khengs dang phun tshogs pa
292a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal dang // bag med 'dod chags de bzhin no// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can gang zhig sems dang yid// dman par gyur pa de dag la// khyad par 'phags pa'i 'du
292a8(dkon brtsegs): shes bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can gang zhig rab zhum zhing // rtsol bar mi byed de dag la// brtson 'grus stobs ni ston par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul/ 
292b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan nas// sems can gang zhig nor rnams la// chags par gyur pa de dag la// cho ga shes chos ni ston par mdzad// gzhan yang spos kyi dri gtsang khang // me tog dag gi gnal med khang / 
292b2(dkon brtsegs): khang pa brtseg ma mchog sprul nas// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs par bstan// gzhan yang lha yi bu mo rnams// me tog tsam pa'i khang pa na// gnas pa lus phyed bstan sprul nas// me tog
292b3(dkon brtsegs): phreng thogs mchod byed bstan// gzhan yang lha min bu mo dag/ me tog ma li khang pa na// gnas pa lus phyed bstan sprul nas// me tog phreng thogs mchod byed bstan// gzhon yang lha yi bu mo
292b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams// pad+ma sngon po'i khang pan// gnas pa lus phyed bstan sprul nas// sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags pa bstan/ gzhan yang tshangs pa rnams kyi lha// gser gyi gzhal med
292b5(dkon brtsegs): khang pa na// gnas pa lus kun bstan bsdus nas// sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags pa bstan// gzhan yang lha idu mo dag/ sna tshogs rgyan gyis lus brgyan zhing // rgyang ni
292b6(dkon brtsegs): phan tshun reg pa las// sgra snyan dag ni rab byung nas// 'dus byas rnams kyi chos dag ni// 'gyur zhing mi brtan yin na yang // byis pa mi bden rtogs pa yis// yang dag ji bzhin mi shes zer// 
292b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyan gyi sgra ni de dag kyang // lus dang sems las byung ma yin// 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med// phyogs kyang yod pa ma yin te// gzugs dang sems kyi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar
292b8(dkon brtsegs): bya byis pa rnams ni ma sems pas// 'di la the tshom skye bar 'gyur// rgyan gyi rnam pa de dag las// sgra snyan byung ba de yis ni// sangs rgyas ni kun grags pas na// sems can chod med
293a1(dkon brtsegs): grol bar 'gyur// de lta bas na khyed rnams kyis// 'dren pa rang byung ye shes dang // yon tan dpag med sku dag ni// sred pa'i spros las 'das pa dang // rab dben skyon
293a2(dkon brtsegs): ni med pa dang // lta thal sems ni rab sbyangs dang // mtshan dang dpe byad brgyan pa dang // sku dang thugs ni dag par ltos// khyed kyis bcom ldan grong gshegs che// gom pa dag ni seng ge
293a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra gshegs stangs dang pa glang chen 'dra// sems can rab skong bar mdzad// bsod nams khyad 'phags yongs su rdzogs// yang dag mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan// sems can dag ni
293a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kun// bska bas mi ngoms nyid du ltos// khyed kyis denang gnyis gtso mchog ni// zugs rje chen po ldan pa ngas na// dngos po chung ngus mtshang byas kyang // yon tan chang
293a5(dkon brtsegs): med 'thong mdzad pas// sems can dag ni mang po rnams/ bskal pa brgya stong mang por ni// mya ngan 'das de ng+ge/ ba par du// rnam smin thug pa med par ltos// khyed kyi nang
293a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gtso mchog ni// zag med tshul khrims rdzogs pas na// sems can dag ni mang po rnams// gus pas spyi bos phyag byed dang // lha yi 'khor ni mang po rnams// so sor gzhal med khang
293a7(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas// rtse ba dag la chags med par// 'dren pa la ni ston byed ltos// khyed kyis bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor// bcom ldan 'das la dang bskyed nas// gser gyi rlung yab dag thogs te// g.yas
293a8(dkon brtsegs): g.yon du ni 'khod pa dang // bdud kyi bu ni lnga brgya yis// lha yi me tog yid 'ong bas// de bzhin gshegs la mngon gtor nas// bla med ye shes tshol la ltos// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
293b1(dkon brtsegs): la ni/ bsngags pa brjod cing mchod pas na// de ni bcom ldan phrad gyur nas// so sor dga' bar gyur pa yin// spobs pa dag ni tshad med kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod// 
293b2(dkon brtsegs): de yi tshe na bdud kyi bu// sred pa spangs pa zhes bya ba// thog mar bcom ldan bsngags brjod nas// mig zad mtha' ni shes par 'gyur// mig gi skye mtha' shes pas na// rab zhi'i mtshan nyid rab tu
293b3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs// gzhan yang mig la sogs pa yi// ming don chog ni dpag med rtogs// des ni tshig mkhas dag gis ni// sems can rnams la yang dag bstan// ming dang don rnams la yang no// zhen
293b4(dkon brtsegs): pa the tshom med pas na// 'ge 'ong med par rab rtogs shing / drang dor med pa nyid du gyur// rang bzhin dag ni stong dpe na pas// yi ge rnams ni spangs pa dang // len dang gzung dang
293b5(dkon brtsegs): klog pa dang // kha don 'don cing sgrub med rtogs// 'das par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// sngon yang rab tu phye/ ste bstan// btags pa'i ming tsam yin pas na// yang dag
293b6(dkon brtsegs): brjod du ci yang med// rang bzhin stong pa de dag ni// phung po las dang skye mched 'das// brdzun pa med cing bden pa'ang med// gnas dang gnas pa yod ma yin// tshig gis smra ba lam chad cing
293b7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi spyod pa'ang rab tu zhi// skye bo mtshan ma med pa'i phyir// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs par mthong // bcom ldan mtshan ma yongs spangs kyang // byis pa yang dag ma yin rtog/ bcom
293b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan gong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// gang zhig dga' ba skye 'gyur ba// de ni mtshan mar rtog pa ste// mya ngan gdung dang bcas par gyur// gang gi mtshan ma'i rtog spangs pa// grong khyer gshegs/ 
294a1(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong mi 'gyur// gshegs shing bskyod pa'i mtshan ma la// rnam rtog med pa'i shes rab thob// gang gis mtshan mar sangs rgyas mthong // des ni grong khyer gshegs pa mthong
294a2(dkon brtsegs): skye zhing 'khor ba'i chos dag la// rnam par rtog pa bskyed par byed// gang gis sangs rgyas mtshan mar mthong // dga' ba dag ni skye 'gyur ba// de ni bdud kyi spyod la gnas// bdud kyi spyod yur snang
294a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yin// gang gis mtshan mar sangs rgyas mthong // de ni 'gyur ba mthong ba yin// de ni mya ngan gdung bcas pas// mkhas pas snying brtser bya ba yin// chos la thob par gang lta ba// de la chos
294a4(dkon brtsegs): stor mya ngan yod// sangs rgyas mthong ba skyes pa la// mya ngan 'das pa'i sdug bsngal yod// bskal pa mang por gang bsngo mas pa// mtshan ma thams cad rtogs pas na// grong khyer
294a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs par mi rtog cing // mya ngan 'da' ba 'du shes med/ sems kyi mtshan nyid stong rtogs pas// sangs rgyas spyod la gnas pas na// grong khyer gshegs par mi rtog cing // 
294a6(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'da' ba'i 'du shes med// gang gis de ltar rab shes pa// sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong 'gyur zhing // ngo bo nyid kyang stong rtogs pas// mthar ni skye 'gag ci yang med// bcom ldan bskal pa
294a7(dkon brtsegs): dngag med nas// dka' ba rnams ni rang spyad nas// ngo bo nyid ni stong mkhyen na// byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs so// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// 'khor ni brgya stong mang pos bskom
294a8(dkon brtsegs): ma dang mi ma yin la sogs// dang ba'i sems kyis mchod pa byas// gang gis skad cig tsam du ni// mig zad mthar ni rab sems shing // mtshan ma rnams ni stong rtogs na// 'di yi bsod nam
294b1(dkon brtsegs): de bas 'phags// bgrang ba dang ni grangs kyi cha// rgyu tsam du yang mi bzod do// de bzhin mig gi skye mtha' dang // mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas// rab tu ni ba'i bar du yang // de bzhin na rig par/ 
294b2(dkon brtsegs): bya rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri re reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das// gong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i
294b3(dkon brtsegs): che zhabs ni sa la reg tsam gyis// sa ni kun tu rab tu g.yos// ri rnams gang yin de dag kyang // thams cad bcom ldan 'das la phyogs// lha mi dag ni chos kyi phyir// thams cad 'ongs
294b4(dkon brtsegs): nas gus mchod byas// de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// lha yi dbang po mi yi rgyal lha ma yin ni mang po dang // gnod sbyin dag ni mang po rnams// 
294b5(dkon brtsegs): na grong khyer spangs nas ni// bcom ldan spyan sngar 'dus rgyu te rab tu dga' bas mchod pa byas// de nas rdo rje bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer duni gshegs pa'i tshe/ 
294b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang rnam pa tha dad pa'i// bya yi tshogs ni tshad med pa// ne co dang ni rma bya dang // ka la bing ka bya yi rnams// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yi// yon tan mchog ni mthong bas na// ma
294b7(dkon brtsegs): cad namanga' dag la ni// rab tu dga' bas rnam par rtse// thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// sgra snyan dag ni rab tu phyung // de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/ 
294b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dang // rdzu 'phrul gyini stobs dag gis// sems can chad med pargya stong snyed// long ba dag ni mthong bar gyur// bon pa rnams ni thos par 'gyur// dbang po
295a1(dkon brtsegs): ma tshangs gang yin pa// thams cad dbang po tshang bar gyur// sdug bsngal la ni gnas pa dag/ thams cad bde ba thob par gyur// de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das// grong
295a2(dkon brtsegs): khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni// 'di skad smra ba thos par gyur// gang gis mtshan ma rnams kyis ni// de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs byed pa// de yis bcom ldan 'das
295a3(dkon brtsegs): la ni mchod pa byas shes brjod mi bya// mig zad mtha' yi ngo bo nyid// rtogs par yang na mi 'gyur ro// mtshan ma rnams ni gang spangs pa// yon tan gzhi ni bsags pas na// mig zad mtha'
295a4(dkon brtsegs): yi ngo bo nyid// rab tu rtogs par yang 'gyur ro// 'di ltar mi dag na zad pa'i mtha'// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan yang // rab tu rtogs par
295a5(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud// mig ni zad pa'i mtha' dag la// mi 'dzin sbed pa med pa dang // mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag la// brten cing gnas pa med pa dang // mig ni rab tu dben pa la// g.yo
295a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bsam pa med gyur pa// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag la// rnam par rtog pa med pa dang // mig gi mtha' ni gang yin pa// 
295a7(dkon brtsegs): de la yid kyi rtogs med dang // mig ni rnam par 'jig pa la// bstan par bya ba med gyur pa// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig ni med par 'gyur ba/ 
295a8(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang // mig ni skye ba med pa la// yongs su sdud pa med pa dang // mig ni rab tu zhi ba la// 'dzin pa dag ni med gyur pa// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// 
295b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig ni zad pa med pa'i phyir// mtshan rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang // mig gi mtha' ni shes pa'i phyir// dbang po dag ni nges gyur dang // mig ni skye ba shes pa'i phyir/ 
295b2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rang dbang thob gyur pa// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig ni med par rtogs gyur nas// gzugs ni khong du chud pa dang / mig ni 'jig par rab shes/ 
295b3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ chos la so sor rtogs pa dang // mig ni skye med shes gyur nas// lam ni bsgrub par gang byed pa// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig zad mtha'
295b4(dkon brtsegs): ni gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// las kyi bye brag tha dad pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par gyur// las kyi bye brag tha dad pa// rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir// des
295b5(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// // mig skye mtha' ni gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rtog/ sa pa'i phyir// sdul bsngal bye brag tha dad pa// de yang rab tu
295b6(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par gyur// sdug bsngal bye brag tha dad pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig gi 'jigs pa gang yin pa/ 
295b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// sdug bsngal 'jigs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// sdug bsngal 'jigs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir// des
295b8(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig gi med pa gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rtags pa'i phyir// mtshan ma spangs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs
296a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// mtshan ma spangs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig gi skye med ga
296a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// bag chags spangs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// bag chags spangs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des
296a3(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gzhan yang mig gi mi rtog nyid// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// sgrib pa spangs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par
296a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// sgrib pa spangs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs paragyur pa'i phyir// des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gzhan yang rig la yi ge med// 
296a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas ye shes stong / sa dag kyang // rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba yin// sasa? rgyas ye shes stobs dag ni// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// 
296a6(dkon brtsegs): des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gzhan yang mig gi ngo bo nyid// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// 'dod rnams spangs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs
296a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// 'dod rnams spangs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gzhan yang bsam gtan bsgom pa/ 
296a8(dkon brtsegs): dag/ yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// nyon mongs spangs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// nyon mongs spangs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des
296b1(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gang zag des ni de bzhin du// mig gi mngon mtha' shes pa dang // mig gi mi gnas shes pa dang // mig ni skye ba'i shes pa dang / 
296b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul shes pa dang // mig gi dman pa shes pa dang // mig ni khyad par 'phags shes dang // ye shes dman pa shes pa dang // rnam dag ye shes shes pa dang // tshul khrims rnam
296b3(dkon brtsegs): dag shes pa dang // lus kyi sdoms pa shes pa dang // rnam dag sgra ye shes pa dang // ngag gi sdom pa shes pa dang // rnam dag sems kyi shes pa dang // gnas kyi bye brag shes pa dang // sems
296b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi shes pa dang // sems skyon shes pa'i shes pa dang / rnam dag las kyi shes pa dang // sems kyi sdom pa shes pra dang // nyes dmigs shes pa'i shes pa dang // rnam dag sgra mi
296b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang // phung po'i bye brag shes pa dang // phung po'i rgyu rkyen shes pa dang // mig ni yongs shes shes pa dang / sdug bsngal 'byung gnas shes pa dang // zag med tshul khrims
296b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang // tshul khrims rgyu rkyen shes pa dang // sdug bsngal rgyu rkyen shes pa dang // sdug bsngal zad pa'i rgyu shes dang // 'dus byas rnams kyi shes pa dang // zag med zag pa shes pa dang
296b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par shes pa yin// gzhan yang rgyu rkyen bcu gnyis kyi// spyod dang bcas pa'i shes pa dang // spyod pa med pa'i shes pa dang // mtshan ma dang bcas mtshan ma med// 'dus byas
296b8(dkon brtsegs): dang ni dus ma byas// rnam par gnag dang yongs sdud dang // bdag dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa// yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang migazad skye mtha' med// mig gi mtha' dang rab
297a1(dkon brtsegs): dben dang // 'jug pa dang ni med pa dang // mi skye ba dang nyer ni nyid// yang dag ji bzhin shes pas na// sems can dag ni ring po rnams// rnam par dag pa'i ye shes dang // 
297a2(dkon brtsegs): mthu dang bcas pa'i ye shes dang // brtson 'grus ye shes thob par byed// gzhan yang gcig dang tha dad shes// sems can dag ni thams cad kyi// mos pa'i shes pa gang yin pa// yang dag de
297a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang sems can thams cad kyi// mos pa khyad par 'phags pa dang // rnam dag sems kyi shes pa dang // las dang rnam smin shes pa dang // dbang po khams kyi shes
297a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang // sems kyi 'gyur ba shes pa dang // shes rab mos dpa shes pa dang // shin tu rnam grol shes pa dang // spobs pra mchog gi shes pa dag/ yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// 
297a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang sems can ma rungs dang // chos la mos pa med gyur pa// yang dag ji bzhin shes pas na// mos pa shes pa bskyed par byed// gzhan yang don gyi tshul dag ni// 
297a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ji bzhin shes pas na// le lo med pa'i shes pa dang // 'du shes sgrub par byed pa yin// gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis// chos rnams rab tu 'byed pa dang // thogs pa med pa'i
297a7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes dag/ yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang rgya chen don dag dang // tshig gis bstan pa gang yin pa// rjes su shes pa'i shes pa dag/ yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gnan
297a8(dkon brtsegs): yang grogs bzang mthun gnas dang // gos dang zas dang btung ba dag/ tshod shes pa ni shes pa rnams// yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang bya ba med pa yi// gzugs kyi chos
297b1(dkon brtsegs): ni gang yin pa// nan tan bsgrub pa'i shes pa dag/ yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang lus sems skyon med cing // sgro 'dogs skur 'debs yongs spangs nas// bla med ye shes
297b2(dkon brtsegs): gang 'chol ba// yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis// namakha' bar snang dag las ni// sprul de'i sku ni rab bstan nas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ 
297b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par mdzad pas na// thams cad rab tu dga' gyur nas// dang ba skyes pa'i shes pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang // mos shing gus pa'i shes pa dang // 'dod chags
297b4(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa'i chos dag la// rab mos sgrib pa'i shes pa dang / 'phags po'i dge 'dun tshogs la yang // mchod pa/ ra mos pa'i shes pa dang // byang chub chen po dag la yang / 
297b5(dkon brtsegs): ba mos bsngo ba'i shes pa dang // gzungs rnams kyi ni sgo dang/ la rab mos ston de'i shes pa dang // mos pa rnam sa ni gang yin pa// so sor rab rtogs shes pa dang // 'phags
297b6(dkon brtsegs): nga'i ting 'dzin gang yin pa// legs par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang // bsrung dang rjes su dran rnams la// nges par 'byed pa'i shes pa dang // dpag tu med pa'i sems dag la// legs par
297b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa'i shes pa dang // tshigs su bcad pa tshad med rnams// yang dag ston pa'i shes pa dang // 'dod pa'i mtshams sbyor gang yin pa// rtogs shing go ba'i shes pa dang // 'gro ba dman pade
297b8(dkon brtsegs): dag tu// ltung bar mi 'gyur shes pa dang // mi dge ba shes gnyen gang yin pa// yongs su spongs byed shes pa dang // dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang yin pa// bsten par byed pa'i shes pa dang / 
298a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dri zhing lan sngon gang yin pa// rab tu rnam 'byed shes pa dang // gnas dang gnas min gang yin pa// legs par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang // sa dngas min gang yin pa/ 
298a2(dkon brtsegs): legs par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang // rab 'bring tha ma gang yin pa// rnam par 'byed pa'i shes pa dang // 'dus byas shes pa gang yin dang // 'dus ma byas kyi shes pa dang // dngos po dang ni rdzas// 
298a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi shes// dngos dang rdzas min shes pa dang // yongs su sdud byed shes pa dang // yongs su sdud min shes pa dang // mngon par bsgrub pa'i shes pa dang // yang dag sgrub min shes pa dang // rig
298a4(dkon brtsegs): dang mig min shes pa dang // mig dang lhan cig shes pa dang // mig gi bye brag shes pa dang // mig gi rang bzhin shes pa drag/ yang dag ji bzhin shes pa dang // rna ba sna lce lus nas ni// 
298a5(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga// thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// gang zhig mig gi/ rgyu rkyen nyid// yang dag stong zhing dben pa dang // mthar ni
298a6(dkon brtsegs): ngag yod ma yin pas// sems par byed pa gang yin pa// gang zag des ni de bzhin du// yang dag nges pa kho nar ni// sems kyi ting 'dzin gang yin pa// yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur// 
298a7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mig gi rten 'brel dang // mig mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid dang // nges pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur// sems par byed pa gang yin pa// gang zag das ni de banan du// mig gi rgyu rkyen
298a8(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa// mthar ni yod pa ma yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs par 'gyur// rna ba sna lce lus nas ni// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga// thams cad de
298b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin sbyar bar bya// de yi chen bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// zhabs ni sa la reg tsam gyis// dngos po ngo mtshar rab bstan pa// deng 'dir bdag gis mdor bsdus nas// 
298b2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan phyogs ni cung zad cig/ sems can dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir// yang dgra par ni bstan par bya// de tshe lha mi 'dren pa yis// spu yi khung bu gcig nas ni// 'od zer brgya stong chang
298b3(dkon brtsegs): med snyed// rab tu bkye bar gyur pas na// 'od zer dag ni re res kyang // zhing ni tshad med gsapa mdzad nas// sems can mang po kun gyi phyir// sangs rgyas mdzad pa rab tu mdzad// gang
298b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'das pa'i dus su ni// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang / sun ring sbyin dang tshul khrims dang // mngon par bsgra ba pa gang yin pa// de lta bu yi gang zag dag/ des ni ji skad
298b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa yi// rdzu 'phrul dngos po thos gyur na// rab tu dga' zhing mos par 'gyur// gang zhig sangs rgyas rdzu 'phru la rnams// nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal gyi// spyod yul min
298b6(dkon brtsegs): par rab shes nas// de lta bu yi gang zag ni// des ni ji skad bstan pa yi// rdzu 'phrul dag ni thos gyur na// mos pa dag ni skye 'gyur zhing // ngo mtshar 'dzin pa'i sems kyang bskyed// lha dang mi
298b7(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dren pa yis// bsam gyis mi khyab mthu dag gis// de lta bu la sogs pa yi// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rab bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong dang // tshad med grangs ming pa rnams kyis// 
298b8(dkon brtsegs): de bden gshegs pa rnams lani// bsten cing rim gra mchod pa byas// lha dang man 'drin pa yis// bsam gyis mi khyab ma thu dag gis// mdo sde gan brgya stong dang // chad me grangs med
299a1(dkon brtsegs): rang bshad pas// sems can dag ni mang po rnams// bstan pa de ni thos pas na// thams cad dang bas rab blangs te// sems ni rab tu dga' bar gyur// de yi tshe na bcom
299a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni mthu dag gis// nam pa' las ni 'di skad du// mig zad mtha' ni shes par 'gyur// mig ni nye bar zhi ba dang // mig nyid rgyu yi
299a3(dkon brtsegs): bar du yang // 'gro ba med cing 'ong med dang // mthar ni stong dben shes par gyis// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// rna ba sna lce lus nas ni// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa'i
299a4(dkon brtsegs): shu lnga thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du na gshegs pa'i tshe// nam par bar snang dge las ni// sgra snyan dam pa mchog byung nas// nga/ 
299a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sna tshogs// rab tu bsngags par gyur pas na// 'khor ni 'dus pa chen po rnams/ thams cad dang mos sems kyang bskyed// da ltar 'jig rten
299a6(dkon brtsegs): bcugs pa yi// mi yi seng gi gang yin pa// mtshan ni bdud dang bdud dpung dag/ phan mdzad chos kyi rgyul zhes bya// gang gis di lta bu mi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// rigs par
299a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshigs thams cad// rab tu 'dul bar nus shes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng gi gang yin pa// mtshan ni 'dod chags gnom pa dang // ni mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes
299a8(dkon brtsegs): gang gis 'di lta ba mi mtshan// thos par gyur ba de dag ni// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur nas zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// me yi seng ge gang
299b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa mtshan ni ne sdang gnom pa dang // ni mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// zhe sdang dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes
299b2(dkon brtsegs): zer la da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni gti mug gnom pa dang // zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// zos par gyur pa de dag
299b3(dkon brtsegs): ni gti mug dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes rjer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni nga rgyal gnom pa dang // ni mdzad chos kyi
299b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// zos par gyur dpa de dag ni// nga rgyal dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// 
299b5(dkon brtsegs): mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni khong khro gzhom pa dang / zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtsha na thos par gyur pa de dag ni// khong khro dag ni gang yin pa
299b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni phrag dog gzhom pa dang // zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi/ 
299b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni// phrag dog dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes bya// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni mi bden
299b8(dkon brtsegs): gzhom pa dang // zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// mi bden dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig
300a1(dkon brtsegs): rten bzhugs pa 'i// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni lha rnams gnom pa dang // ni mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu mi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag
300a2(dkon brtsegs): ni lta ba dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni spros pa gnom pa dang // zhi mdzad chas kyi rgyal
300a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// zos par gyur pa de dag ni// spros pa dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang
300a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa mtshan ni yang dag pa yi chos// rnam dag chos kyi rgyu ral zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// rnam dag chos ni gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs
300a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// m-i mi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni las rnams rtogs pa yi/ chos kyi rgyal zhes bya ba yin// gang gis 'di lta
300a6(dkon brtsegs): mi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// les rnams thams cad gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par 'gyur zhes zang// da ltar 'jog rten bzhugs pa mo// mi mo sing ge gang yin pa// mtshan rje/ 
300a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul phun tshogs pa'o// chos kyi rgyal zhes bya ba yin// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// rdzu 'phrul yon tan gang yin pa// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes
300a8(dkon brtsegs): the 'ang ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa 'o// mo yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni pha rol phyin pa rnams// phun tshogs chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu'i mtshan// thos par gyur pa/ 
300b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni// nga rol phyin drug gang yin pa// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni 'du byed gang yin pa// rab rtogs chos kyi
300b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni// 'du byed dag ni thams cad kun// rab tu rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge
300b3(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa// mtshan ni rnam par dag pa yin// 'od zer kun 'dzin bskyed ces bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// khyad par 'phags pa'i skye len dag/ yong su rdzogs
300b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi ye seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni kha dog dag pa yin// 'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// 
300b5(dkon brtsegs): thos par gyur pa de dag ni// khyad par 'phags pa'i gzugs dam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltara'ajig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi se ge gang yin pa// mtshan
300b6(dkon brtsegs): ni su nyid dag pa yi// 'ang zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// khyad par 'phags pa'i gzugs sku dag/ yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur nas
300b7(dkon brtsegs): zir nga ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// ma yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni gdung nying dag pa yi// 'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya// gang gis 'di lta bu'i mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ 
300b8(dkon brtsegs): khyad pa dgas pa'i drus rigs rnams// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// de ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mau ma seng gi gang yin pa// mtshanan gyi grags pa 'o// 'ong zer dun
301a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin zhes kyang bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// rgya cher grags pa'i grags pa rnams// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig
301a2(dkon brtsegs): rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni sbyin pa gtong ba dang // tshul khrims can dang bzod bsgoms dang // brtson 'grus brtsams dang bsam gtan pa// shes rab kun 'dzin
301a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes kyang bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// sbyin pa dang ni tshul khrims dang // shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang // gzungs kyi sgo ni gang yin pa// yongs su rdzogs par
301a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur nas zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi se dang ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni stong nyid rdzogs pa yi// chos kyi rje zhes bya ba yin// glang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// 'dzin
301a5(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa de dag ni// chos rnams stong pa'i don dag kyang // yang dag ston par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhug sa pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni bdag
301a6(dkon brtsegs): med rdzogs pa yi// chos kyi rje zhes bya ba yin// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni// skye 'gag med don gang yin pa// yang dag ston par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig
301a7(dkon brtsegs): rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni spyan nyid dag pa yi// kun 'dzin chos kyi rje zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni// mig zad mtha' don
301a8(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa// yang dag ston par 'gyur zhes zer// rna ba sna lci lus nas ni// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// chos ni nyi shu rtsa lnga dang // me tog phreng ba spos dag dang // mar me gdugs dang
301b1(dkon brtsegs): gos rnams kyang / gathams cad de bzhin sbyar bar d+ha// bamapo lnga ste tha ma'o// de mtshan bcom ldan 'das// gro khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// bsam gyis
301b2(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa dag gi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi no stobs rnams kyis// nam nga' bar snang dag las ni// sgra snyan dam par ba byung ste// gzungs kyi spyod pa sna tshogs dag/ yang dag par ni bstan pas na// 'khor
301b3(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dus pa chen po rnams// 'di lta bu yi tshig thos te// gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis// mig ni zad mtha' gang yin dang // skye mtha' dang ni mtha' rnams dang // rab dben dang ni 'jug pa nas
301b4(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi nga'i bar rnams kyi// chos rnams gang yin de dag gis/ mthar phyin gnas ni gang yin pa// thams cad rab tu rtog/ ngas par byed// sbyin pa'i stobs ni gang dag gis// mthar
301b5(dkon brtsegs): ni gang dag sdud pa dang // tshul khrims stobs ni gang dag gis/ mthar ni gang dag 'grub pa dang // bzod pa'i stobs ni gang dag gis// mtha' ni gang dag bkod pa dang / 
301b6(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus stobs ni gang dag gis// mthar ni gang dge slong ba dang // bsam gtan stobs ni gang dag gis// mthar ni gang dag 'jog pa dang // shes rab stobs ni gang dag gis// mthar ni// 
301b7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag ston pa dang // yi ge rnam dag brjod pa dang // sgra skad rnams ni spangs pas na// gzugs dang sems kyi bar du yang // mthar ni rnam dag nyid du rtogs// zag dang bcas dang zag med
301b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' don rnams dang ni phan pa dag/ thams cad stong zhing dben pa dang // mthar ni rnam dag nyid du rtogs// srid pa dag ni thams cad la// brten cing gnas par mi byed dang // gzungs dang
302a1(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin dag la ni// rab tu dben par gnas par byed// 'gro ba med cing 'od med dang // dge ba ma yin mi dge min// lung du mi ston pa yang min// bdag dang gzhan la
302a2(dkon brtsegs): phan 'dogs pa'i// de lta bu yi mtshan ma rnams// thams cad yongs su dag pas na// dbang phyug yon tan dag la yang // gnas par yang ni mi byed do// nyan thos dang ni skye bo dang // sangs
302a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams kyi chos la yang // gnas par yang ni mi byed do// mig ni zad pa'i mtha' dag dang // skye mtha' dang ni mtha' rnams nas// nye bar zhi ba'i bar rnams kyi// spyod pa dag ni gang yin pa// 
302a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su zhi bar byed// skye ba dang ni mi skye dang / sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba dang // bstod pa dang ni smod pa dag/ thams cad yongs su spong zhes zer// mthar phyin
302a5(dkon brtsegs): snang ba gang yin dang // stong pa'i gzugs ni gang yin pa// tham sa cad rab tu gang rtogs pa// 'di nyid sangs rgyas spyod yu la la// rab tu gnas par byed pa yin// 'di nyid sangs rgyas
302a6(dkon brtsegs): rol pa yi// gnas la rab tu gnas pa yin// 'di nyid sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul la// rab tu gnas par gyur pa yin// 'di nyid sangs rgyas mkhyen pa la// rab tu gnas par gyur pa yin// mig
302a7(dkon brtsegs): zad mtha' yi stobs dag la// de bzhin du ni gnas pa dang // mi skye mtha' yi stobs dag la// de bzhin du ni gnas pa dang // mig gi mtha' yi stobs dag la// de bzhin du ni gnas pa nas// 1
302a8(dkon brtsegs): bar zhi ba'i stobs kyi bar// de la rab tu gnas pa dang // rna ba sna lci lus nas ni// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga// thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer// gzungs ni/ 
302b1(dkon brtsegs): gang yin 'di dag gis// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs// khyad par 'phags pa gang yin pa// yongs su rdzogs par byed ces zer// gzugs ni gang yin 'di dag gis// gzi byin mtha
302b2(dkon brtsegs): stobs de lta bu// yongs su rdzogs par byas nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gnas kun la ni 'jug pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// spyod yul kun la gnas
302b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bas// 'jig rten pa ni thams cad kun// lha ma yin gyi tshogs dag la// bstan par 'dzin pa'i sems spangs nas// tshangs pa'i spyod la gnas par byed// gnod sbyin brgya stong tshad med
302b4(dkon brtsegs): dang grul bum dag ni tshad med rnams// de dag thams cad kun kyang ni// rab tu dga' ba bskyed par byed// dri za'i 'khor ni gang yin dang // srin po'i 'khor na gang yin pa/ 
302b5(dkon brtsegs): tshad med grangs med de dag kyang // rab tu dul la dga' bar byed// gal te tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// sgra snyan dag zhi dam pa yi// tshig dang don ni brjod byed kyang // yang dag
302b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan par mi nus te// sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyis// dpag par bya ba ma yin dang // sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyis// gzung bar bya ba min zhes zer// gzungs ni gang yin
302b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni// mig gis dmigs par bya ba min// gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag ni// lus kyi bar gyis dmigs bya min// gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag ni// mig gis dmigs par bya ba min// 
302b8(dkon brtsegs): mig gi spyod yul bar gyis kyang // dmigs par bya ba ma yin te// rna bsna l+ya lus nas ni// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga// thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer// gnan
303a1(dkon brtsegs): yang mig gi zad mtha' dang // mig rnams kyi ni skye mtha' dang // mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas// nye bar zhi ba'i bar dag la// bdag dang skyes bu med pa dang // sems can dang na
303a2(dkon brtsegs): srog med dang // de bzhin gang zag med pa dang // mtshan ma med cing byed med dang // 'gro ba med cing 'ong med dang // 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i mtshan// thams cad rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer// gzhan/ 
303a3(dkon brtsegs): yang 'di skad chos nyid kyi// mig ni rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer// gzhan yang 'di skad chos rnams las// grub pa'i mig ni gang yin dang // ye shes mig dang shes rab mig/ tshangs pa'i mig
303a4(dkon brtsegs): dang lha yi mig/ tshangs par skye gnas thob mig dang // lha yi skye gnas thob mig dang // tshangs pa'i rnam smon mig dag / drang // lha yi rnam smin mig dag dang // tshangs pa'i rgyu las skye
303a5(dkon brtsegs): mig dang // lha yi rgyu las skyes pa'i mig/ lha yi rdzu 'phrul mig dag dang // lha yi brtson 'grus dag gi mig/ dman par skyes pa'i mig dag dang // khyad 'phags skyes pa'i
303a6(dkon brtsegs): mig dag dang // gshin rje'i 'jig rten gang yin pa// yongs su spangs pa'i mig dag dang // klu dang gnod sbyin mig dag dang // grul bum gyi ni mog dag dang // yongs su gdung bcas mig dag
303a7(dkon brtsegs): dang yongs su gzung min mig dag dang // rnam par dag pa'i mig dag dang // rnam par dag min mig dag dang // mchu ring zheng chung mig dag dang // nyan thos theg pa'i mag dag dang // bsam
303a8(dkon brtsegs): gtan pa yi mig dag dang // ting nge 'dzin gyi mig dag dang // spyod yul las byung mig dag dang // 'du shes las byung mig dag dang // 'dod chags las byung mig dag dang // 'dod chags
303b1(dkon brtsegs): bral ba'i mig dag dang // rgyulas byung ba'i mig dgu dang // rgyu min las byung mig dag dang // mdungs par ldan 'chog dag dang // mtshungs par ldan min tshig dag dang // snro nan las byung rig
303b2(dkon brtsegs): dag dang // sgo las byung min mig dag dang // rgyu rkyen las byung mig dag dang // rgyu sgro las skyes mig dag dang // sha las grub min mig dag dang // ye shes rnam par dag mig dang // yod pa min
303b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mig dag dang // dmigs med mig ni gang yin pa// thams cad rtogs par byed ces zer// rna bsna lce lus nas ni// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga// thams cad de/ 
303b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin sbyar zhes zer// de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das// na mkha' bar snang dag las ni// gzhan yang dpag tu med pa yi // sgra snyan dam pa mchog byung nas// khyad par 'phags pa'i
303b5(dkon brtsegs): gzungs kyi chos// 'di skad du ni bka' stsal te// 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa yi// rdzu 'phrul dag gis sprul pa yin 'di lnga ste/ si le/ ma la ma le/ sid d+hi/ A ne si na
303b6(dkon brtsegs): ku ru ni/ yu ku le me ku na te/ a la shaM/ a si le/ si si la te/ su si le/ si le si le/ khyi bo le/ a bi li/ surbaM tsan/ d+ha ni mi ni/ ka ni ka li te/ su ka le pra ya/ sha nang ni a nu lo saM ke/ 
303b7(dkon brtsegs): bi lo me/ su b+ha me re sh+tse/ a shi ri li/ sar ma pa ra/ pun te/ pa ra bi he/ d+ha ra Ni/ d+hi shu tsau ha/ su d+yA/ a tsan/ b+hi bo ga ga nang / kung pa no/ b+ha sa b+ha sa nang / pa na ri d+hu/ ri ya/ ni pa ri ke no na/ 
303b8(dkon brtsegs): ma nang b+ha/ su ru ts+yai ta/ pan ar/ a b+hi la bi ra/ pa ti shwa ha/ d+ha ra ni/ a si ta/ lo nai b+hi// gzungs rnams gang yin 'di dag ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu brnyes// mthu chen dag ni/ 
304a1(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs// shes rab dag ni tshad med kyang // 'dzin pa dag ni yongs su spong // dran pa dag ni dag par byed// gzugs med 'gro dang 'ong ba med// phyogs dang phyogs
304a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshams yod pa min// mtshan ma med cing brjed dang bral// spros pa dag las yang dag 'das// byang chub sems dpas sgrub byed na// mthar ni bsil ba thob par 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa bye ba drag
304a3(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong mang po dag gis ni// tshig gcig tsam ni rab bstan kyang // mtha' ni dmigs par yong mo nus// 'phags pa mang pos rab tu bsngags// rnam par dag cing zhen pa med// 'khor 'dus
304a4(dkon brtsegs): mang po thams cad kyis// shin tu gus pa bskyed par gyis/ gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gi/ dge ba'i chos kyi mthu stobs kyis// nyon mongs rab bcom nyer zhi nas// khyad
304a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags phan yon thob par byed// yon tan dang ni shes rab dag/ shin tu rgya che rgya mtsho 'dra// bzod pa dag ni sna par byed// sems ni rab bde g.yo med 'gyur// byang chub
304a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas rtag tu bsgoms// mkhas pa dag gis rab tu bsngags// dbul phongs dag ni spong byed cing // nor dang rin chen 'thob par byed// gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis// yon tan rnams/ 
304a7(dkon brtsegs): ni 'phel bar byed// rtag tu stong nyid la sogs pa'i// bden tshig dag gis rab tu brgyan// yi ge dag ni spangs pas na// stong pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya// sems dang rnam shes spangs pa na// chos
304a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya// gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis// dri dral rtag tu rnam dag byed// yang dag ye shes la gnas nas// phan pa sna tshogs ston par byed// sems can dag ni mang po rnams
304b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ging dang ba bskyed par byed// gnod sbyin 'khor ni chad med dang // grul bum 'khor ni gang yin pa// 'di la sogs pa'i yid btags rgyal// dga' ba chen po bskyed ces zer// gzung
304b2(dkon brtsegs): sngags gang yin 'di dag ni// rab tu ni zhing spros pa med// sems can dag la byams pas na// kun la bde ba sbyin par byed// bskal pa mang po brgya stong du// 'gro ba rnams su rtag
304b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing // phan pa tshad med rab byed kyang // rnam par dag cing gos pa med// tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis// bdud rtsi'i chos ni rab bstan nas// sems can dag ni tshad med rnams// 
304b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba chen po bskyed par byed// sngon gyi sangs rgyas tshad med/ rnams// shin tu rnam dag mos pa yis// gzungs 'di la ni bsten nas su// rtag tu chos nyid dgongs par mdzad
304b5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs dang brgya byin lnga rnams dang // klu yi rgyal po lha ma yin/ gzungs 'di thos par gyur nas kyang // sems kyi dga' bskyed ces zer// gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag rnams
304b6(dkon brtsegs): gang du gnas pa'i yul dur ni// rtag tu gnod dang 'khrug pa dang // nad dang sdug bsngal mya ngan med// sems can dag ni thams cad kun// so so dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas// gzungs 'di
304b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu bdag cag gi/ sems la gnas par smon lam 'debs// gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni// lus dang sems dang rkan dag dang // kha mchu dag la gnas gyur na// yon tan dpag
304b8(dkon brtsegs): med bskyed par byed// gal te rtag tu 'dzin byed na// yon tan tshad med thob gyur nas// sems can mngal phan 'dogs shing // thams cad dga' ba thob ces zer// gzungs sngags gang
305a1(dkon brtsegs): yin 'di dag gis// sdig pa rnams ni rab spong zhing // dam chos dgra ni ston byed pas// thug pa med pa'i spongs pa thob// sems can dag ni brgya stong rnams// the tshom
305a2(dkon brtsegs): dgra ni rab bsal nas// nga rgyal rnams ni rab bcom ste// yon tan dpag med thob ces zer// shin tu zab tsang gsang ba'i chos// gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni// mkhas pas rtag
305a3(dkon brtsegs): tu sems byed cing // nan tan gyis ni sgrub par byed// shes rab go cha gang bgos nas// nyon mongs rab tu 'joms par byed// yon tan sems ni 'phel byed pa// rab tu mas shing skyo ba med// 
305a4(dkon brtsegs): gzungs sngags gang yin de dag ni// grags pa chen po phun tshogs pas// zad pa dang ni mi zad par// skye dang mi skye mtha' rab rtogs// 'di 'dra'i shes rab sna tshogs kyis// 
305a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid rab tu brgyan pas na// de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong rnams// shin tu gus shing mchod pa mdzad// de 'dra'i gzungs ni gang yin pa// rig pa dag gis rkang gnyis
305a6(dkon brtsegs): byedapating 'dzin mchog la rab gnas nas// byang chub lam la gzhol bar byed// zhi gnas lhag mthong rjes 'brang zhing // zag med shes rab rtogs par byed// rab dang dbang po stobs kyis ni// 
305a7(dkon brtsegs): lag gnyis yongs su grub par byed// brtson 'grus dang ni bzod pa yis// nu ma gnyis ni grub par byed// shes rab pha rol phyin pas ni//  gtsug can nyid nga byed// mad da stsa pa// so so rig bzhi phreng / 
305a8(dkon brtsegs): ba brgyus// sngon ni mngon par bsgrub pa yi// yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs dang // de ba ni tshad med ji snyed pa// thams cad rab tu brgyan zhes zer// gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni// yon
305b1(dkon brtsegs): tan chad med phun tshogs pas// mig gi ston dang phyi mtha' dang // rang dang mi zad mtha' dag dang // skye ba dang ni mo skye dang // mtha' dang mtha' min gang yin dang // dben pa dang ni mo dben dang // 'jug pa
305b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ni 'jug min dang // ci yang med dang mi 'byung dang // nyer zhi dang ni bag med dang // gang zag med dang srog med dang // sems can med pa'i bar dag dang // 'di la sogs pa'i tshad med sgo// 
305b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rab tu rtogs par gyur// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi// 'jig rten skye ba'i ming bar du// thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer// gong du bsngags pa brjod
305b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yi/ gzungs mchog dam pa gang yin pa// rab dben yon tan mchog ldan zhing // sangs rgyas spyod yul yin dpas na// gzungs don yon tan gang yin pa// yi ges brjod
305b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ma yin yang // 'jig rten pa yi rjes su ni// btags pa'i ming gis brjod pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khru ra mang po dang thabs gcig tu zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim du byon
305b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gdan bshams pa la rab tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs par rig nas/ bdag nyid mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam
305b7(dkon brtsegs): pa thogs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa chen po rnams la rab tu phul te/ mchod pa de yang bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / bsam gtan gyi yon tan khyad par du 'phags
305b8(dkon brtsegs): nga'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu las mngon par grub pa sha stag go/ de ltar mchod pa phul yang / bdag 'ba' shig gi phyir ma yin gyi/ sems can tshad med pa thams cad
306a1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa'i byang chub la gzhol zhing phan pa chen po 'thob par bya ba'i phyir mchod cing phul bas na/ mchod pa des kun tu khyab cing thams cad rab tu tshim par gyur to// 
306a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol ba'i 'og tu 'khor 'dus pa mang po'i mdun du zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu rigs kyi bu'am rigs
306a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo gang la la zhig theg pa chen po la gnas nas/ sbyin pa'i tshogs mngon par sgrub par byed na yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa brgyad cu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rnam pa brgyad cu
306a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su smin par byed cing tshig snyan pas yongs su sdud par byed pa dang / mtshan gya nom pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dbang po rnams
306a5(dkon brtsegs): ma tshang ba med pa dang / 'khor ba spangs nas mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams// zad nas dbang phyug mchog thob pa dang / yon tan phun
306a6(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu brgyan pa dang / 'khor rnam par dag pa dang / gzi byin chen po dang ldan pa dang / shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang / spyod pa khyad par du
306a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa mchog mngon par sgrub pa dang / spyod pa bla na med cing mtshungs pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bag chags yang dag par bcom nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen
306a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa 'phel bar byed pa dang / lus dang ring bsrel 'jig rten thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ba dang / ma rungs pa rnams rab tu btul
306b1(dkon brtsegs): bas mi'i rgyal po dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding gi rgyal po dang / tshangs pa'i rgyal po rnams yongs su dang bskye bar 'gyur ba dang / mthu chen po dang
306b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / mdo'i sde dang / tshogs su bcad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / da ltar
306b3(dkon brtsegs): byung ba dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rmad du byung ba dang / gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / yang dag par ston par 'gyur
306b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sems la le lo med pa dang / chos la ser sna med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi lam la yang dag par gnas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mchog tu gyur zhing ming dang
306b5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi sku mdze/ na du byed par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur pa dang / bsod nams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur
306b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mu stegs can rnams zil gyis gnon pa dang / skes bu dam pa'i chos phun sum tshogs pa dang / sdig pa can gyi spyod pa spong bar 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi rgyu
306b7(dkon brtsegs): las mngon par yid ches pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos sdud par byed pa dang / bdud mang po pham par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i chos bden pa dag la the tshom dang nem nur
306b8(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / 'dod pa ngan pa rnams rab tu bcom pa dang / gzi byin chen po dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pas rdzu 'phrul khyad par du 'phags pa 'thob/ 
307a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / skye shi spong bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / spyod pa dpag tu med pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / yon tan rnams
307a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su sdud par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams la spro ba bskyed pa dang / chos kyi dga' ba la yongs su spyod par 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa gtong ba mngon par sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes
307a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i sgor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / dro bar gyur pa'i chos la gnas par gyur pa dang / rigs nges pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi bzod pa sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi lam
307a4(dkon brtsegs): la bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa'o// gzhon nu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sbyin pa'i tshogs mngon dpar sgrub par byed na/ yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa
307a5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad cu po 'di dag phun sum tshogs shing yongs su rdzogs/ par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig sa su bcad de bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems dpa' blo chen
307a6(dkon brtsegs): gang sbyin pa'i tshogs dang ldan pa la// phan yon mchog ni brgyad cu yod// ngas mdor bsdus te bstan pa yin// gzhan yang dpag med bsam dka' yi// yon tan dag ni gang yin pa/ 
307a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sbyin pa las skye ste// deng 'dir cung zad bstan par bya// khyod kyis 'khor 'dus mang po la// mnyam pa'i sems kyis gang mchod pa// sbyin pa'i tshogs no de dag la// mkhas pa rnams
307a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis sgrub par bya// sbyin pa 'di yis bsags pa yi// bsod nams phung po bsam mi khyab// mtshan dang dpe byad lus brgyan pa// thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// skye gnas
307b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ni rus rigs dang // yum rnams dang ni khyim dag dang // grags pa yi ni gzugs dang sems// thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur// lha rnams rdzu 'phrul dngos po dang // gnas med
307b2(dkon brtsegs): khang dang lha mo dang // rnam dag thogs med spobs pa yang // sbyin pa las ni byung ba yin// sbyin pa'i tshogs mchog gang yin pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di skad du// 'di ni dang por byang
307b3(dkon brtsegs): chub rnams// gnas pa'i gzhi zhes bsngags pa mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus can// sbyin pa the tshom med pa dag/ nges pa'i sems la rab gnas nas// sbran pa nan tan
307b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub par gyis// sbyin pa'i sems ni gang dag gis// bsod nams mchog ni rdzogs byed pa// byang chub sems dpa' sgrub byed na// sangs rgyas byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ 
307b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin de'i mthu yi stobs kyis ni// rdzu 'phrul mchog ni rdzogs byed pas// zhing ni bye ba bskul byas nas// sems can rnams la gnod mi 'gyur// sbyin pa btang ba'i dbang gis na/ 
307b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag tshul khrims mang thos dang // yang dag yid ches brtson 'grus dang // ting 'dzin zag med shes rab 'dren// sbyin pa btang ba'i dbang gis na// dbang po stobs dang yang dag dang // yang dag
307b7(dkon brtsegs): spong dang rdzu 'phrul rkang // bag chags spong ba 'dren par byed// sbyin pa btang ba'i dbang gis ni// rnam dag sgra snyan dag gis ni// zhing ni bye ba brgya phrag tu// dpag med chos ston 'dren par byed/ 
307b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dang bas sbyin btang bas// rdzu 'phrul rnams ni myur du 'thob// rdzu 'phrul yongs su rdzogs bya'i phyir// nan tan sbyin pa btang bar gyis// lha ni mang po tshad med rnams// lha ma yin dang
308a1(dkon brtsegs): klu rnams dang // gnod sbyin brgya stong mang po dang // 'khor rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas// gzhal med khang mchog rab bzhugs te// rang dbang dag gis rje byed na/ 
308a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di la sogs pa'i rgyal po rnams// sbyin la brtson pa mthong gyur na// thams cad langs nas bsu nas ni// stan gding mchod pa dag kyang byed// sbyin gtong gang zag gang yin pa// gzi byin chen po
308a3(dkon brtsegs): dun tshogs shing / rdzu 'phrul stobs la dang thob pas// lha rgyal rnams ni sdud par byed// grul bum dang ni gnod sbyin rnams// thams cad skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur// dri za'i 'khor bcas rnams kyis kyang / 
308a4(dkon brtsegs): rol mo dag gis mchod par byed// chom rkun dag ni byams sem sa bskyed// ma rungs pa rnams ring du 'gro/ nor rnams nyams par mi 'gyur te// bang mdzod dag ni gang bar 'gyur
308a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa yongs su btang ba'i phyir// tshogs mchog dag ni rdzog sa par 'gyur// sangs rgyas ye shes thugs bar du/ mu stegs chos ni spyod mi byed// de la na ba yong med de/ 
308a6(dkon brtsegs): gzungs rnams yongs su bsrung bar byed// khyad par 'phags pa'i stobs rnams kyang // sbyin pa las ni byung ba yin// de ltar sbyin pa gang gtong ba// byang chub lam ni sgrub par byed// mi dge
308a7(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen phrad mi 'gyur// spyod 'thun grogs po thob par 'gyur// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sbyin pa'i tshogs ni sogs byed pas// bsam gyis mi khyab gzungs dag
308a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / shes rab yongasu rdzogs byedag tshigs su bcad pa tshad med kyis// kun 'dzin yang dag ston par byed// thams cad la ni thogs med pas// ngo bo nyid don stor mi 'gyur// byang chub
308b1(dkon brtsegs): sems ni rgya che la// mos pa'i sems ni brtan par 'gyur// tshul khrims dag pa phun tshogs shing // bdud kyi las rnams spong bar byed// 'dod pa lta la zhen med cing // rtse gcig yang
308b2(dkon brtsegs): dag dran pa tshol// sems la rtag tu rmongs med pas// 'dod pa dag la sred mi bskyed// zhe sdang nyon mongs gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rab tu rtogs// spyod yul dag ni thams cad la// 
308b3(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa med cing rmongs pa med// gang zag des ni nyon mongs rnams// legs pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur// rgyu dang rkyen ni 'dus pa las// nyes dmigs rnams ni skye ba nas// sangs rgyas ches
308b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bar dag gi/ rgyu dang rgyu yi rgyu nyid dang // de bzhin rgyu yi bya ba rnams// thams cad rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// des ni mi gzang mtha' yi rgyu// gang yin rab tu rtogs pas na// 
308b5(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa rnams ni yongs spangs nas// mig la mngon par zhen mi 'gyur// des ni mig gi skye mtha' dang // mtha' dang rab tu dben pa dang // 'jug pa dang ni med pa dang / 
308b6(dkon brtsegs): skye ba nas nyer zhi'i bar// 'di la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid kyang // rab tu rtogs par 'gyur bas na// rmongs po rnams ni yongs spangs nas// mig la mngon par zhen mi 'gyur// des ni mig gi
308b7(dkon brtsegs): sngon mtha' yi// brjod pa'i 'jig rten rjes su ni// btags pa yin pas de la ni// yang dag ci yang med par rtogs// des ni mig gi phyi mtha' yi// brjod pa'i 'jig rten rjes su ni// brtags
308b8(dkon brtsegs): pa yin pa de la ni// yang dag ci yang med par rtogs// des ni mig gi skye mtha' dang // mtha' dang rab dben 'jug pa dang // ci yang med dang ske med nas// nye bar zhi ba'i bar dag dang // 'di la
309a1(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa'i brjod pa rnams// 'jig rten rjes su btags pas na// de la yang dag med par ni// rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba yin// des ni mig gi sngon mtha' yi// 
309a2(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las// byung ba nyid du rtogs pas na// de la zhen pa ci yang med// des ni mig gi phyi mtha' yi// brjod pa rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las// byung ba nyid du rtogs pas na// de la zhen pa/ 
309a3(dkon brtsegs): ci yang med// des ni mig gi sku mtha' dang // mtha' dang rab dben 'jug pa dang // ci yang med dang skye med dang // nye bar zhi ba'i bar dag dang // 'di la sogs pa'i brjod pa rnams// rgyu dang
309a4(dkon brtsegs): rkyen ni 'dus pa las// byung ba nyid du rtogs pas na// de la zhengan pa ci yang med// des ni mig gi sngon mtha' yi// brjod pa rang bzhin bstan med par// rab tu rtogs par gyur
309a5(dkon brtsegs): pas na// de la zhen pa ci yang med// des ni mig gi phyi mtha' yi brjod pa rang bzhin bstan med par// rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na// de la zhen pa ci yang med// des ni
309a6(dkon brtsegs): mig gi skye mtha' dang // mtha' dang rab dpan 'jug pa dang // ci yang med dang skye med nas// nye bar zhi ba'i bar dag dang // 'di la sogs pa'i brjod pa rnams// rang bzhin gyis ni bstan med
309a7(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na// de la zhen pa ci yang med// rna ba sna lho lus dang yid// yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi// 'jig rten skye ba'i ming gi bar// thams cad de bzhin sbyar
309a8(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba des ni 'dod chags sangs rgyas lam// rang bzhin dbyer med yin par ni// rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na// 'dod chags la ni zhan po med// sangs rgyas lam ni thams cad kun// 
309b1(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs las ni bcal bar bya// rang bzhin dbyer med rab shes na// kun 'dzin sgor ni zhugs pa yin// 'dod chags kun 'dzin yin pa dang // kun 'dzin 'dod chags yin ston cing // rang
309b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin dbyer med rab shes na// kun 'dzin sgo ni slob pa yin// de bzhin 'dod chags gang mchod pa// de ni sangs rgyas mchod pa yin// sangs rgyas la ni mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgon
309b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur// des ni zhe sdang sangs rgyas lam// rang bzhin dbyer med yin par ni// rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na// zhe sdang la ni zhen pa med// zhe sdang kun 'dzin yin pa dang // kun
309b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin zhe sdang kun ston zhing // rang bzhin dbyer med rab shes na// kun 'dzin sgo ni slob pa yin// de bzhin zhe sdang gang mtsho du pa// de ni sangs rgyas mchod pa yin// sangs rgyas la ni
309b5(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// des ni gti mug sangs rgyas lam// rang bzhin dbyer/ med yin par ni// rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na// gti
309b6(dkon brtsegs): mug la ni zhen pa med// gal te gti mug nyid kyi mtha'// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs gyur na// de ni sangs rgyas lam bsgrubs pas// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// gti mug kun
309b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin yin pa dang // kun 'dzin gti mug yin ston zhing // rang bzhin dbyer med rab shes na// kun 'dzin sgo ni slob pa yin// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// da na sangs rgyas mchod pa
309b8(dkon brtsegs): yin sangs rgyas la ni mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// de ni chos la mchod pa yin// chos la mchod pa byas pa'i phyir// 
310a1(dkon brtsegs): kun dzin rnon rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// de ni dge 'dun mchod pa yin// dge 'dun la ni mchod pa'i phyir// sun dzan smin rdzogs pa
310a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// de ni tshul khrims mchod pa yin// tshul khrims la ni mched pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgon rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchad nga // brtsom
310a3(dkon brtsegs): 'grus la ni mchod pa yin// brtson 'grus la ni mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin ska ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// bsngags pa brjod cing mchod pa'i phyir// kun
310a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug ga dang pa/ sangs rgyas chos la mchod pa yin// sangs rgyas chos la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin skon rdzogs
310a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// chos nyi la ni mchod pa yin// chos nyid la ni mchod pa'i phyir/ kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug
310a6(dkon brtsegs): gang mchod pa// de bzhin nyid la mchod pa yin// de bzhin nyid la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// skye ba med la mchod pa
310a7(dkon brtsegs): yin// skye ba med la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// 'gag pa med la mchod pa yin// 'gag pa med la mchod pa'i phyir/ 
310a8(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin smi ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// zag pa med la mchod pa yin// zag pa meng la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin
310b1(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gang mchod pa// ci yang med la mchod pa yin// ci yang med la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// dpag tu med la mchod
310b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin// dpag tu med la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgon rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// srid pa gsum la mchod pa yin// srid pa gsum la mchod pa'i phyir/ 
310b3(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// rab dben la ni mchod pa yin// rab dben la ni mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgon rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin ga
310b4(dkon brtsegs): mug gang mchod pa// 'khor bar 'jug pa mchod pa yin// 'khor bar 'jug pa mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgon rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ 
310b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa med la mchod pa yin// 'jug pa med la mchodapa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// yod pa min la mchod pa
310b6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ yod pa min la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// 'byung ba med la mchod pa yin// 'byung ba med la mchod pa'i phyir// kun
310b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// nye bar zhi la mchod pa yin// nye bar zhi la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug
310b8(dkon brtsegs): gang mchod pa// 'ong ba med la mchod pa yin// 'ong ba med la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgoni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// 'gro ba med la mchod pa yin// 
311a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba med la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// 'dus byas la ni mchod pa yin// 'dus byas la ni mchod nga'i phyir// 
311a2(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// sdug bsngal la sogs mchod pa yin// sdug bsngal la sogs mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// 
311a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// sdug bsngal shes la mchod pa yin// sdug bsngal shes la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// kun
311a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung shes la mchod pa yin// kun 'byung shes la mchodadapa phyir// kun 'dzin sgoni rdzogs par 'gyur// bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// 'gog pa shes la mtshad
311a5(dkon brtsegs): yon 'gog pa shes la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sna ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa lam shes la ni mchod pa yin// lam shes la ni mchod
311a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// chos shes lan mchod pa yin// chos shes la ni mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgoni rdzogs par
311a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// chos rjes shes la mchod pa yin// chos rjes shes la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang
311a8(dkon brtsegs): / mchod dang // skye med ye shes mchod pa yin// skye med ye shes mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// zad pa'i ye shes mchod pa yin// 
311b1(dkon brtsegs): bdapar ye shes mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgon rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin yang dag spong ba dang // dran pa nyer gzhag rngu 'phrul dang // dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang // byang chub yan lag
311b2(dkon brtsegs): bdun po dang // yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag dang // zhi gnas lhag mthong la sogs pa// chos ni rnam pa dgu po rnams// thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
311b3(dkon brtsegs): zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu sems can gang la la zhig theg pa chen po la gnas nas/ gong du ji skad bstan pa'i gzungs mngon par sgrub par 'dod pas/ gang
311b4(dkon brtsegs): zag rnam pa brgyad cu yongs su spang bar bya'o// rnam pa brgya/ da cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste pha bsad pa dang / ma bas/ dra pa dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / gnod sems
311b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'tshal phyung ba dang / dge 'dun 'thun pa bshig pa dang / rkun bur rab tu byung ba dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / dbang po gnyis dang ldan pa dang
311b6(dkon brtsegs): log par lta ba dang / log par sems pa dang / log par smra ba dang / log pa'i las can dang / log pas 'tshe ba dang / log par brtson pa dang / log pa'i dran pa can dang / log pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
311b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang / gnas mi shes pa dang / dus mi shes pa dang / tshod mi shes pa dang / lam mi shes pa dang / tshad mi shes pa dang / bdag dang gzhan mi shes pa dang / sangs rgyas dang
311b8(dkon brtsegs): chos dang / dge 'dun dang bslab pa'i gnas rnams la gus pa med pa dang / bag yod pa dang / spyod yul khyad par du 'phags pa dag la btsun par mi 'dzin pa dang / chos mi shes pa dang
312a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba mi shes pa dang / bslab pa'i gnas mi shes pa dang / kha na ma tho ba lci ba dang / yang ba mi shes pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dang / ral ba mi shes pa dang / 
312a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang spyod pa shin tu phra ba dang / rags pa mi shes pa dang / las ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba mi shes pa dang / dngos po dman pa rnams mi shes pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i bsngags
312a3(dkon brtsegs): pa brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos la skur pa 'debs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bsgrub par bskul ba dang / bla na med pa'i lam yang dag pa la skyo zhing spong bar byed pa dang / 
312a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod lam nyams pa dang / lam ma yin pa la spyod/ pa dang / bdag yod par smra ba dang / sems can yod par
312a5(dkon brtsegs): smra ba dang / srog yod par smra ba dang / gang zag yod par smra ba dang / bsam pa shin tu dman zhing 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug bskyed par byed pa dang / chad
312a6(dkon brtsegs): par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / stong zhing rgyu med par lta ba dang / yod pa mi mthong ba dang / med pa mi mthong ba dang / las mi mthong ba dang / brtson 'grus mi mthong ba dang / las
312a7(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa dang / las kyi rgyu mi shes pa dang / rnam par smin pa mi shes pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / dbang po rnams mi shes pa dang / dbang po rnams kyi rgyu mi
312a8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / khams mi shes pa dang / khams kyi rgyu mi shes pa dang / rnam par grol ba mi shes pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / lam mi shes pa dang / lam gyi/ 
312b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu mi shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa mi shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / gtong ba mi shes pa dang / gtong ba'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / sngon gyi mthar dang phyi ma'i mthar mi shes pa dang / 
312b2(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mnga'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / skye sha ma shes pa dang / skye shi'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa mi shes pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / 
312b3(dkon brtsegs): zad pa dang zad pa ma yin pa mi shis pa dang / yod pa dang yod pa ma yin pa mi shes pa dang / mtha' dang mtha' ma yin pa mi shes pa dang / dben pa dang dben pa ma yin pa mi shes pa dang / 
312b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang 'jug pa ma yin pa mi shes pa dang / ngo bo nyid dang ngo bo nyid ma yin pa mi shes pa dang / skye bdang skye ba ma yin pa mi shes pa dang / 'gag pa dang 'gag
312b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin pa mi shes pa gang yin pa ste/ gnon nu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gong du rdza skad bstan pa'i gzungs mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pas
312b6(dkon brtsegs): chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i gang zag brgyad cu po 'di dag yongs su spang bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// gang zhig mig gi skye mtha' dang / 
312b7(dkon brtsegs): zad mtha' dag ni mi rtogs pas// de ni kun 'dzin la rmongs pas// mkhas pas yongs su spang bar bya// gang zhig mig gi bdag med dang // sems can med par rtogs gyur pa// 
312b8(dkon brtsegs): de ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas// ma bas pas yongs su bsten par bya// gang zhig mig gi skye zad dang // yi ge spangs pa rtogs gyur pa// de ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas// mkhas
313a1(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su bsten par bya// gang zhig mig ni dben pa dang // gnas pa med par rtogs gyur pa// de ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas// mkhas pas yongs su bsten
313a2(dkon brtsegs): par bya// gang zhig mig gi rang bzhin nyid// gnas pa med par rtogs gyur pa// de ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas// mkhas pas rab tu bsten par bya// gang zhig mig la 'jug med dang // 
313a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi mtshan nyid mi rtogs pa// de ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas// mkhas pas yongs su bsten par bya// gang zhig mig la skye med dang // rang bzhin zhi bar rtogs gyur pa// de ni
313a4(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin la gnas pas// mkhas pas yongs su bsten par bya// gang zhig mig gi rang bzhin gyis// mig gi mtshan nyid spangs pas na// sangs rgyas rnams kyis
313a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa dang // bstan du med par rtogs gyur pa/ da ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas// mkhas pas yongs su bsten par bya// gang zhig mig gi rang bzhin gyis/ 
313a6(dkon brtsegs): mig gi mtshan nyid spangs pas na// su yang sems shing 'dzin pa dang // bshad du med par rtogs gyur pa// de ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas// mkhas pas yongs su bsten par bya// 
313a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gzungs kyi ngo bo nyid// yi ges brjod bya ma yin pas// phyogs kyang yod pa ma yin la// sems kyis kyang ni phyin mi 'gyur// chos de la ni dga' ba med// zhe sdang la yang
313a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa med// ri rgyal bzhin du mi g.yongs// brjod par byed kyang dmigs su med// kun 'dzin yang dag yod ma yin// bdag kyang yod pa ma yin te// gal te bdag ni rang bzhin/ 
313b1(dkon brtsegs): stong kun 'dzin yang ni yod mi 'gyur// kun 'dzin rang bzhin stong yin na// byis pas yod par rab tu brtags// yang dag ma yin brtags pas na// ma thos pa yang mya ngan bskyed/ 
313b2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig 'dod dang kun 'dzin dag/ stong pa nyid du rnam rtog pa// rtog pa gnyis pa de dag kyang // mthar ni gang yang dmigs mi 'gyur// gal te stong nyid stong rtogs na// kun 'dzin
313b3(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang yod mi 'gyur// byang chub yan lag par dag dang // ting 'dzin dag kyang ston pa yin// gang zhig kun 'dzin stong nyid dang // ting 'dzin dag ni bar dag kyang // rab tu rtogs
313b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na ni// mig kyang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// gang zhig mig ni zad pa'i mtha'// yang dag rdza bzhin rab rtogs na// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa// mtha'
313b5(dkon brtsegs): ni yongs su rdzogs par byed// gang zhig mig ni skye ba'i mtha'// yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogs na// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa// mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed// 
313b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mig gi mtha' yi rnams// yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogs na// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa// mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed// gang zhig mig gi rab dben pa// yang dag ji
313b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rab rtogs na// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa// mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed// gang zhig mig gi 'jug mtha' dag/ yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogs na// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin
313b8(dkon brtsegs): pa mtha' ni yongs su rdzogs par byed// gang zhig mig ni yod min pa// yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogs na// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa// mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed// gang nis
314a1(dkon brtsegs): mig ni nyer zhi ba// yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogs na// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa// mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed// gang zhig mig ni 'gyur ba yi// zad mtha'
314a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag bzhin rtogs pa// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa// mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed// gang zhig mig gi 'gyur ba yi// skye mtha' yang dag bzhin rtogs na// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang
314a3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa// mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed// gang zhig mig gi 'gyur ba yi// mtha' ni yang dag bzhin rtogs na// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa// mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par
314a4(dkon brtsegs): byed gang zhig mig gi 'gyur ba yi// rab dben yang dag bzhin rtogs na// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa/ mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed// gang zhig mig gi
314a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba yi// 'jug pa yang dag bzhin rtogs na// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa// mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed// gang zhig mig gi 'gyur ba yi// med pa yang
314a6(dkon brtsegs): dag bzhin rtogs na// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa// mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed// gang zhig mig gi 'gyur ba yi// skye med yang dag bzhin rtogs na// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang
314a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa// mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed// gang zhig mig gi 'gyur ba yi// nyer zhi yang dag bzhin rtogs na// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa// mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed// 
314a8(dkon brtsegs): rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// yul drug dang ni 'byung chen ba ni// 'jijog rten skye ba'i ming gi bar// thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// gang zhig mig gi sngon mtha' la// 'gyur ba tha dad
314b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid med// len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa// kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin// gang zhig mig gi zad mtha' la// 'gyur ba tha dad mtshan nyid med// len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa// 
314b2(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin// gang zhig mig gi skye mtha' la// 'gyur dang tha dad mtshan nyid med// len dang rnam rtog mang gyur pa// kun 'dzin sgol gnas pa yin// gang zhig mig
314b3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dag la// 'gyur ba tha dad mtshan nyid med// lon dang rnam rtog med gyur pa// kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin// gang zhig mig gi nya re zhe la// 'gyur dang tha dad mtshan nyid med// 
314b4(dkon brtsegs): len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa// kun 'dzin sgrosgra la gnas/ pa yin// gang zhig tshig gi 'jug pa la// 'gyur dang / tha dad mtshan nyid med// len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa/ 
314b5(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin// gang zhig mig gi mad pa la 'gyur dang tha dad mtshan nyid med// lan dang rnam rtog med gyur pa// kun 'dzin sgrol gnas pa yin// 
314b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mig gi skye med la// 'gyur dang tha dad mtshan nyid med// len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa// kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin// gang zhig mig gi nyer zhi la// 'gyur dang tha
